\label{TwoParameterHamiltonian} H(q,\eta) \; = \; -\frac{1}{2}\sum_{j=1}^{L-1}\: \left( \,\eta\:\sigma_{j}^{x}\sigma_{j+1}^{x} \; + \; \eta^{-1}\sigma_{j}^{y}\sigma_{j+1}^{y} \; + \; q\,\sigma_{j}^{z} \; + \; q^{-1}\sigma_{j+1}^{z} \right) \;,
\label{PeriodicHamiltonian} H \; = \; -\frac{1}{2}\sum_{j=1}^{L}\: \left( \,\eta\:\sigma_{j}^{x}\sigma_{j+1}^{x} \; + \; \eta^{-1}\sigma_{j}^{y}\sigma_{j+1}^{y} \right) \;-\; h\, \sum_{j=1}^{L}\; \sigma_j^z
\label{JordanWigner} \tau_{j}^{1}\;=\;   \Bigl(\prod_{i<j}   \sigma_{i}^{z}\Bigr)\,\sigma_{j}^{x} \;,\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\; \tau_{j}^{2}\;=\;\Bigl(\prod_{i<j}   \sigma_{i}^{z}\Bigr)\,\sigma_{j}^{y} \;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\; (j=1 \ldots L)
\label{TauCommutators} \{\tau_{i}^{\mu},\tau_{j}^{\nu}\} \;=\; 2\ \delta_{i,j}^{\mu,\nu} \; \;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;\; (i,j=1 \ldots L;\;\;\mu,\nu=1,2)
\label{TauHamiltonian} H(q,\eta)\;=\; \frac{i}{2}\sum_{j=1}^{L-1} \left(    \eta\,\tau_{j}^{2}\tau_{j+1}^{1}    \ - \  \eta^{-1}\,\tau_{j}^{1}\tau_{j+1}^{2}    \ + \ q\,\tau_{j}^{1}\tau_{j}^{2}    \ + \ q^{-1}\,\tau_{j+1}^{1}\tau_{j+1}^{2} \, \right).
\label{AlphaBeta} \alpha=\frac q\eta \,, \hspace{1cm} \beta=q\eta \,, \hspace{1.5cm} [E]_{\alpha} \;=\;  \frac{\alpha^{E}-\alpha^{-E}} {\alpha-\alpha^{-1}}\;.
\label{ZeroModeOperators} T_0^{1} \;=\;     \alpha^{-\frac{L+1}{2}} \;\sum_{j=1}^{L}     \alpha^{j} \,\tau_{j}^{1} \,, \hspace{1.5cm} T_0^{2} \;=\;     \beta^{-\frac{L+1}{2}} \;\sum_{j=1}^{L}     \beta^{j} \,\tau_{j}^{2} \,, \hspace{1.5cm} E\;=\;L\,,
\label{Additional} [N,T_0^1] \;=\; i \, T_0^2 \hspace{1.5cm} [N,T_0^2] \;=\; - i \, T_0^1 \hspace{1.5cm} [N,E]\;=\;0\;.
\label{DiagonalForm} H(q,\eta)\;=\;\sum_{k=1}^{L-1}\, \Lambda_{k}\;i T_{k}^{2}T_{k}^{1} \;,
\label{Dispersion} \Lambda_k \;=\; \left( \frac{1}{4\alpha\beta} \, \rm (\alpha-e^{\frac{i \pi k}{L}})\, (\alpha-e^{-\frac{i \pi k}{L}})\, (\beta-e^{\frac{i \pi k}{L}})\, (\beta-e^{-\frac{i \pi k}{L}}) \right)^\frac12
\label{Clifford2} \{T_k^\mu,T_l^\nu\} = 2 \,\delta_{k,l}^{\mu,\nu} \;, \hspace{1.3cm} \{T_0^\mu,T_k^\nu\}=0 \;. \hspace{2cm} (k,l=1\ldots L-1; \; \mu,\nu=1,2)

\nabla_x^\mu \left[ \Delta_\gamma(x,y) \; s_\gamma(x,y) \; t_\mu(x) \right] = (d+1) \Delta_\gamma(x,y).

{d\Delta_\gamma(s)\over ds} = \left( {d\over s} -   \theta \right) \Delta_\gamma(s).
\Delta_\gamma(x,y) = s_\gamma(x,y)^d \exp\left( - \int_\gamma \theta ds \right)_.
\nabla_x^\mu \left[ \Delta_\gamma(x,y) \{ \zeta \; l_\mu(x) + \xi \; m_\mu(x) \}\right] = (d+1) \Delta_\gamma(x,y).
{d\Delta_\gamma(\zeta)\over d\zeta} = \left( {[d-1]\over \zeta} -  \hat\theta \right) \Delta_\gamma(\zeta). \label{null-evolution}
\Delta_\gamma(x,y) = \zeta_\gamma(x,y)^{[d-1]} \exp\left( - \int_\gamma \hat\theta d\zeta \right)_.
{d\theta\over ds} = - \left( R_{\mu\nu} t^\mu t^\nu \right) -2\sigma^2 -{\theta^2\over d}.
{d\theta\over ds} \geq -{\theta^2\over d}.
{1\over\theta(s)} \geq {1\over\theta(0)} + {s\over d}.
{\theta(s)}  \leq + {d\over s}.
{d\hat\theta\over d\zeta} = - \left( R_{\mu\nu} l^\mu l^\nu \right) -2\sigma^2 -{{\hat\theta}^2\over(d-1)}.
{d\hat\theta\over d\zeta} \geq -{\hat\theta^2\over d-1}.
{\hat\theta(\zeta)}  \leq + {(d-1)\over \zeta}.
\int\theta ds = \ln\det[A^\mu{}_\nu(s)].

F_t(s)=A^{-s} e^{-tA}, \label{1}
\partial_s F_t(s)+F_t(s-1)=0 \label{2}
e^{-tA}=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c} dz \, \Gamma(z) \, (tA)^{-z}, \label{3}
F_t(s)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c}dz \, \Gamma(z) \, t^{-z}A^{-s-z}. \label{4}
\zeta_A(s+z)(x)\simeq \frac{1}{\Gamma(s+z)}\left[\sum_r \frac{K_r(x)}{s+z+\frac{r-n}{d}}+ \hat{J}(s+z,x)  \right] \label{5}
F_t(s,x)\simeq \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c}dz \, t^{-z}\frac{\Gamma(z)} {\Gamma(s+z)} \left[\sum_r \frac{K_r(x)}{s+z+\frac{r-n}{d}}+ \hat{J}(s+z,x) \right]. \label{6}
\tr F_t(s) \simeq \sum_i \lambda_i^{-s} e^{-t\lambda_i}= \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c}dz \, t^{-z}\frac{\Gamma(z)} {\Gamma(s+z)} \left[\sum_r \frac{K_r}{s+z+\frac{r-n}{d}}+ \hat{J}(s+z) \right]. \label{7}
F_t(s)\simeq F_t^{(1)}(s)+ F_t^{(2)}(s)+ F_t^{(3)}(s), \label{8}
F_t^{(1)}(s) = \sum_k \frac{(-t)^k}{k!} \, \zeta_A(s-k), \label{9}
F_t^{(2)}(s) = \sum_r \frac{\Gamma(\frac{n-r}{d}-s)}{\Gamma(\frac{n-r}{d})} \, t^{s+\frac{r-n}{d}}K_r \label{10}
F_t^{(3)}(s) = \frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_C  dz \, \Gamma(z) \, t^{-z}\zeta_A(s+z), \label{11}
F(s,t)=\sum_i \lambda_i^{-s} f(t\lambda_i), \label{12}
f(y)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c}dz \, y^{-z}M[f](z), \label{13}
M[f](z)=\int_0^\infty dy \, y^{z-1}f(y). \label{14}
F(s,t)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_{\Re \dsp z=c}dz \, t^{-z}M[f](z) \, \zeta_A(s+z). \label{15}
F(s,t)=F^{(1)}(s,t)+ F^{(2)}(s,t)+ F^{(3)}(s,t), \label{16}
F^{(1)}(s,t)= \sum_k  \mbox{Res} \, M[f](z_k) \, t^{-z_k}\zeta_A(s+z_k), \label{17}
F^{(2)}(s,t)=\sum_{r} \frac{M[f](\frac{n-r}{d}-s)}{\Gamma(\frac{n-r}{d})} \, t^{s+\frac{r-n}{d}}K_r \label{18}
F^{(3)}(s,t)=\frac{1}{2\pi i}\int_C  dz \, M[f](z) \, t^{-z}\zeta_A(s+z), \label{19}

\Delta(b)=e^g\otimes b+b\otimes e^{-g}\,,\ \ \ \Delta(v)=e^h\otimes v+v\otimes e^{-h}\,, \label{63}
<1,b>=<1,g>=<h,1>=<v,1>=<h,g>=0\,. \label{64}
{\cal R}={\rm exp}\{g\otimes v+b\otimes h-\frac{1}{6}(g\otimes hvh +gbg\otimes h+g^2\otimes (hv+vh)+(gb+bg)\otimes h^2)+\ldots \}\,, \label{65}
(\Delta\otimes id){\cal R}={\cal R}_{13}{\cal R}_{23}\,,\ \ \ (id\otimes \Delta){\cal R}={\cal R}_{13}{\cal R}_{12} \label{66}
{\cal L}  = - {1\over 4} \G a{\mu\nu} G^{a\mu\nu} + \theta {g^2 \over 32\pi^2} \G a{\mu\nu} \tilde G^{a\mu\nu}, \label{eq:LQCD}
\G a{\mu\nu} = \pad \mu \G a{\nu} - \pad \nu \G a{\mu} + g \fabc \G b\mu \G c\nu, \qquad \tilde G^{a\mu\nu} = {1\over 2} \epsilon^{\mu\nu\lambda\sigma} \G a{\lambda\sigma},
\CM ai \equiv { \partial {\cal L} \over \partial \Gdot ai } = \Gdot ai - \D i\G a0 - \bar\theta \B ai,
\B ai = {1\over 2} \eijk \G a{jk},\label{eq:B}
\D \mu A^a \equiv \pad \mu A^a + g \fabc \G b\mu A^c,
\tilde {H} \equiv  \int d\vec x \left( \CM ai\Gdot ai - {\cal L} \right) = \int d\vec x \left[ {1\over 2} \left( \CM ai + \bar\theta \B ai \right)^2 + {1\over 2} \B ai{}^2 + \CM ai ( \D i \G a0 ) \right], \label{eq:tilH}
\E ai(x)  \equiv \CM ai(x) + \bar\theta \B ai(x) \label{eq:E}
\tilde H = \int d\vec x \left\{ {1\over 2} \E ai {}^2 + {1\over 2} \B ai {}^2 - ( \D i \E ai )\G a0 \right\}.  \label{eq:tH}
1 \d \, g_{\mu\nu} = 2\phi (x) \, g_{\mu\nu}\;,
2 {\cal A} (g_{\mu\nu}) \equiv \d W/\d \phi (x) \; .

9 \Box^\a = \int^{\infty}_0 \, dt \, t^\a /(t-\Box )\; .

12 {\cal A}_{d=2} = \d W/\d \phi (x) = c(2) \, \sqrt{-g} \, R \; ,
13 \sqrt{-g} \, A^{\m_1\n_1}_{[\m_1\n_1} \ldots A^{\m_n\n_n}_{\m_n\n_n ]} \equiv 0 \;,  \hspace{.3in} m < n \; .

\Tr  e^{-tB}\sim\sum_n A_n t^{n-D/2} \label{TrKt}
V(\ep ,f)=\frac{(\ln\det B)_\ep}{2V({\cal M})} =-\frac{1}{2}\at\frac{\mu^2}{4\pi}\ct^{D/2} \int_0^\infty dt\,t^{-(1+D/2)}\ro(\ep,t) e^{-tf^2/\mu^2} \label{Vep}

I = \int d^4x \sqrt{-g} \left[ - R + 2(\nabla \phi)^2                                       + e^{-2\phi} F^2 \right]~~.
\nabla_{\mu} (e^{-2\phi} F^{\mu \nu})~~,
\nabla^2 \phi + \frac{1}{2} e^{-2\phi} F^2 = 0~~,
R_{\mu \nu} = 2\nabla_{\mu}\phi\nabla_{\nu}\phi                  + 2e^{-2\phi}F_{\mu \rho} F_{\nu}^{~\rho}                  - \frac{1}{2}g_{\mu \nu}e^{-2\phi}F^2~~.
ds^2 = -\Delta^2 dt^2 + \frac{\sigma^2}{\Delta^2} dr^2           + r^2 \left( {d\theta}^2           + {\sin}^2 \theta {d\varphi}^2 \right)~~,
F_{01} = -F_{10} = f(r)~~,
\nabla_{\mu}F_{\nu \lambda} + \nabla_{\nu}F_{\lambda \mu} +    \nabla_{\lambda}F_{\mu \nu} = 0~~,
(r^2 e^{-2\phi} f)' = 0~~,
(r^2 g)' = 0~~,
(\frac{r^2 \Delta^2}{\sigma} \phi')'        = r^2 \sigma e^{-2\phi}(f^2-g^2)~~,
\left[ \frac{r \Delta}{\sigma} (r \Delta)'\right]' = \sigma~~,
(\frac{r \Delta^2}{\sigma} -\frac{r^2 \Delta\Delta'}{\sigma})'    - \sigma = -2 r^2 \sigma e^{-2\phi} (f^2 + g^2)~~,
\left[ \frac{r \Delta}{\sigma}(r \Delta)'\right]'    -2(\frac{2r\Delta}{\sigma} \Delta'+ \frac{\Delta^2}{\sigma})    +\sigma = -2 r^2 \frac{\Delta^2}{\sigma} {\phi'}^2    + 2 r^2 \sigma e^{-2\phi} (f^2 + g^2)~~,
f = \frac{Q_e}{r^2} e^{2\phi}~~,
g = \frac{Q_m}{r^2}~~,
(\frac{r^2 \Delta^2}{\sigma} \phi')' =    \frac{\sigma}{r^2}({Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi} - {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi})~~,
\left[ \frac{1}{2}\frac{(r^2\Delta^2)'}{\sigma}\right]'=\sigma~~,
(\frac{r\Delta^2}{\sigma})'=\sigma \left[    1-\frac{1}{r^2}({Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi} + {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi})\right]~~,
(\phi')^2 = \frac{1}{r}\frac{\sigma'}{\sigma}~~,
\frac{\sigma'}{\sigma} = \frac{\rho^2}{r(r^2 + \rho^2)}~~,
\phi' = \pm \frac{\rho}{r \sqrt{r^2 + \rho^2}}~~,
F_{01} = \frac{Q_e}{r^2} e^{2\phi}~~,
F_{23} = \frac{Q_m}{r^2}~~,
\sigma^2 = \frac{r^2}{r^2 + \rho^2}~~,
\Delta^2 = 1 - \frac{2 M}{r^2} \sqrt{r^2 + \rho^2}                 + \frac{\beta}{r^2}~~,
e^{2\phi} = e^{2\phi_0}(1-\frac{2 \rho}{\sqrt{r^2 + \rho^2}                + \rho})~~.
\rho = \frac{1}{2 M} ({Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi_0}           - {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi_0})~~,
\beta = ({Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi_0} + {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi_0})~~.
F \to \tilde{F} = \frac{1}{2} e^{-2\phi}                       \epsilon_{\mu \nu}^{~~\lambda \rho}                       F_{\lambda \rho}~~,
F_{23} = \frac{Q_m}{r^2}~~,
\sigma^2 = \frac{r^2}{r^2 + {\tilde{\rho}}^2}~~,
\Delta^2 = 1 - \frac{2 M \sqrt{r^2 + \tilde{\rho}^2}}{r^2}                 + \frac{2 M \tilde{\rho}}{r^2}~~,
e^{-2\phi} = e^{-2\phi_0}(1-\frac{2 \tilde{\rho}}                {\sqrt{r^2+{\tilde{\rho}}^2}+\tilde{\rho}})~~,
\tilde{\rho} = \frac{{Q_m}^2}{2 M} e^{-2\phi_0}~~.
F_{23} = \frac{Q_m}{{r^{\ast}}^2             (1-\frac{2 \tilde{\rho}}{r^{\ast}})}~~,
e^{-2\phi} = e^{-2\phi_0}(1-\frac{2 \tilde{\rho}}{r^{\ast}})~~,
ds^2 = - (1-\frac{2 M}{r^{\ast}}) dt^2           + \frac{1}{(1-\frac{2 M}{r^{\ast}})} {dr^{\ast}}^2           + {r^{\ast}}^2 (1-\frac{2 \tilde{\rho}}{r^{\ast}})           \left( d\theta^2 + \sin^2 \theta d\varphi^2 \right)~~,
r^{\ast} = \sqrt{r^2 + {\tilde{\rho}}^2} + \tilde{\rho}~~.
r_{\pm} = {\left[ (2 M^2 - \beta) \pm  \sqrt{(2 M^2 - \beta)^2 -    4 {Q_e}^2 {Q_m}^2}  \right] }^{1/2}~~,
\left.      +\frac{1}{2}\Delta^4\frac{\left[\left      (\sigma^2\right)'\right]^2}{\sigma^8} \right\}      +\frac{4}{r^4}\left(1-2\frac{\Delta^2}{\sigma^2}      +\frac{\Delta^4}{\sigma^4} \right)~~,
\tilde{r}_+ = \sqrt{4 M^2 - 2 {Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi_0}}~~,
\tilde{r}_+ = \sqrt{4 M^2 - 2 {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi_0}}~~,
r_0 = \sqrt{2 M^2 -({Q_e}^2 e^{2\phi_0} + {Q_m}^2 e^{-2\phi_0})}=          \sqrt{2 |Q_e||Q_m|}~~.
S = \frac{1}{4} ~(area) = \pi \left[ (2 M^2 - \beta) +    \sqrt{(2 M^2 - \beta)^2 - 4 {Q_e}^2 {Q_m}^2} \right]~~,
T_H = \frac{1}{4 \pi M} \left[ \frac{\sqrt{(2 M^2 - \beta)^2 -    4 {Q_e}^2{Q_m}^2}} {\sqrt{(2 M^2 - \beta)^2 -    4 {Q_e}^2 {Q_m}^2}+(2 M^2 - \beta)}\right]~~.
{\left( \frac{\partial T}{\partial M} \right)}_{Q_e,Q_m} \simeq    \frac{1}{2 \pi} \frac{1}{\sqrt{(2 M^2 - \beta)^2 -    4 {Q_e}^2 {Q_m}^2}}~~,

\A(\tau) = \beta^1\{\pt_1(\tau)\} + \beta^2\{\pt_2(\tau)\} +  \beta^3\{\pt_3(\tau)\}, \label{e:b26}
\epsilon(\tau) = \beta^1\{\lfrac{1}{2}\dot{\pt}_1+ik_0\pt_1\} +  \beta^2\{\lfrac{1}{2}\dot{\pt}_2+ik_0\pt_2\} + \beta^3\{\lfrac{1}{2}  \dot{\pt}_3+ik_0\pt_3\} + \beta^4\{i\}. \label{e:b27}
\tsL_j = \pt_j\partial_{\tau}+\lfrac{1}{2}\dot{\pt}_j(x\partial_x+y\partial_y) - \lfrac{i}{4}\ddot{\pt}_j(x^2+y^2) + \lfrac{1}{2}\dot{\pt}_j + ih_0\pt_j,  \label{e:b31}

Z_N(g) = \int d^N \phi   \exp \left[ -N \sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{g_k}{2k} (\phi^2)^k\right],   \label{eqn:vector_action}
\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{g_k}{k} x^k   + \log \left(\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{g_k}{g_1} x^{k-1}\right)   =   N \sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{\delta g_k}{k}    x^k.    \label{eqn:shift}
\frac{\partial}{\partial N}( -\log Z_{N} ( g ))         - \frac{1}{2} \log \frac{Ng_1}{2\pi}   =   \sum_{k=1}^{\infty}  \delta g_k \frac{\partial}{\partial  g_k} ( -\log Z_{N} ( g )).   \label{eqn:differential_equation}
Z_N(g_1,g_2,g_3,\ldots) = g_1^{-N/2} Z_N(1, g_2/g_1^2,g_3/g_1^3,\ldots). \label{rescalingid}
\tg_k = g_k / g_1^k.
F(N,\tg) = - \frac{1}{N} \log Z_N(g) - \frac{1}{2} \log \frac{Ng_1}{2\pi}.
\left.\frac{\partial}{\partial g_1}\right|_g =\left.\frac{\partial}{\partial g_1}\right|_{\tg}    - \sum_{k=2}^{\infty} k \frac{\tg_k}{g_1}                \left.   \frac{\partial}{\partial    \tg_k}\right|_{\tg}, \qquad  \left.\frac{\partial}{\partial g_k}\right|_g = \frac{1}{g_1^k} \left. \frac{\partial}{\partial \tg_k}\right|_{\tg} .

\begin{array}{lll} \omega_{1}&=&(1+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})^{1/2}(1+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})^{1/2}\;,\\    \omega_{2}&=&(f_{0}+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})^{1/2}(f_{0} +q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})^{1/2}\;,\\    \omega_{3}&=&-\bar{f}_{1}\;,\\    \omega_{4}&=&1+f_{0}+(Q-3)\bar{f}_{1}\;,\\ \omega_{5}&=&\frac{\textstyle (1+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})(1+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1}) (f_{0}+\bar{f}_{1})}{\textstyle f_{0}+\bar{f}_{1} +f_{0}\bar{f}_{1}+(Q-3)\bar{f}_{1}^{2}}\;,\\   \omega_{6}&=&\frac{\textstyle (f_{0}+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})(f_{0} +q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})(1+\bar{f}_{1})}{\textstyle f_{0}+\bar{f}_{1}+ f_{0}\bar{f}_{1}+(Q-3)\bar{f}_{1}^{2}}\;,\\   \omega_{7}&=&-\frac{\textstyle \bar{f}_{1}^{2}+(Q-3)f_{0}\bar{f}_{1} +f_{0}\bar{f}_{1}^{2}+\bar{f}_{1}^{3}} {\textstyle f_{0}+\bar{f}_{1}+f_{0}\bar{f}_{1}+(Q-3)\bar{f}_{1}^{2}} \end{array}
n=q^{2}\frac{(1+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})(f_{0}+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})} {(1+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})(f_{0}+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})}+q^{-2} \frac{(1+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})(f_{0}+q^{2}\bar{f}_{1})} {(1+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})(f_{0}+q^{-2}\bar{f}_{1})}\;.

<\phi\mid\psi>~=~\int\mbox{tr}_{V_{\rho}~\otimes~ W_{\lambda}}    (d\phi(\rho)R_{\rho\lambda}d\psi(\lambda)),    \label{4.7}

\Phi\phi(\lambda)~~=~ {}~\int\mbox{tr}_{V_{\lambda}}(d\phi(\rho)R_{\rho\lambda}). \label{4.9}
\phi~\otimes~\psi\rightarrow \Phi\phi\cdot\psi. \label{MULT}
\omega(X,Y)~=~(X~,~\partial Y) \label{5.1}
[f+\alpha\partial~,~g+\beta\partial]~=~[f~,~g]_{*}~+~\alpha\partial r(g)~-~\beta\partial r(f). \label{5.2}
\partial~-~\partial\cdot r^{2}~=~0. \label{5.3}
\omega_{\frak{d}}(a,b)~=~\ll a,\hat{\partial}b\gg. \label{5.4}
2\{\phi,\psi\}_{\tau}~=~\ll r_{\frak{d}}X,Y\gg~+~\ll^{\tau}r_{\frak d}X',Y'\gg . \label{5.7}

E^J_A(f)=\sum_K (-1)^{|K|+|J|}{K\choose J}D_{K-J}{{\partial f} \over{\partial\phi_A^{(K)}}}.\label{eq:he}
D_{f_A}=\sum_I {{\partial f}\over{\partial\phi_A^{(I)}}}D_I.  \label{eq:fr}
D_J(fg)=\sum_K {J \choose K}D_KfD_{J-K}g.\label{eq:leib}
\delta_H\phi_A=\sum I_{AB}{{\delta H} \over {\delta\phi_B}}.
\sum_{A,B}\sum_{|K|=1} \int_{\Omega}E^0_A(f)I^{(K)}_{AB}E^K_B(h)= \sum_{A,B}\sum_{|K|=1} \int_{\Omega}D_K\biggl( E^0_A(f)I^{(0)}_{AB}E^K_B(h)\biggr) .\label{eq:k1}
-\sum_{A,B}\sum_{\vert J \vert =1}\sum_{\vert K \vert =1} \int_{\Omega} D_J\biggl( E^J_A(h)I^{(K)}_{AB}E^K_B(f)\biggr) - \sum_{A,B}\sum_{\vert K \vert =2}\int_{\Omega} E^0_A(h)I^{(K)}_{AB} E^K_B(f) . \label{eq:k2}
\{ F,H\} =\sum\int_{\Omega}D_{J+K}\biggl( E^J_A(f)I_{AB} E^K_B(h)\biggr) .\label{eq:nul}
\{ F,G \} =\sum \int_{\Omega}\int_{\Omega}{{\partial f} \over {\partial\phi_A^{(J)}(x)}} {{\partial g} \over {\partial\phi_B^{(K)}(y)}}\{ D_J^{(x)} \phi_A(x),D_K^{(y)}\phi_B(y)\},\label{eq:gen}
\{ \phi_A(x),\phi_B(y)\}={1 \over 2}\sum_L \biggl( I_{AB}^L(x)D_L^{(x)}- I_{BA}^L(y)D_L^{(y)}\biggr) \delta (x-y),\label{eq:loc}
\int_{\Omega}\int_{\Omega} f(x)g(y)D_J^{(x)}D_K^{(y)}\delta (x-y),\label{eq:int}
\int_{\Omega}\int_{\Omega} f(x)g(y)D_J^{(x)}D_K^{(y)}\delta (x-y)= \int_{\Omega} D_KfD_Jg.\label{eq:r1}
{1 \over 2}\sum\int_{\Omega} D_{P+Q}\biggl( E^P_A(f)I^L_{AB}D_LE^Q_B(g) - (F \leftrightarrow G) \biggr) .\label{eq:nloc}
\delta F=\sum\int{{\delta F} \over{\delta\phi_A}}\delta\phi_A,
{{\delta F} \over {\delta\phi_A}}=\sum (-1)^{|J|}E^J_A(f)D_J\theta_ {\Omega},\label{eq:varfull}
\{ F,G \} =\sum\int\int {{\delta F} \over {\delta\phi_A(x)}}\{ \phi_A(x),\phi_B(y) \} {{\delta G} \over {\delta\phi_B(y)}},\label{eq:nbvar}
\sum_M(-1)^{|M|}{L \choose M}{M \choose N}=(-1)^{|L|}\delta_{L,N},
\{ F,G\} =\sum\int_{\Omega}Tr(D_{f_A}I_{AB}D_{g_B}), \label{eq:nulc}
\times D_{M+K+L-I} \biggl( E^K_C(f)E^L_D(g)\biggr) +D_{M+K+L-I}I_{CD}E^M_A\biggl( E^K_C(f)E^L_D(g)\biggr)\biggr] \Biggr). \label{eq:ul1}
\sum\int_{\Omega}D_{J+K+L}\Biggl( I_{AB} {{\partial I_{CD}} \over {\partial \phi_A}}E^K_C(f)E^L_D(g)E^J_B(h)\Biggr) . \label{eq:ul2}
I_{AB}{{\partial I_{CD}} \over {\partial \phi_A}}+ I_{AD}{{\partial I_{BC}} \over {\partial \phi_A}}+ I_{AC}{{\partial I_{DB}} \over {\partial \phi_A}}=0.\label{eq:ul3}
\times D_{S+U+T+N+K}{{\partial^2f} \over {\partial \phi_A^{(U)} \partial \phi_C^{(T)}}}\Biggl( D_RE^J_B(h)D_{J+M-R-S}E^M_D(g) -(H \leftrightarrow G)\Biggr) .\label{eq:fin}

\omega_{1}={\cal P}(\hat{a},\ldots,\hat{c}^{-1})\omega_{0},                                                         \label {an1}
\hat{a}{\cal P}=\frac{1}{q^2}{\cal P}\hat{a}- \frac{\mu}{q^3}\hat{a}~~,~~ \hat{b}{\cal P}=\frac{1}{q^2}{\cal P}\hat{b}- \frac{\mu}{q^3}\hat{d}\hat{c}^{-1}\hat{a},                                                                  \label {pol}

\begin{array}{ll} \partial a= 0, & \partial b=-\frac{1}{q^3}c^{-1}D\omega_{0}, \\ \partial c=0, & \partial d=-\frac{1}{q^3}d(bc)^{-1}D\omega_{0}. \end{array}                                                          \label{rell}

(\partial d)^{*}= -q^2(D^{-1})\left((q^2ad-D) (\partial a)-qab(\partial c)-qac(\partial b)+a^2(\partial d)\right),                                                                \label{i2}
(\partial b)^{*}= -q^2(D^{-1})\left(-q^3cd (\partial a)+qad(\partial c)+q^2c^2(\partial b)-ac(\partial d)\right),                                                                \label{i3}
(\partial c)^{*}= -q^2(D^{-1})\left(-q^2db(\partial a) +b^2(\partial c)+\frac{1}{q}ad(\partial b)-\frac{1}{q}ba(\partial d)\right).                                                                \label{i4}

S = \int d^{4}x \sqrt{-g}               \left[               \bar{\psi}i\gamma^{\mu}(x)\nabla_{\mu}\psi               +\frac{\lambda}{2\mbox{N}}                     \left\{                     (\bar{\psi}\psi)^{2}+(\bar{\psi}i\gamma_{5}\psi)^{2}                     \right\}               \right]\: ,
S = \int d^{4}x\sqrt{-g}\left[\bar{\psi}i\gamma^{\mu}(x)                      \nabla_{\mu} \psi                     -\frac{N}{2\lambda}(\sigma^{2}+\pi^{2})                     - \bar{\psi}(\sigma+i\gamma_{5}\pi)\psi                     \right]\: .
Z[\eta, \bar{\eta}] = \int D\psi D\bar{\psi} D\sigma D\pi \exp               \left\{               iS+i\bar{\eta}\psi+i\bar{\psi}\eta               \right\}\: ,
Z[0,0] = \int D\sigma D\pi \exp \{i \mbox{N} S_{eff}\}\: ,
S_{eff} = \int d^{4}x \sqrt{-g}                       \left\{                       -\frac{1}{2\lambda}(\sigma^{2}+\pi^{2})                       \right\}               -i\ln \mbox{Det}                       \left\{                       i\gamma^{\mu}(x)\nabla_{\mu}                       -(\sigma+i\gamma_{5}\pi)                       \right\} \: .
\Gamma[\sigma, \pi] = S_{eff}[\sigma, \pi] + \mbox{O}(1/\mbox{N})\: .
V(\sigma, \pi) = \frac{1}{2\lambda}(\sigma^{2}+\pi^{2})                       +i\mbox{Tr}\ln                       \langle x |\{                       i\gamma^{\mu}(x)\nabla_{\mu}                       -(\sigma+i\gamma_{5}\pi)\}                       |x \rangle \: .

Det (\sum_{\mu} \sigma^{\mu} P^{\mu}_{ij}) ~=~Det (- \sum_{\mu} (P^{\mu})^2 )~~, \label{fdet}

H_{+}=-{d^2\over{dx^2}}+V_{+}(x)
\label{factorization} H_{+}=A^{\dagger}A,
A=-{d\over{dx}}+f(x).
f^2+f'=V_{+}.
H_{-}=-{d^2\over{dx^2}}+V_{-}(x)=AA^{\dagger}.
A^{\dagger}A\psi_{+}=E_{+}\psi_{+}.
AA^{\dagger}[A\psi_{+}]=E_{+}[A\psi_{+}].
0=\langle\psi_{-}|\psi_{-}\rangle=\langle A\psi_{+}|A\psi_{+}\rangle 	=\langle\psi_{+}|A^{\dagger}A\psi_{+}\rangle=E_{+}\langle\psi_{+}| 	\psi_{+}\rangle,
f^2-f'=V_{-},
V_{+}=f^2+f'.
f^2-f'=\kappa^2.
\label{f} f=-\kappa\tanh\kappa(x-x_{0}),
V_{+}=\kappa^2\biggl{[} 1-2{\rm sech}^2 \kappa(x-x_{0}) \biggr{]},

\label{Seqn} \psi_{xx}+[k^2+u(x)]\psi=0.

\label{Tseries} \log T(k)= 	\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} {1\over{(2ik)^n}}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f_n(x)\,dx 	=\sum_{i=1}^{N}\biggl{[}\log(ik-\kappa_i)-\log(ik+\kappa_i)\biggr{]}.

\label{ev1}  \biggl{(}\pdrv{}{x}-2f\biggl{)} \biggl{(} f_t - \frac{1}{4}\pdrv{}{x} 	\sum_{l=0}^{k} (-1)^{l+1} k^{2l}\vdrv{H_{2(k-l)-1}}{f}  \biggr{)}=0.

f_m=-w_m'/w_m,

\label{tau} \tau_n= \prod_{m=1}^{n} w_m.
\label{ham} H_m= A_m^{\dagger}A_m - \kappa_m^2 = A_{m+1}A_{m+1}^{\dagger} - \kappa_{m+1}^2.

\label{tau0} \tau_{0}(x)=1,
\label{tau1} \tau_{1}(x)= a_1^+ e^{\kappa_1 x} + a_1^- e^{-\kappa_1 x},
\label{susytau} \tau_n (x)= \prod_{m=1}^{n} \biggl{(}\biggl{[}\sum_{s_m = \pm} 	a_{m}^{s_m} e^{s_m \kappa_m x}\biggr{]} 	\prod_{l=1}^{m-1} \bigl{[}s_m \kappa_m - s_l \kappa_l\bigr{]} 	\biggl{)}.

\phi(r)^2\frac{d}{dr}\left(\frac{u(r)}{\phi(r)}\right) = \phi(r)u^\prime(r) -u(r)\phi^\prime(r) = \int_0^r V(r^\prime) \phi(r^\prime)u(r^\prime) dr^\prime  .\label{eq:wron}

[\: A,BC \:] = [\: A,B \:] \, C + B \, [\: A,C \:],

\chi_{\rm P} = \frac{\partial M}{\partial B} =  - \frac{e^2}{8 \pi |m|},                                                       \label{chi}
\mbox{$\cal L$}_{{\rm eff}}= \frac{|eB |}{2\pi } \frac{1}{2} \sum_n |E_{n}|,
\sqrt{a} = -\int_0^{\infty} \frac{d \tau}{(\pi \tau)^{1/2}} \frac{d}{d \tau} \exp(-a\tau).                                           \label{sq}
\mbox{$\cal L$}_{\rm eff} = - \frac{1}{8\pi^{3/2}} \int_0^{\infty} \frac{d \tau}{\tau^{3/2}} {\rm e}^{-m^2\tau}\left(|eB| \frac{{\rm cosh}(2eB \sigma \tau)}{{\rm sinh}(|eB|\tau)} - \frac{1}{\tau}\right).                                                           \label{eff}
{\cal L}_{{\rm eff},2} = {1 \over 2} \chi B^2,
\chi = (-1)^{2 \sigma} \frac{e^2}{8\pi |m|} \left[ (2\sigma)^2 - \frac{1}{3}\right] .                                    \label{chial}
\chi = (-1)^{2\sigma+1}  2 \mu_{\rm B}^2 \, \nu_{3D}(0) \left[(2\sigma)^2 - \frac{1}{3}\right],                                \label{chi3D}
\mbox{$\cal L$} =\Psi ^{\dagger}(i\partial _{0}+\mu -H_{{\rm P}})\Psi +       b \Psi ^{\dagger}\frac{\sigma ^{3}}{2}\Psi          \label{30}
H_{{\rm P}}=\frac{1}{2m}(i\mbox{\boldmath $\nabla$} +e\mbox{\boldmath $A$})^{2}- g_0 \mu_{\rm B} \frac{\sigma^3}{2} B + eA_{0},                              \label{31}
E_{n,\pm} = \frac{|eB|}{m} (n+{1 \over 2}) - \frac{eB}{m} S_\pm,                                                          \label{nrll}
E_{+n} \rightarrow {\rm const.} + \frac{|eB|}{m} (n+{1 \over 2}) - \frac{eB}{2m},
S_{{\rm eff}}=-i{\rm Tr}\ln(i\partial _{0}-H_{P}+\mu +\frac{b}{2}\sigma ^{3}),
\mbox{$\cal L$}_{{\rm eff}}=\frac{|eB |}{2\pi } \sum_{n=0}^{\infty } \int \frac{dk_{0}}{2 \pi i} \left[ \ln (k_{0}-E_{n,+}+\mu +\frac{b}{2})+ \ln (k_{0}-E_{n,-}+\mu -\frac{b}{2})\right].            \label{nreff}
\int \frac{dk_{0}}{2\pi i}\: \frac{e^{ik_{0}\delta }} {k_{0} +\xi +ik_{0}\delta } = \theta (\xi )               \label{37}
\rho = \frac{|eB|}{2\pi} (N_+ + N_-),                       \label{39}

\theta = {\rm  sgn}(eB) \frac{1}{2\pi} (N_+ + N_-).      \label{nrth}
s=\frac{eB }{4\pi}.                                       \label{41}
\chi_{\rm P} = \frac{\partial M}{\partial B} = \frac{e^2}{4 \pi m} = 2 \mu_{\rm B}^2 \, \nu_{2D}(0),                                  \label{textb}
\rho \rightarrow \frac{\mu m}{\pi } + \frac{|eB|}{2 \pi},
\mbox{$\cal L$}_{\rm eff} =  \frac{|eB|}{2 \pi} \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \sum_{\varsigma =\pm} (\mu - E_{n,\varsigma}) \theta(\mu - E_{n,\varsigma}).
\mbox{$\cal L$}_{\rm eff} = \frac{1}{4 \pi} \sum_{\varsigma =\pm} \left[ \mu_\varsigma^2 m - \frac{(eB)^2}{4 m} \right]               = \frac{\mu^2 m}{2 \pi} + \frac{(eB)^2}{8 \pi m} [(2\sigma)^2 -1],                                    \label{nr}
\frac{\mu^2 m}{2 \pi} = -2 \int \frac{d^2 k}{(2\pi)^2} \left( \frac{k^2}{2m} - \mu \right) \theta \left(\mu - \frac{k^2}{2m} \right).
\chi = (-1)^{2 \sigma +1}  2 \mu_{\rm B}^2 \, \nu_{2D}(0) \left[(2\sigma)^2 - 1)\right].                                            \label{nrchi}
\mbox{$\cal L$} =\Psi ^{\dagger}\left[ i\partial _{0} - e A_0 + \mu -\frac{1}{2m}(i\mbox{\boldmath $\nabla$} + e \mbox{\boldmath $A$})^{2} \right] \Psi +\frac{e}{m}B^{a}\Psi ^{\dagger }\frac{\sigma ^{a}}{2}\Psi.                                                              \label{43}
B^{a}(x)=B n^{a}(x),                                       \label{n}
\Psi (x)=S(x)\chi (x) \; ; \; \; S^{\dagger }S=1,
\mbox{\boldmath $\sigma$} \cdot  \mbox{\boldmath $n$}(x)= S(x)\sigma ^{3}S^{\dagger }(x).                                                         \label{46}

V_{\mu }=V_{\mu }^{a} \sigma ^{a}.

[ \: G , W \: ] = W . 			\label{eqn:2.1}
G \, | \alpha \ket = \alpha \, | \alpha \ket , 	\qquad 	\bra \alpha | \alpha \ket = 1 . 	\label{eqn:2.2}
| n + \alpha \ket := W^n \, | \alpha \ket , 	\quad 	( n = 0 , \pm 1 , \pm 2 , \cdots ) 	\label{eqn:2.4}
W \, | n + \alpha \ket = | n + 1 + \alpha \ket 	\label{eqn:2.7}
W \, | \xi \ket = \xi \, | \xi \ket . 	\label{eqn:2.8}
| \theta + 2 \pi \ket = | \theta \ket , 			\label{eqn:2.11}
\bra \theta | \theta' \ket 			= 2 \pi \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} 			\delta( \theta - \theta' + 2 \pi n) , 			\label{eqn:2.12}
\int_0^{2 \pi} \frac{\di \theta}{2 \pi} \, 			| \theta \ket \bra \theta | 			= \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} 			| n + \alpha \ket \bra n + \alpha | 			= 1_{\alpha} 			\quad ( \mbox{identity operator on } 			{\cal H}_{\alpha} ) , 			\label{eqn:2.13}
\exp(-\k \lambda G) \, | \theta \ket 			= \e^{-\sk \lambda \alpha} \, \kappa(\theta) \, 			\kappa^*(\theta + \lambda) \, | \theta + \lambda \ket . 			\label{eqn:2.14}
\psi(\theta) := \bra \theta | \psi \ket . 	\label{eqn:2.15}
\bra \theta | \exp(\k \lambda G) | \psi \ket 	= \e^{\sk \lambda \alpha} \, \kappa^*(\theta) \, 	\kappa(\theta + \lambda) \, \bra \theta + \lambda | \psi \ket . 	\label{eqn:2.16}
\bra \theta | \, G \, | \psi \ket 	= 	\left[ 	-\k \frac{\partial}{\partial\theta} 	- \k \kappa^*(\theta) \, 	\frac{\partial \kappa(\theta)}{\partial \theta} 	+ \alpha 	\right] 	\, \psi (\theta) . 	\label{eqn:2.17}
\bra \theta | \, W \, | \psi \ket 	= \e^{\sk\theta} \, \psi(\theta) . 	\label{eqn:2.18}
\bra \chi | \psi \ket = 	\int_0^{2 \pi} \frac{\di \theta}{2 \pi} \, 	\chi^*(\theta) \, \psi(\theta). 	\label{eqn:2.19}
A(\theta) := 	-\k \kappa^*(\theta) \, 	\frac{\partial \kappa(\theta)}{\partial \theta} 	+ \alpha , 	\label{eqn:2.20}
\kappa(\theta) = \omega(\theta) \, \kappa'(\theta) , 	\label{eqn:2.21}
| \theta \ket = \omega(\theta) \, | \theta \ket' , 	\label{eqn:2.22}
\psi'(\theta) = \omega(\theta) \, \psi(\theta). 	\label{eqn:2.23}
\k \omega'^* \, \frac{\partial \omega'}{\partial \theta} 	= \beta - \alpha . 	\label{eqn:2.28}
\omega'(\theta) = \exp \left[ -\k ( \beta - \alpha ) \theta \right]. 	\label{eqn:2.29}
H = \frac 12 \, G^{\: 2} 	\label{eqn:2.30}
H \, | n + \alpha \ket = \frac 12 ( n + \alpha )^2 | n + \alpha \ket . 	\label{eqn:2.31}
H = \frac 12 \, G^{\: 2} + V ( W, W^\dagger ) , 	\label{eqn:2.32}
S_{\mbox{\scriptsize eff}} := \int \di t 	\left[ 	\frac 12 \biggl( \frac{\di \theta}{\di t} \biggr)^2 	- V ( \theta ) - \alpha \frac{\di \theta}{\di t} 	\right] . 	\label{eqn:2.34}
K(\theta' , \theta ; t) = 	\e^{ -\sk \alpha (\theta' - \theta) } 	\sum_{n = -\infty}^{\infty} 	\e^{ -\sk \alpha 2 \pi n } 	\int_{\mbox{\scriptsize winding} \: n \: \mbox{\scriptsize times}} 	{\cal D} \theta 	\, \exp( \k S_0 ), 	\label{eqn:2.33a}
T(\lambda) := \exp( -\k \lambda G ). 	\label{eqn:2.38}
P \, T(\lambda) = T(-\lambda) \, P, 	\label{eqn:2.39}
P G = -G P , 	\label{eqn:2.40}
\mbox{(iv)} \qquad P^{\dagger} G P = -G. 	\label{eqn:2.41}
P^{\dagger} H P = H. 	\label{eqn:2.42}
P |n + \alpha \ket = c_{n + \alpha} |- n - \alpha \ket 	\label{eqn:2.44}
c_{n + \alpha} \, c_{- n - \alpha} = 1 . 	\label{eqn:2.45}
c_{n + \alpha} \, c^*_{n - 1 + \alpha} = 1, 	\label{eqn:2.47}
P |n + \alpha \ket = |- n - \alpha \ket. 	\label{eqn:2.48}
\kappa(\theta) = 	\left\{ 	\begin{array}{ll} 		\e^{-\sk \alpha \theta} 		& 		\qquad \mbox{for} \: \alpha = m , 		\\ 		\e^{-\sk (\alpha - \frac 12) \theta} 		& 		\qquad \mbox{for} \: \alpha = m + \frac 12 	\end{array} 	\right. 	\label{eqn:2.53}
| \theta \ket_{\alpha} = 	\kappa_{\alpha} (\theta) 	\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} \e^{-\sk n \theta} | n + \alpha \ket . 	\label{eqn:2.55}
P | \theta \ket_{\alpha} = | -\theta \ket_{-\alpha} . 	\label{eqn:2.57}
\psi(\theta) \to 	P \psi(\theta) := 	\bra \theta | P | \psi \ket = 	\left\{ 	\begin{array}{ll} 		\psi(-\theta) 		& 		\qquad \mbox{for} \: \alpha = m , 		\\ 		\e^{-\sk \theta} \psi(-\theta) 		& 		\qquad \mbox{for} \: \alpha = m + \frac 12 . 	\end{array} 	\right. 	\label{eqn:2.58}
\psi(\theta) = 	\left( 	\begin{array}{l} 		\psi_+ (\theta) 		\\ 		\psi_- (\theta) 	\end{array} 	\right) 	:= 	\left( 	\begin{array}{l} 		{}_{\alpha}\bra \theta | \psi \ket 		\\ 		{}_{-\alpha}\bra \theta | \psi \ket 	\end{array} 	\right) 	\to 	P \psi(\theta) = 	\left( 	\begin{array}{l} 		\psi_- (-\theta) 		\\ 		\psi_+ (-\theta) 	\end{array} 	\right) 	. 	\label{eqn:2.59}
\bra A \ket := \bra \psi | A | \psi \ket . 	\label{eqn:3.1}
\Delta A := A - \bra A \ket . 	\label{eqn:3.2}
\bra \Delta A^2 \ket = 	\bra A^2 \ket - \bra A \ket^2 . 	\label{eqn:3.3}
\bra \Delta A^2 \ket \: \bra \Delta B^2 \ket 	\geq \frac 14 \, | \bra \, [\, A , B \,] \, \ket |^2 . 	\label{eqn:3.4}
( \bra \alpha | + \lambda^* \bra \beta | ) 	\cdot 	( | \alpha \ket + \lambda   | \beta \ket ) \geq 0 . 	\label{eqn:3.5}
| \alpha \ket + \lambda | \beta \ket = 0 . 	\label{eqn:3.6}
\lambda = 	- \, \frac{ \bra \beta | \alpha \ket }{ \bra \beta | \beta \ket }. 	\label{eqn:3.7}
\bra \alpha | \alpha \ket \: \bra \beta | \beta \ket 	\geq 	| \bra \alpha | \beta \ket |^2 , 	\label{eqn:3.8}
| \alpha \ket = \Delta A | \psi \ket , \qquad 	| \beta  \ket = \Delta B | \psi \ket , 	\label{eqn:3.9}
\bra \Delta A^2 \ket \: \bra \Delta B^2 \ket 	\geq 	| \bra \Delta A \, \Delta B \ket |^2 . 	\label{eqn:3.10}
| \bra \Delta A \, \Delta B \ket |^2 	= 	\frac 14 \, | \bra \, \{ \Delta A , \Delta B  \} \, \ket |^2 + 	\frac 14 \, | \bra \, [\,       A ,        B \,] \, \ket |^2  . 	\label{eqn:3.12}
\bra \psi | \{ \Delta A , \Delta B \} | \psi \ket 	= 	- ( \lambda + \lambda^* ) \, 	\bra \psi | \Delta B^2 | \psi \ket . 	\label{eqn:3.13}
( \Delta A + \lambda \Delta B ) | \psi \ket = 0 	\label{eqn:3.14}
| \alpha \ket = \Delta G | \psi \ket , \qquad 	| \beta  \ket = \Delta W | \psi \ket , 	\label{eqn:3.15}
\bra \Delta G^{\: 2} \ket \: \bra \Delta W^\dagger \Delta W \ket 	\geq 	| \bra \Delta G \, \Delta W \ket |^2 . 	\label{eqn:3.16}
\Bigl( G - \bra G \ket \Bigr) | \psi \ket 	= - \lambda \Bigl( W - \bra W \ket \Bigr) | \psi \ket . 	\label{eqn:3.17}
\Bigl(-\k \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta} + \alpha 	- \bra G \ket \Bigr) 	\psi (\theta) 	= 	- \lambda \Bigl( \e^{\sk \theta} - \bra W \ket \Bigr) 	\psi (\theta), 	\label{eqn:3.18}
\psi (\theta) 	= N \exp 	\left[ 	- \lambda \e^{\sk \theta} 	+ \k\Bigl( - \alpha + \bra G \ket + \lambda \bra W \ket \Bigr) \theta 	\right] . 	\label{eqn:3.19}
\nu := - \alpha + \bra G \ket + \lambda \bra W \ket 	\label{eqn:3.20}
\lambda = - \beta \, \e^{-\sk \varphi} , 	\label{eqn:3.21}
\psi (\theta) 	= N \exp 	\left[ 	\beta \, \e^{\sk ( \theta - \varphi ) } 	+ \k \nu \theta 	\right] . 	\label{eqn:3.22}
| \psi (\theta) |^2 	= | N |^2 \exp \left[ 2 \beta \cos ( \theta - \varphi ) \right] 	\label{eqn:3.23}
\rho = \frac{ I_1 (2 \beta) }{ I_0 (2 \beta) }. 	\label{eqn:3.26}
\bra \Delta G^{\: 2} \ket \: \bra \Delta W^\dagger \Delta W \ket 	= 	\beta^2 ( 1 - \rho^2 )^2 . 	\label{eqn:3.31}
\frac{ I_1(z) }{ I_0(z) } 	\approx 	1 - \frac{1}{ 2z }. 	\label{eqn:3.36}
\rho 	= 	\frac{ I_1 (2 \beta) }{ I_0 (2 \beta) } 	\approx 	1 - \frac 1{ 4 \beta }, 	\label{eqn:3.37}
1 - \rho^2 	= 	( 1 + \rho ) ( 1 - \rho ) 	\approx 	2 \cdot \frac 1{ 4 \beta } 	= 	\frac 1{ 2 \beta }. 	\label{eqn:3.38}
\bra \Delta W^\dagger \Delta W \ket \: 	\bra \Delta G^{\: 2} \ket 	\approx 	\frac 14. 	\label{eqn:3.41}
N = \frac 1{ \sqrt{ I_0(2\beta) }} \, \e^{-\sk \nu \varphi}. 	\label{eqn:3.42}
\psi (\theta) 	= 	\frac 1{ \sqrt{ I_0(2\beta) }} \, 	\exp 	\left[ 	\beta \, \e^{\sk ( \theta - \varphi ) } 	+ \k ( \bra G \ket - \alpha - \beta \rho ) ( \theta - \varphi ) 	\right] . 	\label{eqn:3.43}
| \psi (\theta) |^2 	\: \frac{ \di \theta }{ 2 \pi } 	= 	| \Psi (x) |^2 	\, \di x , 	\label{eqn:3.45}
I_n (z) 	\approx 	\frac 1{\sqrt{2 \pi z}} \: \e^z 	\qquad ( z \gg n, 1 ), 	\label{eqn:3.47}
\frac{ \beta }{ r^2 } = \frac 1{ 2 d^2 } = \mbox{const} , 	\label{eqn:3.49}
\Psi(x) 	= 	\left( \frac 1{ 2 \pi d^2 } \right)^{\frac 14} 	\exp 	\left[ 	- \frac 1{ 4 d^2 } ( x - \bra x \ket )^2 	+ \k \bra p \ket    ( x - \bra x \ket ) 	\right] , 	\label{eqn:3.50}
- \frac{ \di^2 u }{ \di x^2} = \lambda u 	\label{eqn:4.1}
u(x) = 	-\lambda 	\int_0^x \di s \, 	\int_0^s \di t \, u(t) 	+ c_1 x + c_2 . 	\label{eqn:4.3}
u(x) = 	- \lambda \int_0^x \di t \, (x - t) u(t) + c_1 x. 	\label{eqn:4.5}
c_1 = 	\lambda \int_0^1 \di t \, (1 - t) u(t) . 	\label{eqn:4.6}
Q(x,t) := 	\left\{ 	\begin{array}{ll} 		t (1-x) & \qquad \mbox{when  } 0 \le t \le x, \\ 		x (1-t) & \qquad \mbox{when  } x \le t \le 1, \\ 	\end{array} 	\right. 	\label{eqn:4.8}
\hat{Q} u(x) := 	\int_0^1 \di t \, Q(x,t) u(t) = \frac 1{\lambda} u(x), 	\label{eqn:4.9}
[\: x_j , x_k \:] = [\: p_j , p_k \:] = 0, 	\qquad 	[\: x_j , p_k \:] = \k \delta_{jk}. 	\label{eqn:4.10}
C := \frac 12 ( W + W^{\dagger} ), 	\qquad 	S := \frac 1{2 \, \k} \, ( W - W^{\dagger} ), 	\label{eqn:4.11}
C^2 + S^2 = 1. 	\label{eqn:4.15}

Q_\alpha ( a, x ) 	:= s_\alpha (x)^{-1} \cdot a \cdot s_\alpha ( a^{-1} x ). 	\label{eqn:2.54}

\widetilde{s}_\alpha ( x )^{-1} \circ \lambda_a \circ 	\widetilde{s}_\alpha ( a^{-1} x ) 	= \sigma( Q_\alpha( a, x ) ). 	\label{eqn:2.57}
\psi_\alpha : U_\alpha \to \bm{C}^n, \qquad 	x \mapsto ( \widetilde{s}_\alpha (x)^{-1} \circ \psi ) (x) 	\label{eqn:2.58}
( \rho(a) \psi )_\alpha (x) 	= \sigma( Q_\alpha ( a, x ) ) \, \psi_\alpha (a^{-1} x). 	\label{eqn:2.59}
t_{\alpha \beta} : U_\alpha \cap U_\beta \to H, \qquad 	x \mapsto s_\alpha(x)^{-1} \cdot s_\beta(x), 	\label{eqn:2.60}
\k \frac{\di \psi}{\di t} = H \psi 	\label{eqn:2.63}
H := \frac 12 \, \sum_{i=1}^f \rho( X_i )^\dagger \, \rho( X_i ), 	\label{eqn:2.64}
A^L ( u ) := L_{u*} \, A , \qquad 	A^R ( u ) := R_{u*} \, A , \qquad 	u \in G , 	\label{eqn:2.65}
\Delta_G 	= \sum_{i=1}^f ( X_i^L )^2 	= \sum_{i=1}^f ( X_i^R )^2 , 	\label{eqn:2.66}
\cs := \sum_{i=1}^p \sigma( S_i )^2 . 	\label{eqn:2.70}
\Delta^\# \psi^\# := \sum_{j=1}^q ( T_j^L )^2 \, \psi^\#, 	\label{eqn:2.71}
\Delta^\# \psi^\# ( u ) 	= \sum_{j=1}^q 	\frac{ \di^2 }{ \di \xi^2 } 	\psi^\# ( u \cdot \e^{ \xi T_j } ) \Bigr|_{ \xi=0 }, 	\label{eqn:2.72}
( \Delta \psi)_\alpha ( x ) 	:= ( \Delta^\# \psi^\# ) ( s_\alpha ( x ) ) 	= \sum_{j=1}^q 	\frac{ \di^2 }{ \di \xi^2 } 	\psi^\# ( s_\alpha( x ) 	\cdot \e^{ \xi T_j } ) \Bigr|_{ \xi=0 }. 	\label{eqn:2.73}
\theta ( \widetilde{Y}_j ( \xi ) ) 	= ( \widetilde{\gamma}_j ( \xi ) )^{-1} \, \widetilde{Y}_j ( \xi ) 	= T_j \in \hp , 	\label{eqn:2.75}
h_j ( \xi ) := 	( \widetilde{\gamma}_j (\xi) )^{-1} \cdot s_\alpha( \gamma_j (\xi) ), 	\label{eqn:2.76}
s_\alpha( \gamma_j (\xi) )^{-1} \, 	\frac{\di}{\di \xi} s_\alpha( \gamma_j (\xi) ) 	= 	h_j^{-1} T_j h_j + h_j^{-1} \frac{ \di h_j }{ \di \xi }, 	\label{eqn:2.78}
\omega( s_{\alpha *} Y_j (\xi) ) 	= h_j(\xi)^{-1} \frac{ \di h_j }{ \di \xi }. 	\label{eqn:2.79}
\frac{ \di h_j }{ \di \xi } 	= h_j(\xi) \, \omega_\alpha ( Y_j (\xi) ). 	\label{eqn:2.80}
\frac{\di^2}{\di \xi^2} \, 	\psi^\# ( s_\alpha( x ) \cdot \e^{ \xi T_j } ) 	\Bigr|_{\xi=0} 	= 	\left( 	\frac{\di}{\di \xi} 	+ ( \sigma \circ \omega_\alpha \circ Y_j ) (\xi) 	\right)^2 	\psi_\alpha ( \gamma_j(\xi) ) 	\Bigr|_{\xi=0}. 	\label{eqn:2.82}
( \Delta \psi)_\alpha ( x ) 	= \sum_{j=1}^q 	\left( 	\frac{\di}{\di \xi} 	+ ( \sigma \circ \omega_\alpha \circ Y_j ) (\xi) 	\right)^2 	\psi_\alpha ( \gamma_j(\xi) ) 	\Bigr|_{\xi=0}. 	\label{eqn:2.83}
( x^1 )^2 + \cdots + ( x^{n+1} )^2 = r^2 = \mbox{const} 	\qquad ( r > 0 ). 	\label{eqn:3.1}

\vec b^{\,\prime}(v+2\pi)=\vec b^{\,\prime}(v). \label{eq:blim}

\vec b(v)\equiv\vec b_p(v)-\vec k v/2\pi, \label{eq:bp}

{\hat u}_N(s) =\vec Z + \sum_{n=1}^N   (\vec A_n \cos{ns} + \vec B_n \sin{ns}), \label{eq:Fourier}
\sum_{n=m-N}^N (\vec \alpha_n \cdot \vec \alpha_{m-n}   -\vec \beta_n \cdot \vec \beta_{m-n})=4\delta_{m0},    \quad m=0,1,\dots,2N, \label{eq:FourCond1}
\sum_{n=m-N}^N (\vec \alpha_n \cdot \vec \beta_{m-n}   +\vec \beta_n \cdot \vec \alpha_{m-n})=0,    \quad m=1,\dots,2N. \label{FourCond2}
\vec \alpha_n = \vec \alpha_{-n} = \vec A_n,   \quad \vec \beta_n = -\vec \beta_{-n} = \vec B_n,   \qquad  n \not= 0, \label{eq:AB}

\rho_1=R_y(-\phi_1). \label{eq:rho1}
r_N=\left\{ \begin{array}{ll} R_z(\alpha) R_x(\beta)   R_z(\gamma), & N \geq 1,\\   R_z(\alpha) R_x(\beta), & N=0.   \end{array}\right. \label{eq:rn}

\Omega (\ca{K}) = \Omega _0\oplus\Omega _1\oplus\ldots\oplus\Omega _D=\bigoplus_{p=0}^D\Omega _p,

\cdot \; : \Omega ^\rho _i\times\Omega ^\sigma _i\longrightarrow \Omega_i ^{(\rho +\sigma)}\\
\star\; : \left\{\begin{array}{c} \Omega ^\rho _i\times\Omega ^\sigma _i\longrightarrow \Omega_i ^{(\rho -\sigma)}\\ (\chi ^{(\rho )},\chi^{(\sigma )})\longmapsto \chi ^{(\rho)}\star\chi^{(\sigma )}, \end{array}\right.

\Delta^R x(t)\equiv \frac{1}{\tau}[x(t+\tau)-x(t)],

t \longrightarrow t+\tau.
\Delta^R \Delta^L x(t) = -\frac{\partial V[x(t)]}{\partial x(t)}     \label{equation}
\frac{1}{\tau^2} \{x(t+\tau)-2x(t)+x(t-\tau)\}=-\frac{\partial     V[x(t)]}{\partial x(t)}.

x(t) = \frac{1}{2}\{x(t+\tau)+x(t)\}-\frac{1}{2}\{x(t+\tau)-x(t)\}.
\frac{\partial x(t)}{\partial \Delta^R x(t)}=-\frac{\tau}{2}.

H=\frac{1}{2}[\Delta^R x(t)]^2+\frac{1}{n}\Lambda x^n(t)+\frac{1}{2} \Lambda x^{n-1}(t)\{x(t+\tau)-x(t)\}.
\Delta^L H\neq 0.

i \dot \psi + \psi'' - 2\kappa |\psi|^2 \psi = 0. \label{2.1}
i \dot {\mbar \psi} - \mbar \psi'' + 2 \kappa |\psi|^2 \mbar \psi = 0. \label{2.2}
L = \int dx\, \left(\frac{i}{2} (\mbar \psi \dot \psi - \dot {\mbar \psi} \psi) - |\psi'|^2 - \kappa |\psi|^4 \right). \label{2.4}
\{\psi(x),\, \mbar \psi(x')\} = -i\delta(x - x'). \label{2.5}
\Omega = i \int dx\, d\mbar \psi \wedge d\psi. \label{2.6}
H = \int dx\, (|\psi'|^2 + \kappa |\psi|^4). \label{2.7}
i\dot q + q'' - 2 \kappa r q^2 = 0, \qquad i\dot r - r'' + 2 \kappa q r^2 = 0. \label{2.13}
{\cal L} = \frac{i}{2} (r \dot q - \dot r q) - q'r' - \kappa q^2 r^2. \label{2.14}
L = \frac{1}{2} \int dx\, ({\cal L} + \mbar{\cal L}), \label{2.15}
\Omega = \frac{i}{2} \int dx\, (dr \wedge dq - d\mbar r \wedge d\mbar q), \label{2.16}
\{q(x), r(x')\} = -2i \delta(x - x'), \qquad \{\mbar q(x), \mbar r(x')\} = 2i \delta(x - x'). \label{2.17}
H = \frac{1}{2} \int dx\, ({\cal H} + \mbar {\cal H}), \label{2.18}
{\cal H} = r'q' + \kappa r^2 q^2. \label{2.19}
r = \mbar q, \qquad \mbar r = q. \label{2.20}
Q = \frac{1}{\kappa r}, \qquad R = \kappa r^2 q - r'' + \frac{r'^2}{r}. \label{2.21}
\Omega = d \Theta,  \label{2.22}
\Theta = \frac{i}{2} \int dx\, (r dq - \mbar r d\mbar q). \label{2.23}
\frac{i}{2} \int dx\, (r dq - \mbar r d \mbar q) = \frac{i}{2} \int dx\, (R dQ - \mbar R d \mbar Q) + dF, \label{2.24}
dF = \int dx\, \left( \frac{\delta F}{\delta q} dq + \frac{\delta F}{\delta Q} dQ + \frac{\delta F}{\delta \mbar q} d \mbar q + \frac{\delta F}{\delta \mbar Q} d \mbar Q \right), \label{2.25}
r = - 2i \frac{\delta F}{\delta q}, \qquad R = 2i \frac{\delta F}{\delta Q}. \label{2.26}
r = \frac{1}{\kappa Q}, \qquad R = \frac{1}{\kappa Q^2} \left(q + Q'' - \frac{Q'^2}{Q} \right). \label{2.27}
F = \frac{1}{2} \int dx\, ({\cal F} + \mbar {\cal F}), \label{2.28}
{\cal F} = \frac{i}{\kappa} \left( \frac{q}{Q} + \frac{1}{2} \frac{Q'^2}{Q^2} \right). \label{2.29}
{\cal H}(Q,R) = {\cal H}(q,r) + \left(-2 q r' + \frac{r'' r'}{\kappa r^2} - \frac{2}{3} \frac{r'^3}{\kappa r^3}\right)'. \label{2.30}

i \dot \psi + \psi'' - 2i \kappa |\psi|^2 \psi' = 0. \label{3.1}
i \dot q + q'' - 2i \kappa (rq) q' = 0, \qquad i \dot r - r'' - 2i \kappa (rq) r' = 0. \label{3.2}
L = \frac{1}{2} \int dx\, ({\cal L} + \mbar{\cal L}), \label{3.3}
{\cal L} = \frac{i}{2} (r\dot q - \dot r q) - r'q' - \frac{i\kappa}{2} (r^2 qq' - q^2 rr'). \label{3.4}
{\cal H} = q'r' + \frac{i\kappa}{2}(r^2 qq' - q^2 rr'). \label{3.5}
Q = \frac{1}{\kappa r}, \qquad R = \kappa r^2 q + i \left(r' - \frac{r''r}{r'}\right). \label{3.6}
r = \frac{1}{\kappa Q}, \qquad R = \frac{1}{\kappa Q^2} \left[q + i \left(Q' - \frac{Q''Q}{Q'}\right)\right], \label{3.7}

\alpha = \frac{J_2 - J_1}{4}, \qquad \beta = \frac{J_3}{2}, \qquad \gamma = \frac{J_1 + J_2}{2} - J_3. \label{8.4}
i \dot \psi + \psi'' - \frac{2 \mbar \psi \psi'^2 - 2 \alpha \psi^3 + \gamma \mbar \psi \psi^2 - \gamma \psi + 2 \alpha \mbar \psi}{1 + |\psi|^2} = 0. \label{8.5}
\rho(x) = \alpha x^4 + \gamma x^2 + \alpha, \label{8.6}
i \dot \psi + \psi'' - \frac{2 \mbar \psi (\psi'^2 + \rho(\psi))}{1 + |\psi|^2} + \frac{1}{2}\rho'(\psi) = 0. \label{8.7}
{\cal H} = \frac{2 (r'q' + \alpha(r^2 + q^2) - \gamma rq)}{(1 + rq)^2}. \label{8.10}

\langle i_1 ...  i_n | k_1 ...  k_n \rangle := N^{i_1i_2 	  ...  i_n}_{k_1k_2 ...  k_n} \left( n,q \right) = N^{i}_{k}\left( 	  n,q \right)
-1 \le q = \cos \theta \le 1
a^*_{1} a^*_{2} - a^*_{2} a^*_{1} = 0
a^*_{1} a^*_{2} + a^*_{2} a^*_{1} = 0
\epsilon_{j_1 j_2 ..  j_n} (q) = N^{12 ...  n}_{j_1j_2 ... 	 j_n}(-q)
\epsilon_{ij} = \left( \begin{array}{ll} 0 & 1 \\ -q & 0 	 \end{array}\right).
\epsilon_{\alpha j_2 j_3 j_4 ...  j_n} \epsilon_{j_2 j_3 	j_4 ...  j_n \beta} = (-q)^{n-1}[n-1]_{q^2}!\delta^{\alpha}_{\beta}
\epsilon_{ i ...  j k ...  n} = -q^{-1} \epsilon_{ i ...  k 	j ...  n} \mbox{\quad if \quad}j < k
a_{i_1j_1} a_{i_2j_2} ...  a_{i_nj_n} \epsilon_{i_1 i_2 ... 	i_n} = \epsilon_{j_1 j_2 ...  j_n}
a_{j_1i_1} a_{j_2i_2} ...  a_{j_ni_n} \epsilon_{i_1 i_2 ... 	i_n} = \epsilon_{j_1 j_2 ...  j_n}
a_{i_1j_2}a_{i_2j_2}\epsilon_{i_1i_2} = \epsilon_{j_1j_2}
\sum\limits_{m_1...  m_{n-2} r s} \epsilon_{m_1 ... 	m_{n-2} r s}a_{i_1m_1} ...  a_{i_{n-2}m_{n-2}}a_{jr}a_{ks} = 	\epsilon_{i_1 ...  i_{n-2} j k}
\sum\limits_{m_1 ...  m_{n-2} r s} \epsilon_{m_1 ... 	m_{n-2} r s} a_{i_1m_1} ...  a_{i_{n-2}m_{n-2}}a_{kr}a_{js} = 	\epsilon_{i_1 ...  i_{n-2} k j}
\sum\limits_{r<s} \epsilon_{m_1 ...  m_{n-2} r s} 	\left(\left(a_{jr}a_{ks}-qa_{js}a_{kr}\right)+q^{-1} 	\left(a_{kr}a_{js}-qa_{ks}a_{jr}\right)\right)=0
\left(a_{jr}a_{ks}-qa_{js}a_{kr}\right)+q^{-1} 	\left(a_{kr}a_{js}-qa_{ks}a_{jr}\right)=0\mbox{\quad with \quad} 	r<s, j<k
a_{jr} a_{ks} - q a_{kr} a_{js} = a_{ks} a{jr} -q^{-1} 	a_{js} a_{kr}\mbox{\quad with \quad} r<s, j<k
a_{js} a_{kr} = a_{kr} a_{js}
\sum\limits_{m_1 ...  m_{n-2} r<s}a_{i_1m_1} ... 	a_{i_{n-2}m_{n-2}} \epsilon_{m_1 ...  m_{n-2} r 	s}\left(a_{kr}a_{ks}-qa_{ks}a_{kr}\right)=0
a_{kr} a_{ks} - q a_{ks} a_{kr} = 0
\xi^i \xi^j = -q^{-1} \xi^j \xi^i \mbox{\quad for \quad} i>j
\xi^i_1 \xi^i_2 ...  \xi^i_n = \epsilon_{i_1 i_2 ...  i_n} 		\xi^1 \xi^2 ...  \xi^n
det_q A = det_q\left(A^T\right)

C_{i_{1} i_{2} ...  i_{n}} = \sqrt{\frac{[r_1]_{q^2} 	!}{\left([r_1]_{q}!\right)^3} \cdot \frac{[r_2]_{q^2} 	!}{\left([r_2]_{q}!\right)^3}\cdot ...  \cdot\frac{[r_m]_{q^2} 	!}{\left([r_m]_{q}!\right)^3}}\mbox{\quad with \quad} m\le n

I[g,\Gamma ]=\int f(R) \sqrt{g}d^4x \label {3}

V_G(\bar{\f}_0,\O)\equiv\bra{\J_G}H_Q\ket{\J_G},      \label{g2}
V_G(\bar{\f}_0,\O)={1\over 4}\O-{1\over 2\bar{\b}^2}\left(\bar{\f}_0^{~2}+{1\over 2\O}\right)+{1\over 4\bar{\b}^4}\left(\bar{\f}_0^{~4}+{3\over 4\O^2}+{3\bar{\f}_0^{~2}\over\O}\right).             \label{g3}
\O^3+{\O\over\bar{\b}^2}\left(1-{3\over\bar{\b}^2} \bar{\f}_0^{~2}\right)-{3\over 2\bar{\b}^4}=0,      \label{g4}
V_G(\bar{\f}_0)=-{1\over 2\bar{\b}^2}\bar{\f}_0^{~2}+{1\over 4\bar{\b}^4}\bar{\f}_0^{~4}+{1\over 2}\O-{3\over 16\bar{\b}^4}{1\over\O^2}.                               \label{g5}

S = \int dt \left\{ \, P_{ax} \dot{X}^{ax} -     \left[ \frac{g^2}{2} \, X^{ax} X^{ax} +       \frac{1}{4g^{2}} \, ( \partial_{[a}P_{b]x} )^2 \right]                                 + \lambda_x X^{ax}_{,a} \right\}                                                    \label{action}

\stackrel{\sim}{\dot{X}^{a}} (\vec{q}) =    \sum_{\vec{n}} e^{i \vec{q} \cdot \vec{n} a}                                   \dot{X}^{a} (\vec{n}) \label{if}
\frac{1}{\nabla^2}              \dot{X}^{a} (\vec{n}) =      - \sum_{\vec{n}'} f(\vec{n} - \vec{n}')                          \dot{X}^{a} (\vec{n}')                                           \label{Xpunto}
f(\vec{n} - \vec{n} ') = \frac{a^{2}}{2 N^{3}}   \sum_{\vec{q}}    \frac{e^{-i \vec{q} \cdot (\vec{n}-\vec{n} ') a}}        {\sum_{i=1}^{3} \left[1 - cos(q_{i} a) \right]}

\int d^{3}x \, \dot{X}_{\gamma}^{ax}     \frac{1}{\nabla^{2}} \dot{X}_{\gamma}^{ax}        \longrightarrow \frac{a^{3}}{\tau^{2}}          \sum_{\vec{n}} \sum_{\vec{n}'}          f(\vec{n} - \vec{n}') X^{a}_{\gamma'-\gamma} (\vec{n})                                 X^{a}_{\gamma'-\gamma} (\vec{n}')
X^{v}_{\gamma}(\vec{n}) = \frac{1}{a^2} \sum_{\ell ' \in \gamma}                           \overline{\delta}_{\ell \ell '}
\overline{\delta}_{\ell {\ell '}}                = \left\{ \begin{array}{rl}                       1   & \mbox{for $\ell = \ell '$} \\                      -1   & \mbox{for $\ell = \overline{\ell '}$} \\                       0   & \mbox{otherwise}                         \end{array}                  \right.
\int d^{3}x \, X_{\gamma}^{ax} X_{\gamma}^{ax} \longrightarrow    \frac{1}{a} \sum_{\ell \in \gamma} \sum_{\ell ' \in \gamma}        \overline{\delta}_{\ell    \ell    '}     =     \frac{1}{a} \Lambda_{\gamma}                                                   \label{Lagr-2}

K_{\tau} = \frac{g^{2}_{\tau} a^{3}}{2  \tau} \;\;\; , \;\;\;                      K = \frac{g^2 \tau}{2a}
D(\gamma'-\gamma) = \sum_{\vec{n}} \sum_{\vec{n}'}         f(\vec{n} - \vec{n}')          X^{a}_{\gamma'-\gamma}(\vec{n})                  X^{a}_{\gamma'-\gamma}(\vec{n}')                                                 \label{D}

\hat{T} = e^{- \tau \hat{H}} \approx 1 - \tau \hat{H}                                             \label{T-H}
T (\gamma,\gamma) =   e^{-K   \Lambda_{\gamma}}   \approx   1   -   \tau   \hat{H} \mid_{\gamma,\gamma}                                                \label{T00}
T (\gamma \circ \Box,\gamma)  =   e^{-K_{\tau} D(\Box)} e^{-K \Lambda_{\gamma}}       \approx -\tau \hat{H} \mid_{\gamma \circ \Box,\gamma}                                                 \label{T10}
\hat{T} (\gamma \circ \stackrel{-}{\Box},\gamma)  =   e^{-K_{\tau} D(\Box)} e^{-K \Lambda_{\gamma}}     \approx     -\tau     \hat{H}      \mid_{\gamma      \circ \stackrel{-}{\Box},\gamma}                                                 \label{T10b}
D(\Box) = \frac{2  (N+1)^{3}}{3 a^{2} N^{3}}
D(\gamma'-\gamma) \approx m \ D(\Box) \label{aprox}
\label{area} D(\gamma'-\gamma) \approx L \label{aproxL}
T (\gamma',\gamma)  =   e^{-K_{\tau} D(\gamma'-\gamma)} e^{-K \Lambda_{\gamma}}   \approx  e^{-m K_{\tau} D(\Box)} e^{-K \Lambda_{\gamma}} = O(\tau^{m})                                                 \label{TLL}
K = \frac{\lambda}{a} \, \tau
{\hat H} = - \frac{1}{a} \sum_{\Box} \left( W(\Box) +             W^{\dagger}(\Box) \right) + \frac{\lambda}{a} \, {\hat E}                                      \label{H}
 m \frac{d^2 x^i }{dt^2} = E^i(t,x) + \epsilon^{ijk} \frac{dx_j}{dt} H_k (t,x),  \label{eqn:1.1}
 \nabla \cdot {\bf H} = 0 \qquad \nabla \times {\bf E} + \frac{\partial}{\partial t} {\bf H} =0,  \label{eqn:1.2}
m \: \ddot x^i = F^i (t,x,\dot x), \label{eqn:1.5}
 L = \frac{1}{2}m \delta_{ij} \dot x^i \dot x^j + \delta_{ij} \dot x^i A^j (t,x) + A_0 (t,x)  \label{eqn:1.6}
 H =\nabla \times {\bf A} \qquad {\bf E} = -\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial t} {\bf A} + \nabla A_0 \right).  \label{eqn:1.7}
m \: \ddot x^\mu = F^\mu (x,\dot x), \label{eqn:1.10}
m \ddot x^\mu = F^\mu(x,\dot x) = G^\mu(x) + F^\mu_{\;\;\;\nu}(x) \, \dot x^\nu - m \Gamma^\mu_{\;\:\nu \rho} \, \dot x^\nu \, \dot x^\rho , \label{eqn:1.11}
 \Gamma_{\mu \nu \rho} = \frac12 ( \partial_\rho g_{\mu \nu}+\partial_\nu  g_{\mu \rho}- \partial_\mu  g_{\nu \rho}) \label{eqn:1.12} 
\partial_\mu F_{\nu \rho} + \partial_\nu F_{\rho \mu} + \partial_\rho F_{\mu \nu} =0. \label{eqn:1.13}
\partial_\mu G_\nu - \partial_\nu G_\mu = 0. \label{eqn:1.14}
 \dot x^\mu \dot x_\mu = (ds/d\tau)^2 = {\rm constant}  \label{eqn:1.15}
 \frac{d}{d\tau} [x^\mu (\tau) , \dot x^\mu (\tau) ] = [\dot x^\mu (\tau) , \dot x^\mu (\tau) ] + [x^\mu (\tau) , \ddot x^\mu (\tau) ]  \label{eqn:1.16}
 [ x^\mu , p_\nu ] = - i \hbar \, \delta^\mu \ _\nu  \label{eqn:1.17}
 m \ddot x^\mu = F^\mu (\tau,x,\dot x).  \label{eqn:2.3}
 [\dot x^\mu, q(x)] = {i\hbar \over m}{ \partial q  \over \partial x_\mu} . \label{eqn:2.4}
 m [\dot x^\mu, \dot x^\nu] + m [x^\mu , \ddot x^\nu ] = -i\hbar \partial_\rho g^{\mu\nu} (x)\dot x^\rho \label{eqn:2.5}
 W^{\mu\nu} = - {m^2 \over i\hbar} [\dot x^\mu, \dot x^\nu]. \label{eqn:2.6}
[\: x^\lambda,[\:\dot x^\mu, \dot x^\nu \:]\:] + [\: \dot x^\mu, [\: \dot x^\nu,  x^\lambda \:]\:] + [\: \dot x^\nu, [\: x^\lambda , \dot x^\nu \:]\:] =0 \label{eqn:2.7} 
 F^{\mu\nu} = W^{\mu\nu} - m \langle (\partial^\nu g^{\lambda\mu} - \partial^\mu g^{\lambda\nu}) \dot x_\lambda \rangle  \label{eqn:2.9}
 [x^\sigma, F^{\mu\nu}] = 0, \label{eqn:2.10}
 \dot x_\mu =  \langle g_{\mu\nu} (x) \dot x^\nu  \rangle \ .  \label{eqn:lower-def}
 -{m^2 \over i\hbar} [\dot x_{\mu} ,\dot x{_\nu}] = -{m^2 \over i\hbar} [ \langle g_{\mu\alpha} \dot x^\alpha \rangle ,  \langle g_{\nu\beta} \dot x^\beta \rangle ] =  \langle g_{\mu\alpha} g_{\nu\beta} W^{\alpha\beta}  \rangle - m (\partial_{\mu}  \langle g_{\nu\alpha} \dot x^\alpha  \rangle - \partial_{\nu} \langle g_{\mu\beta} \dot x^\beta \rangle ) \label{eqn:2.11}
 F_{\mu\nu} = g_{\mu\alpha} g_{\nu\beta} F^{\alpha\beta} = -{m^2 \over i\hbar}  [\dot x_\mu ,\dot x_\nu] \label{eqn:2.12}
 \partial_\mu F_{\nu\rho} + \partial_\nu F_{\rho\mu}+ \partial_\rho F_{\mu\nu } = 0 . \label{eqn:2.13}
 m[x^\mu ,\ddot x^\nu] = {i\hbar \over m} F^{\mu\nu} + 2i\hbar  \langle \Gamma^{\nu\lambda\mu} \dot x_\lambda  \rangle \label{eqn:2.14}
 \Gamma^{\nu\lambda\mu}= -{1 \over 2} ( \partial^\mu g^{\lambda\nu} + \partial^\lambda g^{\mu\nu} - \partial^\nu g^{\lambda\mu}) \label{eqn:2.15}
 F^\mu = m \ddot x^\mu = G^\mu(x,\dot x,\tau) +  \langle F^{\mu\nu} \dot x_\nu  \rangle - m  \langle \Gamma^{\mu\lambda\nu} \dot x_\lambda \dot x_\nu \rangle  \  . \label{eqn:2.16}
 G^\mu +  \langle F^{\mu\nu} \dot x_\nu \rangle  = m [ \ddot x^\mu +  \langle \Gamma^{\mu\lambda\nu} \dot x_\lambda \dot x_\nu  \rangle  ] = m \frac{D \dot x^\mu}{D \tau} \;. \label{eqn:2.18}
 m \ddot x^\mu = m { d \over d \tau} \langle g^{\mu\nu} \dot x_\nu \rangle , \label{eqn:2.19}
G_\nu =	g_{\nu \alpha} \, F^\alpha -  \langle g_{\nu \alpha} \, F^{\alpha \beta} \, \dot x_\beta \rangle + m  \langle g_{\nu \alpha} \, \Gamma^{\alpha \beta \gamma} \, \dot x_\beta \dot x_\gamma \rangle \ . \label{eqn:2.20}
\frac12 \, (\partial^\gamma g^{\alpha \beta} + \partial^\beta  g^{\alpha \gamma} ) = - \Gamma^{\alpha \beta \gamma} + \frac12 \, \partial^\alpha g^{\beta \gamma}. \label{eqn:2.22}
 \partial_{\mu} G_\nu - \partial_{\nu} G_\mu +{ \partial F_{\mu\nu} \over \partial\tau} = 0. \label{eqn:2.26}
 x^d=\tau \qquad \partial_\tau = \partial_d \qquad F_{\mu d} = - F_{d \mu} = G_\mu . \label{eqn:2.27}
 \partial_\alpha F_{\beta \gamma} + \partial_\beta F_{\gamma \alpha} + \partial_\gamma F_{\alpha \beta} =0 \label{eqn:2.28}
 {\cal D}_\alpha \; F^{\beta\alpha} = j^\beta \label{eqn:2.36} 
 {\cal D}_{\alpha} j^\alpha =0.  \label{eqn:2.37}
 F_k (\tau,q,\dot q,\ddot q) = 0 \qquad \dot q^j = \frac{dq^j}{d\tau} \qquad \ddot q^j = \frac{d^2q^j}{d\tau^2} \qquad j,k=1,\cdots,n \ .  \label{eqn:3.1}
 dF_k = \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial q^j} dq^j + \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial \dot q^j} d \dot q^j + \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial \ddot q^j} d \ddot q^j \ ,  \label{eqn:basic2}
 dq^k dF_k = \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial q^j} dq^k \wedge dq^j + \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial \dot q^j} dq^k \wedge d \dot q^j + \frac{\partial F_k}{\partial \ddot q^j} dq^k \wedge d \ddot q^j  \label{eqn:basic3}
 dq^k dF_k(dq) = \frac{d}{d\tau} \Omega_2(dq,d \dot q) \ .  \label{eqn:basic4}
 \delta = dq^k_\beta \frac{\partial}{\partial q^k_\beta} \qquad q^k_\beta = \left(\frac{d}{d\tau}\right)^\beta q^k \qquad \beta=0,1,2 \ ,  \label{eqn:basic5}
 \delta^2 = dq^k_\beta \wedge dq^l_\alpha \frac{\partial^2}{\partial q^k_\beta \partial q^l_\alpha} =0 \ ,  \label{eqn:basic6}
 \delta L = \frac{\partial L}{\partial q^k} dq^k + \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^k} d\dot q^k = \left[ -\frac{d}{d\tau} \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^k} + \frac{\partial L}{\partial q^k} \right] dq^k + \frac{d}{d\tau} \left(\frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^k} dq^k \right) = F_k dq^k + \frac{d}{d\tau} \Omega_1  \label{eqn:basic7}
 \delta^2 = 0 \Longrightarrow - dq^k \delta F_k + \frac{d}{d\tau} \delta \Omega_1 = - dq^k \delta F_k + \frac{d}{d\tau}\Omega_2 = 0  \label{eqn:basic8}
 \frac{d}{d\tau}\Omega_2 = \delta \frac{d}{d\tau}\Omega_1 \ .  \label{eqn:basic9}
 0=dq^k \delta F_k - \frac{d}{d\tau}\Omega_2 = \delta (dq^k F_k - \frac{d}{d\tau}\Omega_1) = \delta L  \label{eqn:basic}
 F_k (\tau,q,\dot q,\ddot q) = A_{kj} (\tau,q,\dot q) \ddot q^j + B_k (\tau,q,\dot q).  \label{eqn:3.5}
 \frac{\partial A_{ij}}{\partial q^k} - \frac{\partial A_{kj}}{\partial q^i} = \frac12 \frac{\partial }{\partial \dot q^j} \left( \frac{\partial B_i}{\partial \dot q^k} - \frac{\partial B_k}{\partial \dot q^i} \right).  \label{eqn:3.9}
 F_k (\tau,q,\dot q,\ddot q) = A_{kj} (\tau,q,\dot q) [ \ddot q^j - f^j  ] ,  \label{eqn:3.10}
 f^j (\tau,q,\dot q) = -(A^{-1})^{jk} B_k .  \label{eqn:3.11}
 \frac{D}{D\tau} = \frac{\partial }{\partial \tau} + \dot q^k \frac{\partial }{\partial q^k} + f^k \frac{\partial }{\partial \dot q^k}  \label{eqn:3.15}
 \ddot q^k - f^k (\tau,q,\dot q) =0.  \label{eqn:3.16}
 \frac{\partial A_{ij}}{\partial q^k} - \frac{\partial A_{kj}}{\partial q^i} = -\frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial}{\partial \dot q^j} \left[ \frac{\partial }{\partial \dot q^k}(A_{in}f^n) - \frac{\partial }{\partial \dot q^i}(A_{kn}f^n) \right] .  \label{eqn:3.17}
 F_k = A_{kj} (\tau,q,\dot q) [ \ddot q^j - f^j  ] = \frac{d}{d\tau} \left( \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^k} \right) -\frac{\partial L}{\partial q^k} .  \label{eqn:3.18}
 [ X^i (\tau) , \dot X^j (\tau) ] = i \hbar G^{ij} \ ,  \label{eqn:3.19}
 g^{ij} = \lim_{\hbar \rightarrow 0} G^{ij}  \label{eqn:3.20}
 \omega_{ij} = (g^{-1})_{ij}  \label{eqn:3.21}
 \frac{D}{D \tau} g_{\mu\nu} = \dot x^\sigma \frac{\partial}{\partial x^\sigma} g_{\mu\nu} = -\frac{1}{2} \left[ \frac{\partial f_\mu}{\partial \dot x^\nu} - \frac{\partial f_\nu}{\partial \dot x^\mu} \right]  \label{eqn:3.22}
 -\frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial}{\partial \dot x^\nu} \left[ \frac{\partial f_\mu}{\partial \dot x^\sigma} - \frac{\partial f_\sigma}{\partial \dot x^\mu} \right] = \frac{\partial g_{\mu\nu}}{\partial x^\sigma} - \frac{\partial g_{\sigma\nu}}{\partial x^\mu} .  \label{eqn:3.23}
 g_{\mu\sigma,\nu} = -\frac{1}{2} \left[ \frac{\partial^2 f_\mu}{\partial \dot x^\sigma \partial \dot x^\nu} + \frac{\partial^2 f_\sigma}{\partial \dot x^\mu \partial \dot x^\nu} \right]  \label{eqn:3.24}
 \frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial^2 f_\mu}{\partial \dot x^\sigma \partial \dot x^\nu} = -\frac{1}{2} (g_{\mu\nu,\sigma} + g_{\mu\sigma,\nu} - g_{\sigma\nu,\mu}) = -\Gamma_{\mu\sigma\nu}  \label{eqn:3.25}
 f_\mu = - \Gamma_{\mu\nu\sigma} \dot x^\nu \dot x^\sigma - \rho_{\mu\nu}(\tau,x)\dot x^\nu - \sigma_\mu (\tau,x).  \label{eqn:3.26}
 \dot x^\sigma \frac{\partial g_{\mu\nu}}{\partial x^\sigma} = \frac{1}{2} \left[ 2 \Gamma_{\mu\nu\sigma} \dot x^\sigma + 2 \Gamma_{\nu\mu\sigma} \dot x^\sigma + \rho_{\mu\nu} + \rho_{\nu\mu} \right] .  \label{eqn:3.27}
 (\Gamma_{\mu\nu\sigma} + \Gamma_{\nu\mu\sigma} ) \dot x^\sigma = g_{\mu\nu,\sigma} \dot x^\sigma  \label{eqn:3.28}
 0= \rho_{\mu\nu} + \rho_{\nu\mu} .  \label{eqn:3.29}
 \frac{\partial\rho_{\mu\nu}}{\partial \tau} + \dot x^\lambda \rho_{\mu\nu,\lambda} = \dot x^\lambda (\rho_{\mu\lambda,\nu} - \rho_{\nu\lambda,\mu}) + \sigma_{\mu,\nu} - \sigma_{\nu,\mu}.  \label{eqn:3.35}
 F_{\mu\nu} = -\rho_{\mu\nu} \qquad{\rm and} \qquad G_\mu = -\sigma_\mu \ .  \label{eqn:3.38}
 A_{\mu\nu} = g_{\mu\nu} \longrightarrow \eta_{\mu\nu} = {\rm diag} (1,-1,\cdots,-1)  \label{eqn:3.39}
 L = \frac12 m \ \dot x^\mu \dot x_\mu + A_\mu(\tau,x) \dot x^\mu + \phi (\tau,x) \ .  \label{eqn:3.44}
 \int d^4 x d\tau \left[ \frac14 F_{\mu\nu}F^{\mu\nu} \pm \frac12 G_\mu G^\mu \right] \ .  \label{eqn:f.44}
G=\frac{1}{(p-eA)^{2} +m^{2}} \label{eqn:4.2}
G(x,x')=\langle x|G|x'\rangle =i \int_{0}^{\infty} ds e^{-i m^{2} s} \langle x|e^{-i (p-eA)^{2} s}|x'\rangle  . \label{eqn:4.3}
G(x,x';s)=\langle x(s)|x'(0)\rangle = \langle x|e^{-i (p-eA)^{2} s}|x'\rangle \label{eqn:4.4}
i \frac{\partial}{\partial s}\langle x(s)|x'(0)\rangle = (p-eA)^{2}\langle x(s)|x'(0)\rangle =K\langle x(s)|x'(0)\rangle \label{eqn:4.5}
\lim_{s \rightarrow 0} \langle x(s)|x'(0)\rangle  = \delta ^{4} (x-x'). \label{eqn:4.6}
i \frac{\partial}{\partial s}\psi_{s}(x)=K\psi_{s}(x)= (p-eA)^{2}\psi_{s}(x) \ , \label{eqn:4.7}
\frac{dx^{\mu}}{d\tau} =\frac{\partial K}{\partial p_{\mu}} \qquad\qquad \frac{dp^{\mu}}{d\tau} =-\frac{\partial K}{\partial x_{\mu}} \label{eqn:4.8}
\dot x^0 = \frac{p^0}{M} \qquad \dot x^i = \frac{p^i}{M} \qquad p^\mu = \rm constant \label{eqn:4.9}
\frac{dx^i}{dt} = \frac{p^i}{p^0} \qquad \qquad \dot x^2 = -\frac{m^2}{M^2} = {\rm constant} \label{eqn:4.10}
\psi(x,\tau) \rightarrow e^{i e_{0} \Lambda (x,\tau)} \psi (x,\tau) \label{eqn:4.11}
-(i \partial_{\tau} -e_{0}a_{4})\psi(x,\tau) =\frac{1}{2M}(p^{\mu}-e_{0}a^{\mu})(p_{\mu}- e_{0}a_{\mu})\psi(x,\tau) \label{eqn:4.12}
a_{\mu}(x,\tau) \rightarrow a_{\mu}(x,\tau)+\partial_{\mu}\Lambda(x,\tau) \qquad a_{4}(x,\tau) \rightarrow a_{4}(x,\tau) + \partial_{\tau} \Lambda(x,\tau) . \label{eqn:4.14}
\partial_{\mu}j^{\mu}+\partial_{\tau}j^{4}=0 \label{eqn:4.15}
j^{4} = |\psi(x,\tau)|^{2} \qquad j^{\mu} = \frac{-i }{2M}(\psi^{*}(\partial^{\mu}-i e_{0}a^{\mu})\psi - \psi(\partial^{\mu}-i e_{0}a^{\mu})\psi^{*}). \label{eqn:4.16}
 K=\frac{1}{2M}(p^{\mu}-e_{0}a^{\mu})(p_{\mu}- e_{0}a_{\mu})-e_{0}a_{4}  \label{eqn:h-cl}
 M \ \dot x^\mu = (p^{\mu}-e_{0}a^{\mu})  \label{eqn:p-cl}
 M \: \ddot x^\mu = f^\mu_{\:\;\;\nu} \dot x^\nu + f^\mu_{\:\;\;4} = f^\mu_{\:\;\;\alpha}(x,\tau) \, \dot x^\alpha .  \label{eqn:4.18}
 f^{\mu\nu} = \partial^\mu a^\nu - \partial^\nu a^\mu \qquad f^\mu_{\:\;\;4} = \partial^\mu a_4 - \partial_\tau a^\mu  \label{eqn:f-def}
 \frac{d}{d\tau} (\frac{1}{2} M \dot x^2) = M \dot x^\mu \ddot x_\mu = \dot x^\mu (f_{\mu 4} + f_{\mu\nu} \dot x^\nu ) = \dot x^\mu f_{\mu 4}  \label{eqn:4.n1}
 \frac{d}{d\tau} (-\frac{1}{2} M \dot x^2) = f_{4\alpha} \dot x^\alpha  \label{eqn:4.n2}
 U^\alpha = ( -\frac{1}{2} \dot x^2 , \dot x^\mu )  \label{eqn:4.n3}
 M \: \frac{d}{d\tau} U^\alpha = f^\alpha_{\:\;\;\beta} \: \dot x^\beta .  \label{eqn:4.n4}
 G_{\mu} = f_{4\mu} = 0  \qquad {\rm and}  \qquad \partial_\tau f^{\mu\nu}=0  \label{eqn:conditions}
 S= \int d\tau \ \frac12 M \dot x^\mu \dot x_\mu + e_0 \, \dot x^\mu \, a_\mu (\tau,x) + e_{0} \, a_{4} (\tau,x)  \label{eqn:4.act}
\partial_{\beta} f^{\alpha \beta} =\frac{e_{0}}{\lambda}j^{\alpha}=ej^{\alpha} \label{eqn:4.19}
\epsilon^{\alpha \beta \gamma \delta \epsilon}\partial_{\alpha}f_{\beta \gamma}=0 \label{eqn:ho}
J^{\mu}(x)=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} d\tau j^{\mu}(x,\tau) \label{eqn:cat-j}
\partial_{\nu}F^{\mu \nu}=eJ^{\mu} \label{eqn:4.21}
F^{\mu \nu}(x)=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} d\tau f^{\mu \nu}(x,\tau) \label{eqn:4.22}
 {\cal D}_\mu {\bf f}_{\nu \rho} + {\cal D}_\nu  {\bf f}_{\rho \mu} + {\cal D}_\rho {\bf f}_{\mu \nu} = 0,  \label{eqn:w6}
 ( {\cal D}_\mu {\bf f}_{\mu\nu} )_a = \partial_\mu f_{a \mu\nu} - \varepsilon_a^{\; bc} b_{b \mu} f_{c\mu\nu}.  \label{eqn:w7}
 [x_i , I^a(t)] = 0 \qquad \dot {\bf I} + g {\bf b}_i \times {\bf I} \ \dot x^i = 0  \label{eqn:lee1}
 [\: I^a, I^b \:] = i\hbar  \, f_c^{\; ab} I^c  \label{eqn:5.1}
 [\: x^\mu, I^a \:] = 0  \label{eqn:5.2}
 m \: \ddot x^\mu = F^\mu (x,\dot x,I) = F_a^\mu (x,\dot x) \, I^a  \label{eqn:5.3}
 \dot I^a =  f_c^{\;ab} A_{b \mu}(x) \, \dot x^\mu I^c  \label{eqn:5.4}
 m \: \ddot x^\mu = G_a^\mu(x) \, I^a + F^\mu_{a \; \nu}(x) \, I^a \dot x^\nu  \label{eqn:5.5}
 ( {\cal D}_\mu G_\nu - {\cal D}_\nu G_\mu )_a = 0  \label{eqn:5.6}
 ({\cal D}_\mu  F_{\nu \rho} + 	{\cal D}_\nu  F_{\rho \mu} + {\cal D}_\rho F_{\mu \nu} )_a = 0,  \label{eqn:5.7}
 ( {\cal D}_\mu F_{\nu \rho} )_a = \partial_\mu F_{a \nu \rho} - f_a^{\; bc} A_{b \mu} F_{c \, \nu \rho} .  \label{eqn:5.8}
 f_c^{\; ab} \Bigl( F_{a \mu \nu} - ( \partial_\mu A_{a \nu} - \partial_\nu A_{a \mu} - f_a^{\; de} A_{d \mu} A_{e \nu} ) \Bigr) = 0 \ .  \label{eqn:5.9}
 dI^a =  f_c^{\;ab} [A_{b \mu}(\tau,x) \, dx^\mu + \phi_b(\tau,x) d\tau ] I^c  \label{eqn:5.10}
 (\tau,x) \longrightarrow (\tau + d\tau ,x + dx )  \label{eqn:variation}
 \frac{\partial}{\partial x^\mu} \longrightarrow {\cal D}_\mu \qquad \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} \longrightarrow {\cal D}_\tau \ ,  \label{eqn:5.12}
 \frac{D}{D\tau} = {\cal D}_\tau + \dot x^\sigma {\cal D}_\sigma + f^\sigma \frac{\partial }{\partial \dot x^\sigma}  \label{eqn:h.15}
 \ddot x_\mu - f_{a\mu} (\tau,x,\dot x) I^a =0 \ .  \label{eqn:h.16}
 \frac{\partial f_\mu}{\partial \dot x^\nu} + \frac{\partial f_\nu}{\partial \dot x^\mu} =0 \qquad \Longrightarrow \qquad \frac{\partial^2 f_\mu} {\partial \dot x^\nu \partial \dot x^\lambda} + \frac{\partial^2 f_\nu} {\partial \dot x^\mu\partial \dot x^\lambda} =0 \ .  \label{eqn:5.13}
 \frac{\partial^2 f_\mu} {\partial \dot x^\nu \partial \dot x^\lambda} - \frac{\partial^2 f_\nu} {\partial \dot x^\mu\partial \dot x^\lambda} =0 \ ,  \label{eqn:5.14}
 \frac{\partial^2 f_\mu} {\partial \dot x^\nu \partial \dot x^\lambda}=0 \ .  \label{eqn:5.15}
 f_\mu = f_{\mu\nu} (\tau,x) \dot x^\nu + g_\mu (\tau,x) \ ,  \label{eqn:5.16}
 L = \frac12 m \ \dot x^\mu \dot x_\mu + A_{a\mu}(\tau,x)I^a(\tau) \dot x^\mu + \phi_a(\tau,x)I^a(\tau) \ .  \label{eqn:5.19}
 x^d=\tau \qquad \partial_\tau = \partial_d \qquad f_{\mu d} = - f_{d \mu} = g_\mu . \label{eqn:na.27}
 \partial_\alpha f_{\beta \gamma} + \partial_\beta f_{\gamma \alpha} + \partial_\gamma f_{\alpha \beta} =0 \label{eqn:na.28}
 f_{\alpha\beta} = \left[ \frac{\partial A_{a\beta}}{\partial x^\alpha}- \frac{\partial A_{a\alpha}}{\partial x^\beta} + f_a^{\;bc}  A_{a\alpha} A_{b \beta} \right] I^a  \label{eqn:na.30}
 \frac{d}{d\tau} (\frac{1}{2} m \dot x^2) = m \dot x^\mu \ddot x_\mu = \dot x^\mu I^a (g_{a \mu} + f_{a \mu\nu} \dot x^\nu ) = \dot x^\mu g_{a \mu} I^a = 0  \label{eqn:m.13}
 g_{a \mu} = 0  \qquad {\rm and}  \qquad \partial_\tau f^{a \mu\nu}=0  \label{eqn:m.14}
 K = \dot x^\mu  \frac{\partial L}{\partial x^\mu} - L = \frac{1}{2} m \dot x^\mu \dot x_\mu - \phi_a I^a  \label{eqn:m.15}
 \frac{\partial L}{\partial \tau} = A_{a \mu} \dot x^\mu \dot I^a + \phi_a \dot I^a = f^{abc} A_{a \mu} A_{b \nu} \dot x^\mu \dot x^\nu I^c + \phi_a \dot I^a = \phi_a \dot I^a.  \label{eqn:m.16}
<0\vert (a_n)^{r_n} \cdot ... \cdot (a_1)^{r_1}  (a_1^{\dagger})^{r_1} \cdot ... \cdot (a_n^{\dagger})^{r_n} \vert 0>  \quad  =  \prod\limits_{i=1}^n [r_i]_{q}!
[r]_q! := [1]_q \cdot [2]_q \cdot [3]_q \cdot . . . \cdot [r]_q  \mbox{ \qquad and \qquad } [p]_q := \frac{q^{2p} - 1}{q^{2} - 1} \label{norm}
E_p = \hbar \omega (0 + 1 + q^2 + q^4 + ... + q^{2(p-1)}) = \hbar \omega \frac{q^{2p} - 1}{q^{2} - 1} \mbox{ \quad with \quad } p = 0,1,2,... \label{spec}
{\psi}_m \propto\quad < \mbox{source}_{after}\vert <0\vert \frac{(a_i(\vec{k}))^{m+1}}{\sqrt{[m+1]_q!}} \vert \quad a^{\dagger}_i g_i \quad \vert \frac{(a^{\dagger}_i(\vec{k}))^m}{\sqrt{[m]_q!}} \vert 0>\vert \mbox{source}_{before}>
{\psi}_m \propto \sqrt{[m+1]_q} \mbox{ \quad  i.e. \quad }  p_m \propto [m+1]_q. \label{a}

S_{0i}=\int d^3x\: \left[ \varepsilon_{ijk}\left( F_{0j}+\tilde{F}_{0j} \right) \psi_k +\eta D_i \phi -\chi_i D_0\phi-\left( F_{0i}+\tilde{F}_{0i} \right) \psi_0 + \varepsilon_{ijk}\chi_j D_k \phi -{1\over 2} \left[ \lambda, \phi \right] \psi_i \right] . \label{S0i}

\left. {\partial S\over \partial \Phi^{\prime A}}\right|_{K^\prime}= \left. {\partial_r \Phi^B\over \partial \Phi^{\prime A}}\right|_{K^\prime} {\partial S\over \partial \Phi^B}= {\partial S\over \partial \Phi^B}{(M^{-1})^B}_A.
\left. {\partial S\over \partial \Phi^{\prime A}}\right|_{K^\prime}= {\partial K_B\over \partial  g }{(M^{-1})^B}_A.
\left. {\partial K^\prime_B\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}{M^B}_A= -{\partial K_A\over\partial  g },
\left. {\partial S\over \partial \Phi^{\prime A}}\right|_{K^\prime}= -\left. {\partial K^\prime_A\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}. \label{div1}
\left. {\partial S\over \partial K^\prime_A}\right|_{\Phi^\prime}= {\partial \Phi^{\prime A}\over \partial g}- {\partial K_B\over \partial g}{(M^{-1})^B}_CF^{CA} =\left. {\partial \Phi^{\prime A}\over \partial  g } \right|_{\Phi,K}. \label{div2}
{\partial \Sigma^\prime \over \partial  g }= \widetilde{\partial \Sigma\over \partial  g } -(S,\tilde\Sigma)+i\hbar \left. {\partial \ln J^{1\over 2}\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}.
{\partial \Sigma^\prime \over \partial  g }= \widetilde{\partial \Sigma\over \partial  g } -(S,\Sigma^\prime)+i\hbar \Delta S-i\hbar \left\{ \tilde\Delta S- \left. {\partial \ln J^{1\over 2}\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}\right\}.
\tilde\Delta S= \left. {\partial \ln J^{1\over 2}\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}.
\matrix{ \left. {\partial_r K^\prime _A\over\partial K_B} \right|_\Phi={(N^{-1})_A}^B,& \left. {\partial_r K_B\over \partial K^\prime_A} \right|_{\Phi^\prime}={N_B}^A-F_{BC}{(M^{-1})^C}_DF^{DA},\cr \left. {\partial_rK^\prime_A\over\partial \Phi^B} \right|_K=-{(N^{-1})_A}^CF_{CB},& \left. {\partial_r \Phi^B\over \partial K^\prime_A} \right|_{\Phi^\prime}=-{(M^{-1})^B}_CF^{CA}.}
J^{1\over 2}=\det M^{-1},
d\ln J^{1\over 2}=(-1)^{\varepsilon_B+1}d{N_B}^D{(N^{-1})_D}^B,
\tilde\Delta S=\left. {\partial \ln J^{1\over 2}\over \partial  g }\right|_ {\Phi,K}+(-1)^{\varepsilon_B+1}{(M^{-1})^B}_CF^{CA}{(N^{-1})_A}^D \left. {\partial F_{DB}\over \partial  g }\right|_{\Phi,K}.
{\cal S}=\int L(\omega)\sqrt{-\det G_{\alpha\beta}}d\tau d\sigma,
G_{\alpha\beta}=g_{\mu\nu}x^\mu_{,\alpha}x^\nu_{,\beta}
\omega=G^{\alpha\beta}(\Phi_{,\alpha}+A_\mu x^\mu_{,\alpha}) (\Phi_{,\beta}+A_\mu x^\mu_{,\beta}),
L(\omega)=1+\omega/2
ds^2=-(1-2m/r)dt^2+\frac{1}{1-2m/r}dr^2+r^2(d\theta^2+\sin^2\theta d\phi^2).
A_\mu=0,\hspace*{5mm}g_{\mu\nu}=diag\left( -(1-2m/r),(1-2m/r)^{-1}, r^2,r^2\sin^2\theta\right).
t=t(\tau),\hspace*{5mm}r=r(\tau),\hspace*{5mm}\theta=\theta(\tau),\hspace*{5mm} \phi=\sigma,
\Phi=f(\tau)+n\sigma,
H=\frac{1}{2}g^{\mu\nu}P_\mu P_\nu+\frac{1}{2}(r^2\sin^2\theta+n^2+\Omega^2)+ \frac{(\Omega^2-n^2)^2}{8r^2\sin^2\theta},
H=0,\hspace*{5mm}P_\phi=-n\Omega,
P_\phi=-n\Omega,\hspace*{5mm}P_t=-{\cal E}_o,
H=\frac{1}{2}(1-2m/r)P^2_r+\frac{1}{2r^2}P^2_\theta+\frac{1}{2}(r\sin\theta+ \frac{N^2}{2r\sin\theta})^2-\frac{{\cal E}^2_o}{2(1-2m/r)},
N^2=n^2+\Omega^2.
\alpha_o{\cal E}^2_o+\gamma_o-(\Delta^2 P^2_r+\Delta P^2_\theta)=0,
\alpha_o=r^4,
\gamma_o=-\Delta(r^2\sin\theta+\frac{N^2} {2\sin\theta})^2,
\Delta=r^2-2mr.
\alpha_o U^2(r,\theta)+\gamma_o=0.
U(r,\theta)=\sqrt{\Delta}(\sin\theta+\frac{N^2}{2r^2\sin\theta}).
\tilde{U}(R,Z)=(R+\frac{N^2}{2R})\sqrt{1-\frac{2m}{\sqrt{R^2+Z^2}}}.
\frac{\partial\tilde{U}}{\partial R}=(1-\frac{N^2}{2R^2})(1-\frac{2m}{\sqrt{ R^2+Z^2}})^{1/2}+\frac{mR}{(R^2+Z^2)^{3/2}}(R+\frac{N^2}{2R})(1-\frac{2m}{ \sqrt{R^2+Z^2}})^{-1/2}=0,
\frac{\partial\tilde{U}}{\partial Z}=\frac{mZ}{(R^2+Z^2)^{3/2}}(R+\frac{N^2} {2R})(1-\frac{2m}{\sqrt{R^2+Z^2}})^{-1/2}=0.
r^3-mr^2-\frac{N^2}{2}r+\frac{3}{2}mN^2=0.
\frac{\partial^2\tilde{U}}{\partial R\partial Z}\mid_{crit.}=0,
\frac{\partial^2\tilde{U}}{\partial Z^2}\mid_{crit.}= \frac{m(r+\frac{N^2}{2r})}{r^2\sqrt{r^2-2mr}}\mid_{crit.}>0,
\frac{\partial^2\tilde{U}}{\partial R^2}\mid_{crit.}= \frac{1}{r^2 (r^2-2mr)^{3/2}}\left( (N^2-m^2)r^2-6mN^2r+\frac{15}{2}m^2N^2 \right)\mid_{crit.}
N^2>(13\sqrt{13}+47)m^2\equiv N^2_{crit.}
\frac{\partial^2\tilde{U}}{\partial R^2}\mid_{crit.}=\frac{\partial\tilde{U}}{ \partial R}\mid_{crit.}=0,
N^2=N^2_{crit.},\hspace*{5mm}r_{crit.}=\frac{1}{2}(5+\sqrt{13})m,
r_+=\frac{m}{3}\left(1+\sqrt{4+6\frac{N^2}{m^2}}\cos(\frac{\psi}{3}+ \frac{4\pi}{3})\right),
r_-=\frac{m}{3}\left(1+\sqrt{4+6\frac{N^2}{m^2}}\cos\frac{\psi}{3}\right),
\cos\psi=\frac{\sqrt{8}m(m^2-18N^2)}{(2m^2+3N^2)^{3/2}}\in[-1,0[.
\tilde{U}(R,Z)\rightarrow\infty,\hspace*{5mm}for\hspace*{5mm} R\rightarrow\infty,
\tilde{U}(R,\pm\infty)=R+\frac{N^2}{2R}.
\tilde{U}(\frac{N}{\sqrt{2}})=\sqrt{2}N.
\tilde{U}(\frac{N}{\sqrt{2}},\pm\infty)>\tilde{U}(r_+,0),
\tilde{U}(r_-,0)>\tilde{U}(r_+,0),
\tilde{U}(\frac{N}{\sqrt{2}},\pm\infty)\geq\tilde{U}(r_-,0)\hspace*{5mm} \Longleftrightarrow\hspace*{5mm}\mid N\mid\leq (13.22...)m.

\ddot{r}=(r-3m)\dot{\theta}^2-(r-m)\sin^2\theta-\frac{mN^2}{r^2}+ \frac{(r-3m)N^4}{4r^4\sin^2\theta}.
{\cal E}^2_o=\dot{r}^2+(r^2-2mr)\dot{\theta}^2+(r^2-2mr)(\sin\theta+ \frac{N^2}{2r^2\sin\theta})^2.
r\equiv xm,\hspace*{5mm}\theta\equiv y,\hspace*{5mm}N\equiv\bar{N}m,
\dot{x}=p,
\dot{y}=q,

H=H(x,y,p_x,p_y). \label{eq:hamiltonian}
\pss{H}{I}=\pss{H}{C}=0, \quad\mbox{and}\quad \pss{I}{C}= F(H,I,C), \label{eq:PoissonRelations}
\pss{L}{A}= B, \quad \pss{L}{B}=-A. \label{eq:Cl1}
\pss{A}{B}=\Phi (H,L)=- \frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial G}{\partial L}. \label{eq:Cl2}
\comm{H}{I}=0, \label{eq:comm}
\begin{array}{rl} {\cal N} =& {\cal N} \left( H, I ,C \right), \\ {\cal N}^+ =& {\cal N},\\ {\cal A} =& {\cal A} \left( H, I ,C \right), \\ \comm{\cal N}{\cal A}=& - {\cal A},\\ {\cal A}^+ {\cal A} =& \Phi \left( H,{\cal N} \right),\\ \comm{ {\cal A}^+ {\cal A}}{ {\cal A} {\cal A}^+}=&0, \end{array} \label{eq:hypothesis}

H=\frac{1}{2} \left( p_x^2 + p_y^2\right) +  \frac{1}{2}\omega^2 \left( x^2 + y^2\right). \label{eq:ho-hamiltonian}
B=S_{xx}-S_{yy} = \left( p_x^2 + \omega^2 x^2\right) - \left( p_y^2 + \omega^2 y^2\right), \quad S_{xy}= p_x p_y + \omega^2 xy. \label{eq:Fradkin}
L= xp_y- y p_x, \label{eq:ang-mom}
\comm{H}{L}=\comm{H}{B}=0, \label{eq:ho-comm-rel}
\comm{L}{B}=4 i S_{xy}, \quad \comm{L}{S_{xy}}=-i B. \label{eq:CommAlgebra}
\begin{array}{rl} \displaystyle {\cal N}= \frac{L}{2}-u{\bf 1}, \\[0.2in] \displaystyle {\cal A}^+ = \frac{B}{2}+ i S_{xy},  \\[0.2in] \displaystyle {\cal A} = \frac{B}{2}- i S_{xy}, \end{array} \label{eq:def-osc}
\begin{array}{rl} \comm{\cal N}{\cal A^+}=& {\cal A^+}, \\ \comm{\cal N}{\cal A}=& -{\cal A}, \\ {\cal A}^+ {\cal A}  =& H^2-\omega^2 (L-1)^2 \\ =&  H^2 -\omega^2 \left( 2 {\cal N} +2 u -1 \right)^2 \\  = & \Phi ( H, {\cal N} ), \end{array} \label{eq:ho}
\Phi(E,x)=E^2- \omega^2 \left( 2 x+2 u -1 \right)^2, \label{eq:ho-str-function}
\begin{array}{c} \Phi(E,0)=0, \\ \Phi(E,N+1)=0,\\ \Phi(E,x)>0\quad \mbox{for}\quad x=1,2,\ldots,N . \end{array} \label{eq:restrictions}
u= -\frac{N}{2}, \quad  E=E_N=\omega (N+1). \label{eq:ho-energy}
L=-N,-N+2,\ldots,N-2,N. \label{eq:ho-ang-mom}
H=\frac{1}{2} \left( \pi_x^2 + \pi_y^2 + \lambda L^2 \right) + \frac{\omega^2}{2} \left( x^2 + y^2 \right), \label{eq:Higgs-ho}
\begin{array}{c}  \pi_x= p_x + \frac{\lambda}{2} \left( x \left( x p_x + y p_y\right)+ \left( x p_x + y p_y\right) x \right),\\  \pi_y = p_y + \frac{\lambda}{2} \left( y \left( x p_x + y p_y\right)+ \left( x p_x + y p_y\right) y \right). \end{array} \label{eq:ext-momentum}
B=S_{xx}-S_{yy} = \left( \pi_x^2 + \omega^2 x^2\right) - \left( \pi_y^2 + \omega^2 y^2\right), \label{eq:Higgs}
S_{xy} =\frac{1}{2} \{ \pi_x, \pi_y \} + \omega^2 xy,
\begin{array}{rl} \ &\Phi(E,x)= \  \\  \ & E^2- \left( \omega^2 + \frac{\lambda^2}{4} + \lambda E \right) \left(2x+2u-1\right)^2 +  \frac{\lambda^2}{4}\left( 2 x +2 u -1 \right)^4 . \end{array} \label{eq:c-ho-str-function}
E=E_N=\sqrt{ \omega^2 + \frac{\lambda^2}{4}} (N+1)  + \frac{\lambda}{2}(N+1)^2, \label{eq:curv-ho-energy}
H=\frac{1}{2} \left( \pi_x^2 + \pi_y^2 + \lambda L^2 \right) - \frac{\mu}{r}, \quad r=\sqrt{x^2+y^2}, \label{eq:Higgs-Kepler}
R_x=-\frac{1}{2}\acm{L}{\pi_y}+ \mu\frac{x}{r}, \quad R_y=\frac{1}{2}\acm{L}{\pi_x}+ \mu\frac{y}{r}. \label{eq:Runge-Lentz}
\begin{array}{rl} {\cal N} =& L - u,  \\ {\cal A}^+ = & R_x +i R_y, \\ {\cal A} = & R_x - i R_y, \\ {\cal A}^+ {\cal A} = & \mu^2 + 2 H \left (L - 1/2 \right)^2 -            \lambda  \left (L - 1/2 \right)^2            \left(  \left (L - 1/2 \right)^2 - 1/4 \right) \\    = \mu^2 +& 2 H \left ({\cal N}+u - 1/2 \right)^2 -            \lambda  \left ({\cal N} +u - 1/2 \right)^2            \left(  \left ({\cal N}+u - 1/2 \right)^2 - 1/4 \right) \\     =& \Phi (H, {\cal N} ). \end{array} \label{eq:Kepler-algebra}
u=-\frac{N}{2}, \quad E_N=-\frac{2 \mu^2}{(N+1)^2}+\lambda \frac{N(N+2)}{8}. \label{eq:KeplerSpectrum}
H=\frac{1}{2}\left( p_x^2 + p_y^2 \right) +\frac{x^2}{2}+\frac{y^2}{18} \label{eq:FokasHamiltonian}
J = p_x^2 + x^2, \quad \mbox{and} \quad C=(x p_y - y p_x ) p_y^2 + \frac{y^3 p_x}{27}- \frac{xy^2 p_y}{3}, \label{eq:FokasClassIntegral}
\begin{array}{rl} \cmm{\cal N}{\cal A ^+} = & {\cal A}^+, \quad \cmm{\cal N}{\cal A } = - {\cal A}, \\[0.2in] {\cal A}^+ {\cal A} = & \displaystyle \frac{1}{9} (J-1) (2H -J +1)(6H-3J+1)(6H-3J+5)\\[0.2in] =&\displaystyle \frac{1}{9} (2 {\cal N}-1+2u) (2H -2u +1-2 {\cal N}) \\[0.2in] \ &  (6H-6u+1 -6{\cal N})(6H-6u+5-6{\cal N})\\[0.2in] =&\Phi(H,{\cal N}), \\ {\cal A} {\cal A}^+ =& \Phi ( H, {\cal N}+1). \end{array}
H=\frac{1}{2}\left( p_x^2 + p_y^2 \right) +k\left( x^2 + y^2\right) + \frac{c}{x^2}. \label{eq:WinternitzHamiltonian}
T= p_y^2 + 2 k y^2, \quad \mbox{and} \quad C=x^2 p_y^2+ y^2 p_x^2 - 2 xy p_x p_y + 2 c \frac{y^2}{x^2}, \label{eq:WinternitzClassIntegral}

-\frac{1}{8}\le c \le \frac{3}{8}, \label{eq:Winter-restriction}

0\leq t < \frac{\pi}{2}-\delta.
A(t)= N(t) + \Omega(t),
\frac{1}{2\kappa^{2}\cos^{2}{t}}\frac{d^{2}N}{dt^{2}}=-\frac{N}{\kappa^{2} \cos^{4}{t}} +N-N^{3},

N^{(2)}(t)=-\frac{1}{2\cos^{4}{t}}, \;\; N^{(4)}(t)=-\frac{2}{\cos^{6}{t}}+ \frac{19}{8 \cos^{8}{t}}.

\frac{1}{4\kappa^{2}\cos^{2}{t}}\frac{d^2 \Omega^{(2)}}{dt^2} = -\Omega^{(2)},

A(0)=1+\frac{1}{\kappa^{2}}\left(c_{2}-\frac{1}{2}\right),\;\; \frac{dA}{dt}(0) = \frac{2c_{1}}{\kappa}.

\sin^{2}{\delta}\approx \frac{d}{\kappa},

\label{PI2T}\Pi ^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) =\sum_{i=1}^{14}\Pi _i\left( r,K\right) T_i^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( u,K\right) .
\label{CoefPI2} \Pi _i\left( r,K\right) =\kappa ^2\left[\frac{\pi ^2T^4}{15} l_i\left( r,K\right) +|\vec k|^2T^2N_i\left( r,K\right)\right] ,
\label{projections}\bar P_i\left( r,K\right) =\frac 18\Pi^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) T_{_i\,\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( u,K\right) .
\label{SolCoefPI2}\Pi _i\left( r,K\right) =8(T_i^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }T_{_j\,\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta })^{-1}\bar P_j\left( r,K\right) \equiv 8\left( T_{ij}\right) ^{-1}\bar P_j\left(r,K\right),
\label{IntegralsIS}I_S\left( k,T\right) =\frac 1{\left( 2\pi \right) ^3}\int \frac{d^3q}{2Q}\frac{Q^S}{\exp \left( Q/T\right) -1} \left( \frac 1{k^2+2k\cdot q}+        \frac 1{k^2-2k\cdot q}\right) ,
\label{IntegralsISAngular}I_S\left( k,T\right) =-\frac 1{\left( 2\pi \right) ^2}\frac{k^2}4\int_{-1}^{\,\,1}\frac{dx}{\left( k_0-\left| \vec k\right| x\right) ^2}\int_0^\infty dQ\frac{Q^{S+1}}{\exp \left( Q/T\right) -1}\frac 1{Q^2+\left( 2\pi Ty\right) ^2},
\label{yDefinition}y\equiv \frac 1{4i\pi T}\frac{k^2}{k_0-\left| \vec k\right| x}.
\label{BasicIntegral}I\left( y\right) =\int_0^\infty \frac{QdQ}{Q^2+\left( 2\pi Ty\right) ^2}\frac 1{\exp \left( Q/T\right) -1}= \frac12\Theta[{\rm Re}(y)]\left(\ln y-\frac 1{2y}-\psi\left(y\right) \right)+(y\leftrightarrow-y),
\label{DefJ} J_n\equiv\Theta[{\rm Re}(k_0)]\left[J_n(t(k_0))-J_n(-t(-k_0))\right]+ \left[k_0\leftrightarrow-k_0\right],
\label{JnIntegrals} J_n(t)=\left( \frac {i\pi T}{|\vec k|}\right) ^{n-1}\int_C^ty^n \left[\ln(y)-\frac1{2y}-\psi(y)\right]dy.
\label{tDefinition}t\left( k_0\right) =\frac{k_0+\left| \vec k\right| }{4i\pi T}.
\label{ExpampleOfJ} J_0\left(t\right)=\frac{|\vec k|}{i\pi T}\int^t \left[\ln(y)-\frac1{2y}-\psi(y)\right]dy= \frac{|\vec k|}{i\pi T}\left[t\ln t-\zeta^{\prime}\left(0,t\right)-t -\frac12\ln t\right],
J_1(t)=\int^t y\left[\ln(y)-\frac1{2y}-\psi(y)\right]dy= t\zeta^\prime(0,t)-\zeta^\prime(-1,t)+\frac{t^2}2\ln t-\frac34t^2.
\label{p1}P_1\left( r,K\right) =-\frac{K^2}{96}-\frac{K^4}{32}J_0,
\label{p2}P_2=\frac{K^2}{48}L\left( r\right) -\frac{K^4}{32}J_0 -r\frac{K^2}4J_1-\frac{K^2}2J_2,
\label{p3}P_3=-\frac{1}{576}+\frac{K^2}{192}L\left( r\right) -\frac{K^4 }{256}J_0-r\frac{K^2}{16}J_1-\frac{2+3K^2}8J_2-rJ_3-J_4,
\label{LDefinition} L\left( r\right) =\frac r2\ln \frac{r+1}{r-1}-1.
\label{PiBar}\bar \Pi ^{\mu \nu ,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) \equiv \Pi ^{\mu \nu ,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) -\frac 14\left( \eta ^{\mu \alpha }\Pi ^\rho {}_{\rho ,}{}^{\nu \beta }+\eta ^{\mu \beta }\Pi ^\rho {}_{\rho ,}{}^{\nu \alpha }+\eta ^{\nu \alpha }\Pi ^\rho {}_{\rho ,}{}^{\mu \beta }+\eta ^{\nu \beta }\Pi ^\rho {}_{\rho ,}{}^{\mu \alpha }\right) ,
\label{SEff}S_{eff}=\Gamma _h^{\alpha \beta }h_{\alpha \beta }\left( 0\right) +\frac 12\int d^4k\Pi _h^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) \,h_{\mu \nu }\left( k\right) \,h_{\alpha \beta }\left( -k\right) +\cdots .
\label{hPrime}h_{\prime }^{\mu \nu }=a\,h^{\mu \nu }+b\,h_{\;\;\lambda }^\lambda \,\eta ^{\mu \nu }+c\,h_{\;\;\lambda }^\lambda \,h^{\mu \nu }+d\,h^{\mu \lambda }\,h_{\;\;\lambda }^\nu +e\,\left( h_{\;\;\lambda }^\lambda \right) ^2\,\eta ^{\mu \nu }+f\,h_{\alpha \beta }h^{\alpha \beta }\,\eta ^{\mu \nu }+\cdots \;\;,
\label{gTilde}\sqrt{-g\left( x\right) }g^{\mu \nu }\equiv \eta ^{\mu \nu }+\kappa h_{\prime }^{\mu \nu },
\label{SpecialParameters}a=-1;\;\;b=\frac 12;\;\;c=-\frac 12;\;\;d=1;\;\;e=\frac 18;\;\;f=-\frac 14.
\label{constraints}a\,b-a\,c+2\,b\,d=0;\qquad b+2\,f=0,
\label{SEffPrime}S_{eff}=\Gamma _{h_{\prime }}^{\alpha \beta }h_{\prime \alpha \beta }\left( 0\right) +\frac 12\int d^4k\Pi _{h_{\prime }}^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) \,h_{\prime \mu \nu }\left( k\right) \,h_{\prime \alpha \beta }\left( -k\right) +\cdots .
\label{GammahhPrime}\Gamma _h^{\mu \nu }=a\,\Gamma_{h_\prime}^{\mu \nu }+ b\, \eta^{\mu\nu} \Gamma_{h_\prime\;\rho}^{\rho},
\label{trPiprime} \Pi _{h_{\prime }\;\rho \,}^{\rho \;\;\;\;,\,\mu \nu }=-\kappa \frac{a+4c+2d}{a\left( a+4b\right) }\;\Gamma _{h_{\prime }}^{\mu \nu }\equiv -\tilde \Gamma _{h_{\prime }}^{\mu \nu },
\label{PiStar} \begin{array}{lll} \tilde\Pi ^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) &\equiv\bar \Pi^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) +\frac 12\Delta_{\;\lambda}^\lambda & \left(\eta^{\mu\alpha}\eta^{\nu\beta}+\eta^{\mu\beta}\eta^{\nu\alpha}\right) - \, \left( \eta^{\mu\nu}\Delta^{\alpha\beta}+\eta^{\alpha\beta}\Delta^{\mu\nu} \right) + \\  & & \left( \eta^{\mu\alpha}\Delta^{\nu\beta}+\eta^{\mu\beta}\Delta^{\nu\alpha}  +\, \eta^{\nu\alpha}\Delta^{\mu\beta}+\eta^{\nu\beta}\Delta^{\mu\alpha} \right) \end{array},
\label{Delta}\Delta ^{\mu \nu }=\frac 14\left(\Pi_{\;\rho }^{\rho \;,\mu\nu }+ \tilde \Gamma ^{\mu \nu }\right) - {\frac 1{32}}\left(\Pi^{\rho\;\; ,\sigma}_{\;\;\rho\;\;\sigma}+ \tilde\Gamma^\rho_{\;\rho}\right)\,\eta^{\mu\nu} .
\label{ParametrizationInvariance} \tilde\Pi _h^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left(k\right) = \tilde\Pi _{h_{\prime }}^{\mu \nu ,\,\alpha \beta }\left( k\right) .
\label{PiPiTad}\tilde\Pi^{\mu\nu ,\,\alpha\beta}\left(k\right)= \Pi^{\mu\nu ,\,\alpha\beta}\left(k\right)+ \Pi_{tad}^{\mu\nu ,\, \alpha\beta}\left(k\right),
\label{PiTad} \begin{array}{lll} \Pi_{tad}^{\mu\nu ,\,\alpha\beta}\left(k\right)\equiv\displaystyle {\frac {1}{4}}&\left(\eta^{\mu\alpha}\tilde\Gamma^{\nu\beta}+                          \eta^{\mu\beta} \tilde\Gamma^{\nu\alpha}+                          \eta^{\nu\alpha}\tilde\Gamma^{\mu\beta}+                          \eta^{\nu\beta}\tilde\Gamma^{\mu\alpha}\right)\\ &-\eta^{\mu\nu}\Delta^{\alpha\beta}-\eta^{\alpha\beta}\Delta^{\mu\nu} \end{array}.
P^{\mu\nu}_{\alpha\beta}=\frac{\delta^\mu_\alpha\delta^\nu_\beta+ \delta^\mu_\beta\delta^\nu_\alpha-\eta^{\mu\nu}\eta_{\alpha\beta}}2 \equiv 1{\hskip-.35em}1^{\mu\nu}_{\alpha\beta}- \frac{\eta^{\mu\nu}\eta_{\alpha\beta}}2
\label{DTilde} \tilde{D}_{\alpha \beta }^{\mu \nu }(k)= \frac1{k^2}\left[P_{\alpha\beta}^{\mu\nu}+ \frac1{k^2}\tilde{\Pi}_{\alpha\beta}^{\mu\nu}(k)+ \left(\frac1{k^2}\right)^2\tilde{\Pi}_{\rho\sigma}^{\mu\nu}(k) \tilde{\Pi}_{\alpha\beta}^{\rho\sigma}(k)+\dots\right]
