\label{c2} \zeta(z,y)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty\frac1{(l+y)^z}.
\label{c5} \psi(y)=\lim_{\varepsilon\rightarrow0}\left[\frac1\varepsilon- \zeta(1+\varepsilon,y) \right]
\label{c3} \int^tdy\zeta(z,y)=\frac1{1-z}\zeta(1-z,t),
\label{c4} \int^tdy y^n\zeta(z,y)=\sum^n_{l=0}\frac{(n-l)!}{n!} \frac{\Gamma(1-z)}{\Gamma(l+2-z)}t^n\zeta(z-l-1,t),
\label{defz} \zeta(z,t)=\frac1{t^z}+ \frac1{\Gamma(z)}\int^\infty_0\frac{x^{z-1}e^{-tx}}{e^x-1}dx.
\label{expaz} \zeta(z,t)=\frac1{t^z}+ \sum_{l=0}^\infty\frac{\Gamma(z+l)}{\Gamma(z)}\frac{(-t)^l}{l!} \zeta(z+l).
\zeta'(z,t)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty\frac{(-t)^l}{l!}\frac{\Gamma(z+l)}{\Gamma(z)} \left\{\left[\psi(z+l)-\psi(z)\right]\zeta(z+l)+\zeta'(z+l)\right\}- t^z {\rm ln}(z).

\label{mode} S(w)=\sum_{l\in\bbbz + h} w^{l-h} \; S_{-l}.
\label{ope} S(w) V(\psi,\zeta)=\sum_{l\in\bbbz +h} (w-\zeta)^{l-h} V(S_{-l}\psi,\zeta).
\label{int} \oint_{C} dw \; w^{l+h-1} \;S(w) \;V(\psi,\zeta) V(\chi,z)\;\Omega ,
\label{mer} \left\langle\varphi, S(w) \;V(\psi,\zeta) V(\chi,z)\;\Omega\right\rangle,
\label{sing} \varepsilon_{\psi} \sum_{l=-\infty}^{h-1} (w-z)^{l-h} \langle\varphi, V(\psi,\zeta) V(S_{-l}\chi,z)\;\Omega\rangle + \sum_{m=-\infty}^{h-1} (w-\zeta)^{m-h} \langle\varphi,V(S_{-m}\psi,\zeta)\; V(\chi,z)\;\Omega\rangle.
\label{local} S^{a}(w)\;V(\psi,\zeta) = \varepsilon_{\psi} V(\psi,\zeta)\; S^{a}(w)
\label{exp} \varepsilon_{\psi} \sum_{l=h}^{\infty} (w-z)^{l-h} \langle\varphi,V(\psi,\zeta)\; V(S_{-l}\chi,z)\;\Omega\rangle - \sum_{m=-\infty}^{h-1} (w-\zeta)^{m-h} \langle\varphi, V(S_{-m}\psi,\zeta) V(\chi,z)\;\Omega\rangle;
\label{m} \oint_{C} dw \; w^{m} \left\langle\phi, S^{a}(w) \;V(\psi,\zeta) V(\chi,z)\;\Omega \right\rangle = \sum \left\langle\phi, V(\Delta^{(1)}_{\zeta,z}(S^{a}_{m})\;\psi,\zeta)\; V(\Delta^{(2)}_{\zeta,z}(S^{a}_{m})\;\chi,z)\;\Omega \right\rangle ,
\Delta_{\zeta,z}(a) = \sum \Delta_{\zeta,z}^{(1)}(a)\otimes \Delta_{\zeta,z}^{(2)}(a).

P_{j\,j+1} G (\cdots,z_{j+1},z_j,\cdots) \quad = R_{j\,j+1}(z_j/z_{j+1})G (\cdots,z_j,z_{j+1},\cdots) \qquad (1\le j\le N-1), \label{eqn:R-symm} \\
P_{12}\cdots P_{N-1 N} G (z_2,\cdots,z_N, z_1 q^{-4}) = D_1 G (z_1,\cdots,z_N). \label{eqn:cyc}
\begin{array}{l} G (z_1,\cdots,z_jq^4 ,\cdots,z_N) = R_{j-1\,j}(z_{j-1}/z_j q^4 )^{-1} \cdots R_{1\,j}(z_{1}/z_j q^4 )^{-1}D_j^{-1} \\ \qquad\qquad \times R_{j\,N}(z_{j}/z_N) \cdots R_{j\,j+1}(z_{j}/z_{j+1}) G (z_1,\cdots,z_j,\cdots,z_N). \label{qKZ} \end{array}
\begin{array}{cl} &\d_{+}^{-1} H (z_2,\cdots,z_{n+1}|z_{n+2},\cdots,z_N,z_1\tau^4 ) \\ =&\displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1} {z_1-z_j\tau^2 \over (z_1-z_j)\tau} {}~H(z_2,\cdots,z_{n+1}|z_{n+2},\cdots,z_N,z_1) \\ -&\displaystyle\sum_{j=2}^{n+1} {(1-\tau^2)z_1 \over (z_1-z_j)\tau} \prod_{k=2 \atop k\neq j}^{n+1} {z_j-z_k\tau^2 \over (z_j-z_k)\tau} {}~H(z_1, \stackrel{j}{\hat{\cdots}},z_{n+1}| z_j,z_{n+2},\cdots,z_N), \end{array} \label{eqn:B}
\begin{array}{cl} &\d_{-}\tau^{-2}\, H(z_1\tau^{-4},z_2,\cdots,z_n|z_{n+1},\cdots,z_N) \\ =& \displaystyle\prod_{j=n+1}^{N} {z_1 -z_j \tau^{-2} \over (z_1 -z_j )\tau^{-1}} {}~H(z_1,\cdots,z_n|z_{n+1},\cdots,z_N) \\ -&\displaystyle\sum_{j=n+1}^{N} {(1-\tau^{-2})z_j \over (z_1 -z_j )\tau ^{-1}} \prod_{k=n+1 \atop k\neq j}^{N} {z_j -z_k \tau^{-2}\over (z_j -z_k )\tau ^{-1}} {}~H(z_2,\cdots,z_n,z_j|z_1,z_{n+1}, \stackrel{j}{\hat{\cdots}},z_N). \label{eqn:C} \end{array}
H(z_1 , \cdots , z_N )= (S_{n N} F)(z_1,\cdots ,z_N),
(S_{n N} F)(z_1,\cdots ,z_N)= \prod_{\mu =1}^{n} \oint_{C} dx_{\mu } F(x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ) \Psi (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ). \label{intform}
\begin{array}{rcl} \vartheta (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_j \tau^4 ,\cdots,z_N ) & = & \vartheta (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ) \displaystyle\prod_{\mu =1}^{n} \frac{-z_j \tau}{x_{\mu }}, \\ \vartheta (x_1 , \cdots, x_{\mu}\tau^4 , \cdots, x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ) & = & \vartheta (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ) \displaystyle\prod_{j=1}^{N} \frac{-x_{\mu } \tau}{z_j }. \end{array} \label{pstr}
F(x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots ,z_N ) =\frac{\Delta ^{(n l)} (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_n |                       z_{n+1}, \cdots , z_N )}       {\displaystyle\prod_{j=1}^{n}\prod_{i=n+1}^{N}        (z_i -z_j \tau ^2 )}, \label{Delta}
\begin{array}{l} \displaystyle{\tilde f}(x|z_1,..,z_N)= \displaystyle\frac{x-z_1 \tau }{x-z_1 \tau^3 } f(x|z_1\tau^4,z_2,\cdots,z_N) \\ +\displaystyle \frac{z_1(-\tau)^{4-N}}{x\prod_{j=2}^N(z_j-z_1\tau^2)} \left\{\frac{\prod_{j=1}^N(x-z_j \tau)}{x-z_1\tau^3} -\tau^{2(N-2)}\prod_{j=2}^N(x-z_j\tau^{-1})\right\} f(z_1\tau^3|z_1\tau^4,z_2,\cdots,z_N).\\ \end{array}\label{til}
h^{(N)} (x|z_1 , \cdots , z_N ):=\frac{1}{x} \left\{ \prod_{j=1}^{N} (x-z_j \tau ) - \tau ^{2N} \prod_{j=1}^{N} (x-z_j \tau ^{-1}) \right\}. \label{defH}
\Delta (x|z_1|z_2,\cdots,z_N) =(x-z_1\tau)\sum_{\kappa=0}^{N-3}(1-\tau^{2(N-2-\kappa)}) (-\tau)^\kappa x^{N-3-\kappa}\sum_{\lambda=0}^\kappa(-z_1\tau^2)^\lambda \sigma_{\kappa-\lambda}(z_2 \cdots z_N), \label{eqn:n=1}
\Delta ^{(n l)}(x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_n |                       z_{n+1}, \cdots , z_N ) =\det \left( A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x_{\mu }| z_1 , \cdots , z_n |                       z_{n+1}, \cdots , z_N ) \right) _{1\leq \lambda , \mu \leq n}. \label{determ}
\begin{array}{rl} A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x| a_1 , \cdots , a_n | b_1 , \cdots b_l ):= & \displaystyle\prod_{j=1}^{n} (x-a_j \tau ) f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x| a_1 , \cdots , a_n | b_1 , \cdots ,b_l ) \\ & + \tau ^{2(l-n+\lambda -1)} \displaystyle\prod_{i=1}^{l} (x-b_i \tau ^{-1}) g_{\lambda }^{(n)} (x| a_1 , \cdots , a_n ). \label{defA} \end{array} \label{nnA}
A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x| a_1 , \cdots , a_n | b_1 , \cdots b_l ) \mbox{ is linear with respect to $b_i $'s.} \label{blin}
\begin{array}{cl} & \Delta^{(n l)} (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | a_1 , \cdots , a_{n-1}, a | b_1 , \cdots ,b_{l-1}, a\tau ^2 ) = \displaystyle\prod_{\mu =1}^n (x_{\mu }-a\tau ) \sum_{\nu =1}^n (-1)^{n+\nu } ~\times \\ \times & \displaystyle h^{(N-2)} (x_{\nu }| a_1 , \cdots , a_{n-1}, b_1 , \cdots ,b_{l-1}) \Delta^{(n-1 l-1)} (x_1 , \stackrel{\nu }{\hat{\cdots }}, x_n | a_1 , \cdots , a_{n-1}| b_1 , \cdots ,b_{l-1}), \end{array} \label{recD}
\begin{array}{rl} & {\rm RHS~ of ~(\ref{eqn:B})} =\displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1} (z_j -z_1 \tau ^2 )^{-1} \displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1}\displaystyle\prod_{i=n+2}^{N} (z_i -z_j \tau ^2 )^{-1} \times \\ \times & \displaystyle\prod_{\mu =1}^{n} \displaystyle\oint_{C} dx_{\mu } \hat{\Delta }^{(n l)}(x_1 , \cdots , x_n |                         z_1 | z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1} |                         z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_N ) \Psi (x_1 , \cdots , x_n | z_1 , \cdots , z_N ), \end{array}
\begin{array}{cl} &H^{(n l)} (z_2 , \cdots ,z_{n+1} |                       z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_{N}, z_1 \tau ^4 ) \\ =& \displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1} (z_1 \tau ^4 -z_j \tau ^2 )^{-1} \displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1}\displaystyle\prod_{i=n+2}^{N} (z_i -z_j \tau ^2 )^{-1} I^{(n l)} (z_2 , \cdots ,z_{n+1} |                       z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_{N}, z_1 \tau ^4 ), \end{array}
\begin{array}{cl} &\displaystyle \widetilde{A}_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x|z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1} | z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_N , z_1 \tau ^4) \\ =& \displaystyle\frac{x-z_1 \tau }{x-z_1 \tau ^3} A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x| z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1}| z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_N , z_1 \tau ^4) \\ +& \displaystyle\frac{z_1 (-\tau )^{4-N}}{x} \left\{ \frac{x-z_1 \tau }{x-z_1 \tau ^3} \prod_{j=2}^{N} \frac{x-z_j \tau } {z_j -z_1 \tau ^2 } -\tau ^{2(N-2)} \prod_{j=2}^{N} \frac{x-z_j \tau ^{-1}}{z_j -z_1 \tau ^2 } \right\} \times \\ \times & A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (z_1 \tau ^3 | z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1}|z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_N ,  z_1 \tau ^4 ). \end{array} \label{DA}
\begin{array}{rl} &{\rm det} \left( \widetilde{A}_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x_{\mu }| z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1} | z_{n+2} , \cdots, z_N , z_1 \tau ^4 ) \right) _{1\leq \lambda , \mu \leq n} \\ =& (-\tau )^n \hat{\Delta }^{(n l)}(x_1 , \cdots , x_n |                         z_1 | z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1} |                         z_{n+2}, \cdots , z_N ). \end{array} \label{DAB}
\begin{array}{cl} &\det \left( \widetilde{A}_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x_{\mu }| z_2 , \cdots , z_{n+1} | z_{n+2} , \cdots, z_N , z_1 \tau ^4 ) \right) _{1\leq \lambda , \mu \leq n} \\ =&\displaystyle\prod_{\mu =1}^{n} \frac{x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau }{x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau ^3 } {\rm det}\left( A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x_{\mu }| z'| z'', z_1 \tau ^4 ) \right) _{ 1 \leq \lambda , \mu \leq n} \\ +&\displaystyle\prod_{\mu =1}^n (x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau ) \sum_{\nu =1 }^n \prod_{\mu =1 \atop \mu \neq \nu }^n \frac{g(x_{\nu }|z_1 |z'|z'')}{x_{\nu }-z_1 \tau ^3 } {\rm det}\left( B_{\lambda \mu }^{(n l)} \right) _{ 1 \leq \lambda , \mu \leq n}, \label{n-fold} \end{array}
B_{\lambda \mu }^{(n l)}=\left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \displaystyle A_{\lambda }^{(n l)} {}~(x_{\mu }|z'|z'', z_1 \tau ^4 )/ (x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau ^3 ), & \mbox{if $\lambda \neq \nu $,}\\ f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (z_1 \tau ^3 | z'|z'', z_1 \tau ^4 ), & \mbox{if $\lambda =\nu $.} \end{array} \right. \label{eqn:B=}
B'^{(n l)}_{\lambda \mu }= \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \displaystyle\prod_{j=2}^{n+1} (x_{\mu }-z_j \tau ) \frac{f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (x_{\mu } |z'|z'',z_1 \tau ^4 )|_{z_i =z_1 \tau ^2 } - f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (z_1\tau^3 |z'|z'',z_1 \tau ^4 )|_{z_i =z_1 \tau ^2 }} {x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau }  & \\ +\tau ^{2(l-n+\lambda -1)} (x_{\mu }-z_1 \tau ) \displaystyle\prod_{m=n+2 \atop m \neq i}^{N} (x_{\mu }-z_{m} \tau ^{-1}) g_{\lambda }^{(n)} (x_{\mu }|z' ), & \mbox{if $\mu \neq \nu $,} \\ f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (z_1 \tau ^3 |z'|z'',z_1 \tau ^4 )|_{z_i =z_1 \tau ^2 }, & \mbox{if $\mu =\nu $.} \end{array} \right. \label{Atr}
\begin{array}{cl} & \displaystyle\sum_{\nu =1 }^n h^{(N-2)} (x_{\nu }| z', \stackrel{i}{\hat{z''}})~ {\rm det}\left( B'^{(n l)}_{\lambda \mu } \right) \\ =&(-1)^{N-1} \tau ^{l-2} (1-\tau ^2 ) \displaystyle\sum_{j=2}^{n+1}  \prod_{k=2 \atop k\neq j}^{n+1}  \frac{z_k -z_1 \tau ^2 }{(z_j -z_k )\tau }  \prod_{m=n+2 \atop m \neq i}^{N}  (z_{m} -z_j \tau ^2)  \times \\ \times&\displaystyle\sum_{\nu =1 }^n (-1)^{n+\nu } h^{(N-2)} (x_{\nu }| z', \stackrel{i}{\hat{z''}})~ \Delta ^{(n-1 l-1)} (\stackrel{\nu }{\hat{x}}| \stackrel{j}{\hat{z'}}|\stackrel{i}{\hat{z''}}, z_j ). \end{array} \label{res}
f_{\lambda }^{(n l)} (z_1 \tau ^3 | z'|z'', z_1 \tau ^4 ) =(-\tau )^{l-n+\lambda -2} (1-\tau ^2 )\varphi ^{(n~ l-2)}_{\lambda~ l-n+\lambda -2} (z'|z'') \label{f1}

{\cal L}_F =  \bar\psi [-i\sigma_\mu(\partial_\mu + ia_\mu +iC_\mu) +M]\psi - \frac{i}{8\pi\alpha} \epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}a_\mu\partial_\nu a_\lambda\;, \label{SF}
{\cal L}_B = \frac{1}{2}B^*_{\mu} [-i\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}(\partial_\nu + ia_\nu+iC_\nu) +M\delta_{\mu\lambda}]B_\lambda - \frac{i}{8\pi(\alpha-\frac{1}{2})} \epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}a_\mu\partial_\nu a_\lambda\;, \label{SB}
{\cal L}_{FF} =  \bar\Psi [-i\frac{2}{3}L_\mu(\partial_\mu + ia_\mu +iC_\mu) +M]\Psi - \frac{i}{8\pi(\alpha-1)} \epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}a_\mu\partial_\nu a_\lambda\;, \label{SFF}
Z_F[C] = Z_B[C] = Z_{FF}[C]\;. \label{EQ}
Z_F[C]=\sum^\infty_{n=1}\frac{(-1)^n}{n!}\int\prod^n_{i=1}   {\cal D}{\bf X}_i exp\{-\sum^{n}_{i=1}[\int dt (M\sqrt{\dot{\bf X}_i^2} +i{\bf C}\cdot\dot{\bf X}_i) -\frac{i}{2}\Phi[\frac{\dot{\bf X}_i}{|\dot{\bf X}_i|}] -i\frac{\alpha}{2}\Theta_{ii}] +i\alpha\sum_{i<j}\Theta_{ij}\}\;, \label{SFa}
\Theta_{ii}-2\Phi = 4\pi ~~~(mod~~ 8\pi)\;; \label{psiii}
\Theta_{ij} \in 4\pi{\bf Z}\;. \label{psiij}
Z_F[C]=\sum^\infty_{n=1}\frac{1}{n!}\int\prod^n_{i=1}   {\cal D}{\bf X}_i exp\{-\sum^{n}_{i=1}[\int dt( M\sqrt{\dot{\bf X}_i^2} +i{\bf C}\cdot\dot{\bf X}_i) -i\Phi[\frac{\dot{\bf X}_i}{|\dot{\bf X}_i|}] -i\frac{\alpha-\frac{1}{2}}{2}\Theta_{ii}] +i(\alpha-\frac{1}{2})\sum_{i<j}\Theta_{ij}\}\;. \label{ZFb}
D_{\mu\nu}=\frac{1}{p^2+M^2}(\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda +\frac{p_\mu p_\nu}{M}+M\delta_{\mu\nu})\;, {}~~~~D^{-1}_{\mu\nu} = -\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda + M\delta_{\mu\nu}\;.
\Sigma_{\mu\nu}(p,M) = -\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda \frac{(\alpha-1/2)^2}{4}(\frac{1}{\epsilon}+\frac{1}{2} ln\frac{\mu^2}{p^2+M^2} + ~finite~) + ...\;,

Z = \int d \Phi\, \exp \Bigl\{ - N Tr W ( \Phi ) \Bigr\} \label{eq:11}
H = \frac{1}{2} Tr \left\{- \frac{1}{N^2}\frac{\partial^2}{\partial\Phi^2} + \frac{1}{4} \left( \frac{ \partial W }{ \partial \Phi} \right)^{2} - \frac{1}{2 N} \frac{\partial^2 W}{\partial\Phi^{2}}  \right\} \label{eq:12}

W(\Phi) = Tr \Phi^2 - \frac{2 g}{3} Tr \Phi^3 ,
h_{n} = - \frac{1}{2} \frac{1}{N^2} \frac{\partial^2}{\partial\lambda_n^2} + \frac{1}{2} \{ g^2 \lambda_n^4 - 2g\lambda_n^3 + \lambda_n^2 + 2g\lambda_n - 1 \} \label{eq:21}
E=\sum_{n=0}^{N-1} e_{n}  \label{tote}
E = \sum_{n=0}^{N-1} e_{n} = \int_{E_{0}^{\ast}}^{E_{F}^{\ast}} dE E \rho(E) - \frac{1}{2} E_{F}^{\ast} + \frac{1}{2} E_{0}^{\ast} + \frac{1}{12} \frac{1}{ \rho(E_{F}^{\ast})} - \frac {1}{12} \frac{1}{\rho(E_{0}^{\ast})} + \cdots \label{eq:22}
\rho (E) = \frac{d}{dE} N(E)
N(E) = \frac {N}{\pi}\int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \sqrt{2(E-V)} - \frac{1}{24\pi N}  \int_{a}^{b} d \lambda \frac{d^2V}{d\lambda^2} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2(E-V)}} + O \left( \frac{1}{N^3} \right) \label{eq:23}
N( E_{0}^{\ast} ) = \frac {1}{2}
\tilde{N} ( E_{F}^{\ast} ) = N + \frac{1}{2}
NE = N^{2} \left( E_{0} + E_{2} \frac {1}{N^2} + O \left( \frac{1}{N^4} \right) \right) \label{eq:24}
E_{0} = E_{F}^{(0)} - \frac{1}{3\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda [2(E_{F}^{(0)} - V)]^{\frac{3}{2}}  \label{e0}
E_{2} = \frac{1}{24\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \frac{d^2V}{d\lambda^2} \frac{1} {\sqrt{2(E_{F}^{(0)} - V )}} - \frac{1}{24} \left[ \frac{1}{\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \frac {1}{\sqrt{2(E_{F}^{(0)} - V )}} \right]^{-1} \label{e2}
\frac{1}{\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \sqrt{2(E_{F}^{(0)} - V )} = 1 \label{fl}
E_{0}  \sim  (g - g_{c})^{11/4}  \;\;\;\;\;\;\;\;  g > g_{c}
NE = N^{2} ( g - g_{c} )^{\frac{11}{4}} \left( B_{1} + B_{2} \frac {1}{N^2 ( g - g_{c} )^{\frac{5}{2}}} + \cdots \right)
\frac{N}{\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \sqrt{2(e_{n} - V )} + O\left( \frac{1}{N} \right)  = n + \frac{1}{2} \label{qu}
E_{F}^{(1)} = - \frac{1}{2} \left[ \frac{1}{\pi} \int_{a}^{b} d\lambda \frac{1}{\sqrt{2(E_{F}^{(0)} - V )}} \right ]^{-1}
\frac{1}{N} \langle tr \Phi^{n} \rangle = \left ( \frac{\partial E (\beta) } {\partial \beta } \right)_{\beta = 0}. \label{eq:31}
\langle tr \Phi^{n} \rangle = N^{2} \int_{a}^{b} d \lambda \lambda^{n} \rho(\lambda)
\rho (\lambda) = \frac{1}{\pi} \sqrt{2(E_{F}^{0} - V )}
\langle tr \Phi^{n} \rangle = N^{2} (g_{c} - g)^{\frac{3}{2}} \left ( A_{1}^{(n)} + A_{2}^{(n)} \frac{1}{N^{2} ( g_{c} - g ) ^{\frac{5}{2}}} + \cdots \right) \label{eq:32}
\langle tr \Phi^{n} \rangle = N^{2} (g - g_{c} )^{\frac{3}{2}} \left ( C_{1}^{(n)} + C_{2}^{(n)} \frac{1}{N^{2} ( g - g_{c} ) ^{\frac{5}{2}}} + \cdots \right) \label{eq:33}
W = Tr \Phi^2 - \frac{2g}{3} Tr\Phi^3 - \frac{2 \beta_n}{n} Tr \Phi^n .
\left( \frac{\partial E }{\partial \beta_n } \right)_{\beta_n = 0 } = - \langle Tr\Phi^n\rangle + g \langle Tr\Phi^{n+3} \rangle + \frac{1}{2N} \sum_{k=0}^{n-2} \langle Tr \Phi^k Tr \Phi^{n-2-k} \rangle.

\begin{array}{ccc} z\bar z = q^2\bar z z \ , & \qquad & \partial\bar\partial = q^2 \bar\partial\partial\ , \\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ dzd\bar z= - q^2d\bar z dz\ , &  \qquad &(dz)^2=(d\bar z)^2=0\ , \\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ zd\bar z = q^2(d\bar z) z\ , & \qquad & \bar z dz = q^{-2}(dz)\bar z\ ,\\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ zdz = q^{-2}(dz) z\ , & \qquad & \bar z d\bar z = q^2(d\bar z)\bar z\ ,\\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ \partial z=1+q^{-2}z\partial\ , & \qquad & \bar\partial\bar z=1+q^2\bar z\bar\partial\ , \\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ \partial\bar z=q^{-2}\bar z\partial\ , &  \qquad & \bar\partial z=q^2 z\bar\partial\ , \\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ dz\bar\partial=q^{-2}\bar\partial dz\ , &  \qquad & d\bar z\partial=q^2\partial d\bar z\ ,  \\ \qquad & \qquad & \qquad \\ d\bar z\bar\partial=q^2\bar\partial d\bar z\ , &  \qquad & dz\partial=q^{-2}\partial dz\ . \end{array}                              \label{20}

I = \int d^2 x \sqrt{-g} e^{-2 \phi} [       R + \gamma g^{\alpha \beta} \partial_{\alpha} \phi       \partial_{\beta} \phi + V(e^{- \phi} )        - \frac{1}{4} e^{\epsilon \phi} F^2 ] . \label{oaction}
D_{\alpha}D_{\beta} \Omega - g_{\alpha \beta} D \cdot D \Omega  + \frac{\gamma}{8} (g_{\alpha \beta} \frac{(D \Omega )^2 } {\Omega} - 2 \frac{D_{\alpha } \Omega D_{\beta} \Omega} {\Omega} ) + \frac{1}{2} g_{\alpha \beta} \Omega V(\Omega ) \label{eomg}
R + \frac{\gamma}{4} ( \frac{(D \Omega )^2}{\Omega^2} - 2 \frac{D \cdot D \Omega}{\Omega} ) + \frac{d}{d \Omega} (V( \Omega ) \Omega) - \frac{1}{4} (1- \frac{\epsilon}{2} ) \Omega^{- \epsilon /2} F^2 = 0 , \label{eomo}
g_{\alpha \beta} = \left[\begin{array}{cc}                     - \alpha^2 & 0 \\                     0          & \beta^2   \end{array} \right] .
\sqrt{-g} R = 2 [ \partial_0 (\frac{\partial_0 \beta}{\alpha} )  - \partial_1 (\frac{\partial_1 \alpha}{\beta} ) ] .
\Gamma_{11}^0 = \frac{\beta \partial_0 \beta}{\alpha^2},   \ \   \Gamma_{01}^0 = \frac{\partial_1 \alpha}{\alpha},   \ \   \Gamma_{00}^0 = \frac{\partial_0 \alpha}{\alpha} \label{chris}
I = \int d^2 x [ 4 r \frac{\partial_1 \alpha}{\beta} + \gamma \frac{\alpha}{\beta} + r^2 V(r) \alpha \beta + r^{2 - \epsilon } \frac{f^2}{2 \alpha \beta} ] , \label{raction}
4r \frac{\partial_1 \alpha}{\beta^2} + \gamma \frac{\alpha}{\beta^2} - r^2 V(r) \alpha + r^{2 - \epsilon}  \frac{f^2}{2 \alpha \beta^2}    = 0 \label{reom0}
4r \frac{\partial_1 \beta}{\beta^2} + (\gamma - 4) \frac{1}{\beta} + r^2 V(r) \beta - r^{2 - \epsilon} \frac{f^2}{ 2 \alpha^2 \beta} = 0 , \label{reom1}
\partial_0 ( \frac{r^{2- \epsilon }}{\alpha \beta} f ) = 0

H_a \varphi = h_a \varphi + \sum^m_{j = 1} f_{\mu_j} \overline{\varphi}^a_{\mu_j}
h_a = \sum^N_{b \neq a} \frac{( \lambda^a , \lambda^b )}{Z_a - Z_b} -       \sum^m_{j = i}    \frac{( \alpha_j , \lambda^a )}{Z_a - \mu_j}
f_{\mu_j} = \sum^m_{i \neq j} \frac{(\alpha_j , \alpha_i )}{\mu_j - \mu_i} -             \sum^N_{a = 1}    \frac{(\alpha_j , \lambda^a)}{\mu_j - Z_a}
\overline{\varphi}^a_{\mu_j} = \sum_{\mbox{\scriptsize{part}} \atop \alpha_j \in I_a} \prod^N_{b = 1} \sum_{\mbox{\scriptsize{perm}}} \frac{E^b_{- \alpha_{1_a}} E^b_{- \alpha_{2_a}} \ldots   E^b_{- \alpha_{q_a}} | \lambda^b >}  {(\mu_{1_a} - \mu_{2_a}) (\mu_{2_a} - \mu_{3_a}) \ldots (\mu_{q_a} - Z_q )}.

U(\psi, t)= \sqrt{\psi} f(F(\psi)-2t) .
U(\psi,t=0)=1
f(F(\psi))=\psi^{- {1\over 2}}
U(r) \approx {r \over b} (1 -{1 \over \sqrt{2} b} \sqrt{1-({b \over r_{2m}})^{2}}(| r^{2}- r^{2}_{2m}|)^{1/2}).
g \approx -{2M \over r} + {r \over 2b} - {1 \over 3 \sqrt{2} b^{2}} \sqrt{1-({b \over r_{2m}})^{2}}(|r^{2}-r^{2}_{2m}|)^{3/2},
U(r) \approx {r \over (r^{2}-16 \kappa)^{1/2}}
ds^{2}_{targ}= {1 \over \psi}(1 -{B \over 4\psi}) d\psi^{2} + 4(1- {B \over 4\psi}) d \psi d \sigma + A d \sigma^{2}
\omega^{2}=4\psi ; \ \chi ={1 \over 2} \sigma +{\psi \over A} -{B \over 4A} \ln 4\psi
ds^{2}_{targ}=4A d \chi^{2} -{1 \over A} {1 \over \omega^{2}}({\omega^{2} } -B)({\omega^{2} } -A-B) d \omega^{2}
\Omega =  \int\limits_{}^{\omega} {dy \over y} \sqrt{ \pm (y^{2} -B) (y^{2} -A-B)},
ds^{2}_{targ}=4A d\chi^{2} -( \pm {1 \over A}) d \Omega^{2}.
\beta^{T}=-[{1 \over 4A} \partial_{\chi}^{2} T - (\pm A) \partial_{\Omega}^{2}T] .
\beta^{\hat{U}}=(\pm A) \partial_{\Omega}^{2} \hat{U} -{4 \over A} \hat{U}
\partial_{t} \hat{U} = ( \pm ) A \partial_{\Omega}^{2} \hat{U}  -{4 \over A} \hat{U},
\hat{U}|_{t=0}= \phi (\Omega) \equiv e^{-{\omega^{2}(\Omega) \over A}} (\omega (\Omega))^{{2B \over A}}
\hat{U} (\Omega, t) = e^{- 4t/A} \sum_{k=1}^{+ \infty} a_{k} e^{A({\pi k \over \Lambda})^{2} t} \sin {\pi k \over \Lambda} \Omega ,
\Omega = {1 \over 2} \sqrt{(\omega^{2}-B)(\omega^{2}-A-B)} - {A+2B \over 2} \ln{\sqrt{\omega^{2}-B} + \sqrt{\omega^{2}-A-B} \over \sqrt{A}}
\hat{U}|_{\Omega=0} =0
\hat{U} (\Omega,t)={ e^{-{4t \over A}} \over \sqrt{At} } {1 \over 2\sqrt{\pi}} \int\limits_{0}^{+ \infty}[e^{-{(\Omega - \xi)^{2} \over 4At}} - e^{-{(\Omega + \xi)^{2} \over 4At}} ] \phi (\xi) d\xi ,
\xi=  \int\limits_{\sqrt{A+B}}^{\omega(\xi)} {dy \over y} \sqrt{({y^{2} } -B) ({y^{2} } -A-B)} .

H = -\sum_{i} \sum_{\sigma = \uparrow,\downarrow}(c_{i,\sigma}^{\dagger} c_{i+1,\sigma} + c_{i+1,\sigma}^{\dagger} c_{i,\sigma}) + U\sum_{i}(n_{i,\uparrow}-\frac{1}{2})(n_{i,\downarrow}-\frac{1}{2}) .
{\cal E}_{i}^{n}= c_{i,\uparrow}^{\dagger}c_{i+n,\downarrow} \;, \; \;{\cal F}_{i}^{n}= c_{i,\downarrow}^{\dagger}c_{i+n,\uparrow} \;, \; \;{\cal H}_{i}^{n}= c_{i,\uparrow}^{\dagger}c_{i+n,\uparrow} - c_{i,\downarrow}^{\dagger}c_{i+n,\downarrow}.
E_{0} = \sum_{i} {\cal E}_{i}^{0} \;, \; \; F_{0}= \sum_{i} {\cal F}_{i}^{0}\;, \; \; H_{0}=\sum_{i} {\cal H}_{i}^{0} \;,
c_{i,\downarrow} \rightarrow c_{i,\downarrow}\;, \; \; c_{i,\uparrow} \rightarrow (-1)^{i}c_{i,\uparrow}^{\dagger}
[E_{0},F_{0}]=H_{0}\;,\;\; [H_{0},E_{0}]=2E_{0}\;,\;\; [H_{0},F_{0}]=-2F_{0}.
[E_{0},F_{1}] = H_{1}\;,\; \; [F_{0},E_{1}]  =  -H_{1}\;,\; \;  [H_{0},E_{1}] =  2E_{1}\;,
[E_{0},H_{1}]  =  -2E_{1}\;,\;\;  [F_{0},H_{1}]  = 2F_{1}\;, \;\; [H_{0},F_{1}]  =  -2F_{1}\;,
\\ \, [E_{0},E_{1}]  =  0 \;,\;\;   [F_{0},F_{1}]  =  0 \;,\;\;  [H_{0},H_{1}]  =  0 \;.

\gamma^2(r)=r^2\left( 1- {r_s\over r}\right) ^{1-{2M\over r_s}}. \label{pdg}

\label{m} \lsta{{\bf p} i} \hspace{-0.1cm} {\bf p'} j \rangle \equiv 2 \omega_{\bf \small p} \delta_{i+} \delta_{j+} \delta({\bf p} - {\bf p'}) + 2 e^{i \alpha} \omega_{\bf \small p} \delta_{i-} \delta_{j-} \delta({\bf p} - {\bf p'}), \mbox{ where } i,j \in \{+,-\}.

\label{sm} \tilde{\cal D} x = \frac{1}{(2 \pi)^4} \lim_{n \to \infty} \left( \prod_{k=1}^n \frac{d^4 x_k}{(2 \pi)^4} \right) \left(\frac{\pi}{\delta N} \right)^{2n+2} (i \epsilon(N))^{n+1}.
\label{ghjk} {\cal G}_{\alpha}(x'' -x') = \int_{- \infty}^{\infty} dN(\tau''-\tau') \left\{ \int \tilde{\cal D} x \left[ \Theta \left( \frac{\dot{x}_0}{N} \right) + e^{i \alpha} \Theta \left( \frac{-\dot{x}_0}{N} \right) \right] \exp \left( -i \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau \left( \frac{\dot{x}^2}{4N} + N m^2 \right) \right) \right\}.
\Delta_+(x''-x') = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} dN(\tau''-\tau') \int {\cal D}p {\cal D}x \left( \prod_{\tau'}^{\tau''} \Theta(-p_0) \right) \exp \left( i \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau (p \dot{x} -N {\cal H}_0) \right).
\label{t} \tilde{{\cal H}}_0 \equiv p_0^2 + p_0 \omega_{\bf \small p} =0,
\label{s} S_E(p_{\mu}, x^{\mu}, \eta, {\cal P}, \rho, \bar{C}, N, \Pi) = \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau ( p_{\mu} \dot{x}^{\mu} + \dot{\eta} {\cal P} + \dot{N} \Pi + \dot{\bar{C}} \rho - \{K, \Omega \}).
\label{BR} PI = \int {\cal D} p {\cal D} x {\cal D} \eta {\cal D P D} N {\cal D} \Pi {\cal D} \rho {\cal D} \bar{C} \exp(i S_E).
\label{re} (-1)^n (-1)^{\frac{n^2+n}{2}}\delta (n+1) (-1)^{\frac{n^2- n}{2}} = (n+1) \delta = \tau'' - \tau'.
\label{pi} PI = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} dN (\tau'' - \tau') \int {\cal D} p {\cal D} x \exp \left( i \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau (p_{\mu} \dot{x}^{\mu} - N \tilde{\cal H}_0) \right).
\label{x2} K \left( x(\tau'), x(\tau''),N,\tau''- \tau' \right) \equiv \int \tilde{\cal D} x \hspace{0.25em} \Theta \left( \epsilon(N) \dot{x}_0 \right) \exp \left( i \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau \left( \frac{\dot{x}^2}{4N} + N m^2 \right) \right)
K \left( x', x'', N, (\tau''-\tau') \right) = 2 i N \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d t \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} K \left( x', \tilde{x}, N, t \right) \frac{\partial}{\partial x^0} K \left( x, x'', N, (\tau''- \tau'-t ) \right) \vline_{x=\tilde{x}}.
\label{PDX}  K \left( x', x'', N, (\tau''- \tau') \right) = i N \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d t \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} \left\{ K \left( x', x, N, t \right) \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial_0} K \left( x, x'', N, (\tau''-\tau'-t ) \right) \right\} \vline_{x=\tilde{x}}.
\label{x3} K' \left( x', x'',N,\tau''- \tau' \right) \equiv \int \tilde{\cal D} x \hspace{0.25em} \Theta \left( - \epsilon(N) \dot{x}_0 \right) \exp \left( i \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d \tau \left( \frac{\dot{x}^2}{4N} + N m^2 \right) \right)
\label{PDX-}  K'(x', x'', N, (\tau''-\tau')) = - i N \int_{\tau'}^{\tau''} d t \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} \left\{ K' \left( x', x, N, t \right) \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial_0} K' \left( x, x'', N, (\tau''-\tau'-t ) \right) \right\} \vline_{x=\tilde{x}}.
\Delta_+(x''-x') = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} dT \int \tilde{\cal D} x \hspace{0.25em} \Theta \left( -\epsilon(T) \dot{x}^0 \right) \exp \left( i \int_0^T dt \left( \frac{\dot{x}^2}{4} + m^2 \right) \right).
\Delta_+(x''-x') = i \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} dT \int_0^T d \tilde{t} \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} \delta_+(x''-\tilde{x}, T, \tilde{t}) \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial_0} \delta_+(\tilde{x}-x', \tilde{t}, 0),
\label{Dm} \Delta_-(x''-x') = -i \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} \Delta_-(x''-\tilde{x}) \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial_0} \Delta_-(\tilde{x} - x').
\label{cl} \int_{\Sigma(\tilde{x}^0)} d^3 {\bf \tilde{x}} \hspace{0.25em} {\cal G}_{\alpha}(x''-\tilde{x}) \stackrel{\leftrightarrow}{\partial_0} {\cal G}_{\alpha}(\tilde{x}- x') = - i \Delta_+(x''-x') + i e^{2i \alpha} \Delta_-(x''-x'),

[x_r,p_r] = i \hbar + i \hbar (q^2 -1) \sum_{s\le r} \left( \frac{q^2+1}{2}\right)^{s-1} \left(\frac{x_s^2}{4 L_s^2}+\frac{p_s^2}{4 K_s^2} \right) \label{xpcr}

[x_s,p_r]  =  i \frac{K_s}{L_s} \frac{q-1}{q+1} \{ p_s, p_r\}
[p_s,p_r]  =  -i \frac{L_s}{K_s} \frac{q-1}{q+1} \{ x_s, p_r\}

[H_{ij},H_{kl}] = 0
[X_{ij},X_{kl}] = 0
[Y_{ij},Y_{kl}] = 0
H_i X_{ij} = q X_{ij}H_i \hskip 1cm \forall j \geq i
H_{j+1} X_{ij} = q X_{ij}H_{j+1} \hskip 1cm \forall  i\leq j
H_k X_{ij} =  X_{ij}H_k \hskip 1cm  k \ne i , j+1
H_{ij} X_{kl} \approx  X_{kl}H_{ij} \hskip 1cm \forall i,j,k,l
\ \ \ \ \ \ H_{ij} X_{k} =  X_{k}H_{ij} \hskip 2cm i\leq  k \leq j-1
H_{ij} X_{ij} = q X_{ij}H_{ij} \ \ \
H_{i+1,j+1} X_{ij} = q X_{ij}H_{i+1,j+1}
[ H_{i,j+1}, X_{ij} ] =  [ H_{i+1,j}, X_{ij} ] = 0
Y_{kl} X_{ij} \approx X_{ij}Y_{kl} \hskip 1cm (k,l)\ne(i,j)
Y_{i} X_{i} - X_{i}Y_{i} = (q - q^{-1} ) H_{i}H_{i+1}
q^{-1} Y_{ij} X_{ij} - q X_{ij}Y_{ij} = (q^{-1}-q) H_{i,j+1}H_{i+1, j}

[x_\alpha, x_\beta] = n_{\alpha, \beta} x_{\alpha + \beta}, \label{b.1}
[x_\alpha, x_\beta] = 0, \label{b.2}
(h, h_\alpha) = \alpha(h), \qquad h \in {\goth h}. \label{b.3}
[x_\alpha, x_{-\alpha}] = h_\alpha, \label{b.4}
n_{\alpha, \beta} = - n_{-\alpha, -\beta}. \label{b.5}
{\goth g}_\sigma \equiv \{ x \in {\goth g} \mid \sigma(x) = x\}. \label{b.6}
\sigma(h_\alpha) = - h_\alpha, \qquad \sigma(x_\alpha) = -x_{-\alpha}. \label{b.7}
h_i \equiv \frac{2}{(\alpha_i, \alpha_i)} h_{\alpha_i} \qquad x_{\pm i} \equiv x_{\pm\alpha_i} \label{b.8}
[h_i, h_j] = 0, \qquad [h_i, x_{\pm j}] = \pm k_{ji} x_{\pm j}, \qquad [x_{+i}, x_{-j}] = \delta_{ij} h_i, \label{b.9}
{\goth g} = {\goth n}_- \oplus {\goth h} \oplus {\goth n}_+, \label{b.10}
{\goth n_\pm} \equiv \bigoplus_{\alpha \in \Delta_\pm} {\goth g}^\alpha \label{b.11}
{\goth b}_\pm \equiv {\goth h} \oplus {\goth n}_\pm \label{b.12}
{\goth p}_{\pm \Psi} \equiv {\goth b}_{\pm} \oplus \bigoplus_{\alpha \in [\Psi] \cap \Sigma_\mp} {\goth g}^\alpha, \label{b.13}
{\goth g}_{\Bbb R} = {\goth u} \oplus J^{{\goth g}_{\Bbb R}} {\goth a} \oplus {\goth n}_{+\Bbb R}, \label{b.14}
{\goth h}_{\Bbb R} = {\goth a} \oplus J^{{\goth g}_{\Bbb R}}{\goth a}. \label{b.14a}
G = U N_+ A^*, \label{b.15}
{\goth g} = \bigoplus_{m \in {\Bbb Z}} {\goth g}_m, \label{b.16}
[{\goth g}_m, {\goth g}_k] \subset {\goth g}_{m+k}, \label{b.17}
\rho(\lambda) x = \rho(\lambda)\left(\sum_{m \in {\Bbb Z}} x_m \right) \equiv \sum_{m \in {\Bbb Z}} \lambda^m x_m, \qquad \lambda \in {\Bbb C}^*. \label{b.18}
[q, x_m] = m x_m \label{b.19}
\exp(2\pi i\,\ad (q)) = \id_{\goth g}. \label{b.20}
q = \sum_{i,j = 1}^r k^{-1}_{ij} n_j h_i. \label{b.21}
\dim \,{\goth g}_m = \dim \,{\goth g}_{-m}. \label{b.37}
\tilde {\goth n}_- \equiv \bigoplus_{m < 0} {\goth g}_m, \qquad \tilde {\goth n}_+ \equiv \bigoplus_{m > 0} {\goth g}_m. \label{b.22}
\tilde {\goth n}_\pm \subset {\goth n}_\pm. \label{b.23}
\tilde {\goth b}_- \equiv \bigoplus_{m \le 0} {\goth g}_m, \qquad \tilde {\goth b}_+ \equiv \bigoplus_{m \ge 0} {\goth g}_m \label{b.24}
\Pi_0 \equiv \{ \alpha_i \in \Pi \mid \alpha_i(q) = 0 \}, \label{b.25}
\tilde {\goth b}_\pm = {\goth p}_{\pm \Pi_0}. \label{b.26}
\tilde {\goth b}_\pm = {\goth p}_{\pm \Psi}. \label{b.27}
\tilde {\goth b}_\pm = \tilde {\goth h} \oplus \tilde {\goth n}_\pm, \label{b.28}
{\goth g} = \tilde {\goth n}_- \oplus \tilde {\goth h} \oplus \tilde {\goth n}_+. \label{b.29}
q = \sum_{i = 1}^r k_i h_i, \label{b.30}
k_i \equiv \sum_{j=1}^r k^{-1}_{ij}. \label{b.31}
x_- \equiv \left(\begin{array}{cc} 0 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 \end{array} \right), \qquad h \equiv \left(\begin{array}{cr} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right), \qquad x_+ \equiv \left(\begin{array}{cc} 0 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 \end{array} \right) \label{b.32}
[h, x_\pm] = \pm 2 x_\pm, \qquad [x_+, x_-] = h. \label{b.33}
\exp(2\pi i\,\ad (h)) = \id_{\goth g}. \label{b.34}
h = 2q. \label{b.35}
\exp(\pi i\,\ad (h)) = \id_{\goth g}, \label{b.36}
\dim \,{\goth g}_0 \ge \dim \,{\goth g}_{\pm 1}. \label{b.38}
x_{\pm} = \sum_{i=1}^r (2k_i)^{1/2} x_{\pm i}, \qquad h = 2 \sum_{i=1}^r k_i h_i, \label{b.39}
\label{toda} \pa_\tau \pa_t \phi_i(t,\tau) = \sum_{j=0}^l (\al_i,\al_j) e^{-\phi_j(t,\tau)}, \quad i = 1,\ldots,l,
\label{lf} F[{\bold u}(t)] = \int P({\bold u}(t),\pa_t {\bold u}(t),\ldots) dt,
\label{H} H = \sum_{i=0}^l \int e^{-\phi_i(t)} dt.
\label{mkdv} \frac{\pa u_i^{(n)}({\bold t})}{\pa t_m} = \eta_m \cdot u^{(n)}_i({\bold t}), \quad \quad m \in I; i=1,\ldots,l; n\geq 0,
\label{solution} x({\bold t}) = x({\bold 0}) \cdot g({\bold t}).
\label{vf} \xi_P = \sum_{1\leq i\leq l, n\geq 0} ( \pa^{n+1} \cdot \delta_i P) \fp{i}{n},
\label{pa} \pa = \sum_{1\leq i\leq l, n\geq 0} u_i^{(n+1)} \frac{\pa}{\pa u_i^{(n)}} = \xi_P, \quad \quad P = \frac{1}{2} \sum_{1\leq i\leq l} u_i^{(0)} u^{(0)i},
\label{pb} \{\int P,\int R\} = \int (\xi_P \cdot R).
\label{pala} \pa \cdot (P \otimes e^{\laa}) = (\pa P) \otimes e^{\laa} + \left( \sum_{0\leq i\leq l} \la_i u_i^{(0)} P \right) \otimes e^{\laa},
\label{oper} \xi_{S e^{\laa}} = \sum_{1\leq i\leq l, n\geq 0} \pa^n \left( \pa (\delta_i S \cdot e^{\laa}) -  S \, \frac{\pa e^{\laa}}{\pa \phi_i} \right) \fp{i}{n}.
\label{com} \xi_{\{ P , R\}} = [\xi_P , \xi_R].
\label{borel} \q_i = - \sum_{n\geq 0} (\pa^n e^{-\phi_i}) \pa_i^{(n)},
\label{rec} B_i^{(n)} = -u_i^{(0)} B_i^{(n-1)} + \pa B_i^{(n-1)},
\label{qi} Q_i = - \sum_{n\geq 0} e^{\phi_i} (\pa^n e^{-\phi_i}) \pa_i^{(n)} = - \sum_{n\geq 0} B_i^{(n)} \pa_i^{(n)}.
\label{p1} p_1 = \sum_{0\leq i\leq l} \frac{(\al_i,\al_i)}{2} f_i.
\label{key} [e_i^L,\beta^R] = - F_i(\beta) e_i^L, \quad \quad i=0,\ldots,l.
\label{property} e_k^R \cdot x_j = -e_k^L \cdot x_j = \delta_{k,j}.
\label{nov} u_i = \sum_{0\leq j\leq l} (\al_i,\al_j) x_j,
\label{ui} [e_i,p_1] = -u_i^{(0)} e_i.
\label{operator} x^R + \sum_{0\leq i\leq l} \la_i \bar{F}_i(x).
\label{double} \C \larr F^*(\g) \stackrel{\pm p_1}{\larr} F^*(\g) \larr \C.
\label{main} [Q_j,\eta_m] = -(\delta_j H_m) Q_j.
\label{newkey} [e_i^L,\al] = -F_i(\al) e_i^L, \quad \quad i=0,\ldots,l,
\label{relation} f([x,y]) = [x,f(y)] - [y,f(x)].
\label{lincomb} h_i e_i + h_j e_j + h_{ij} [e_i,e_j] + \ldots + h_{i\ldots i j} (\on{ad} e_i)^{-a_{ij}} \cdot e_j,
\label{put} \widetilde{f}_m(e_i) = -\epsilon^* (\delta_i H_m) e_i^L, \quad \quad i=0,\ldots,l,
\label{exist} [e_i^L,\widetilde{\eta}_m] = -\epsilon^* (\delta_i H_m) e_i^L, \quad \quad i=0,\ldots,l.

<\cos\theta>=         \int_0^{2\pi} d\theta \cos\theta P_{eff}(\theta)=         \frac{\int_0^{2\pi} d\theta\cos\theta\exp\{-S_{eff}\}}          {\int_0^{2\pi} d\theta \exp\{-S_{eff}\}}\;,         \label{20}
P_{eff} \propto e^{-S_{eff}}\;,\qquad S_{eff}=-\beta\cos\theta - \ln(\cos\theta).         \label{30}
\dot \theta=-\beta\sin\theta -\tan\theta +\eta         \label{40}
<\cos\theta>_i \equiv \frac{\int_{D_i} \cos\theta e^{-S_{eff}}}                     {\int_{D_i} e^{-S_{eff}}},\qquad i=1 {\  or\ } 2.         \label{50}
<\cos\theta>_{abs}=         \int_0^{2\pi} d\theta \cos\theta P_{abs}(\theta)=         \frac{\int_0^{2\pi} d\theta\cos\theta \exp\{-S_{abs}\}}          {\int_0^{2\pi} d\theta \exp\{-S_{abs}\}}\;,         \label{60}
P_{abs} \propto e^{-S_{abs}}\;,\qquad S_{abs}=-\beta\cos\theta - \ln|\cos\theta|.         \label{70}
S_{eff}=S_{abs}\pm i\pi\Theta(-\cos\theta).         \label{80}
\Theta(x)=\left\{             \begin{array}{cl}             1 &  x>0,\\             0 &  x<0.             \end{array}  \right.         \label{80a}

S_{eff}=\frac{\alpha}{2}(x-\beta)^2-\ln x.      \label{120}

H_{nm}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)=\mu_{mn}!(-1)^{\frac {m +n}2}R_{11}^{n/2}R_{22}^{m/2}\left(r^2-1\right)^{\frac {m+n}4}P_{ (m+n)/2}^{|m-n|/2}\left(\frac r{\sqrt {r^2-1}}\right),\label{3}
H_{nn}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)=n!(-\mbox{det}{\bf R})^{\frac n2}P_n^{}\left(\frac {-R_{12}}{\sqrt {-\mbox{det}{\bf R}}}\right) ,\label{4}
H_{nm}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)=\frac {m!n!(-1)^{\frac { m+n}2}}{2^{\frac {|m-n|}2}\left(\frac {m+n}2\right)!}\left[R_{11}^ nR_{22}^m\left(r^2-1\right)^{\mu_{mn}}\right]^{\frac 12}P_{\mu_{m n}}^{(\frac {|m-n|}2,\frac {|m-n|}2)}\left(\frac r{\sqrt {r^2-1}}\right ),\label{5}
H_{nm}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)=\frac {\mu_{nm}!|n-m|!( -1)^{\frac {m+n}2}}{2^{\frac {|m-n|}2}\left(\frac {|m-n|}2\right) !}\left[R_{11}^nR_{22}^m\left(r^2-1\right)^{\mu_{mn}}\right]^{\frac 12}C_{\mu_{mn}}^{\frac {|m-n|+1}2}\left(\frac r{\sqrt {r^2-1}}\right ).\label{6}
=\sum_{k=o}^{\mu_{mn}}\left(-\frac {2R_{12}}{\sqrt { R_{11}R_{22}}}\right)^k\frac {n!m!}{(n-k)!(m-k)!k!}H_{n-k}\left(\frac { \zeta_1}{\sqrt {2R_{11}}}\right)H_{m-k}\left(\frac {\zeta_2}{\sqrt { 2R_{22}}}\right),\label{7}
\zeta_1=R_{11}y_1+R_{12}y_2,~~~\zeta_2=R_{12}y_1+ R_{22}y_2.\label{8}
\mbox{$H_{nm}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(y_1,y_2)$}=R_{12}^m\sum_{ k=o}^{\mu_{mn}}\left(\frac {R_{11}}2\right)^{\frac {n-k}2}\frac { (-1)^kn!m!y_1^{m-k}}{(n-k)!(m-k)!k!}H_{n-k}\left(\frac {R_{11}y_1 +R_{12}y_2}{\sqrt {2R_{11}}}\right).\label{9}
H_{nm}^{\{t\sigma_x\}}(y_1,y_2)=t^{n+m}y_1^my_2^n \sum_{k=o}^{\mu_{mn}}\frac {n!m!(-y_1y_2t)^{-k}}{(n-k)!(m-k)!k!}. \label{10}
H_{nm}^{\{t\sigma_x\}}(y_1,y_2)=\mu_{mn}!t^{\nu_{ mn}}(-1)^{\mu_{mn}}y_1^{\frac {(m-n+|m-n|)}2}y_2^{\frac {(n-m+|n- m|)}2}L_{\mu_{mn}}^{|m-n|}(ty_1y_2),\label{11}
H_{nn}^{\{t\sigma_x\}}(y_1,y_2)=(-1)^nt^nn!L_n(ty_ 1y_2).\label{12}
\mbox{$H_{nm}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)$}=\left(\frac {R_{ 11}^nR_{22}^m}{2^{n+m}}\right)^{\frac 12}\sum_{l=0}^{\left[\frac { \mu_{nm}}2\right]}\frac {(-1)^{\frac {n+m}2}n!m!}{l!\left(\mu_{nm} -2l\right)!\left(\frac {|n-m|}2+l\right)!}(2r)^{\mu_{nm}-2l}, \label{13}
\mbox{$H_{nn}^{\{{\bf R}\}}(0,0)$}=\left(\frac {R_{ 11}R_{22}}4\right)^{\frac n2}\sum_{l=0}^{\left[\frac n2\right]}\frac { (-1)^n(n!)^2}{(l!)^2\left(n-2l\right)!}(2r)^{n-2l}.\label{14}

C_n^{\lambda}(z)\approx\frac {\Gamma (n+\lambda )}{ \Gamma (\lambda )n!}\zeta^n\left(1-\zeta^{-2}\right)^{-\lambda},\qquad n\gg 1,\qquad\lambda\sim {\cal O}(1),\label{16}
z=\frac 12\left(\zeta +\zeta^{-1}\right),\qquad | \zeta |>1.\label{17}

\chi_i \tr a  =  \Lix{i}(a)         =  \Ix{i}(\dl a) + \dl(\Ix{i} a).
\Ix{i}(\dl a) = \chi _{i} \tr a = a_{(1)} \inprod{\chi _{i}}{a_{(2)}}. \label{incomplete}
\Lix{i}(\dl \al ) =  \dl(\Ix{i} \dl \al ) + \Ix{i}(\dl \dl \al ) =  \dl(\Lix{i} \al ) + 0, \label{Ld}
\Lix{i} \dl(a) = \dl(a_{(1)}) \inprod{\chi_{i(1)}}{a_{(2)}} \Li_{\chi_{i(2)}}.
\Lix{i}(a b) =  \Ix{i} \dl(a b) =  \Ix{i}(\dl(a) b + a \dl(b)),
\I_{\chi _{i}} a = (O_{i}{}^{j} \tr a) \;\I_{\chi _{j}} = \Li_{O_{i}{}^{j}}(a) \;\I_{\chi _{j}} \label{lcross}
\I_{\chi _{i}} \dl(a) = \underbrace{\I_{\chi _{i}}(\dl a)}_{\in \A} + \mbox{``braiding term''}\cdot \I_{\chi _{?}}\,.
\begin{array}{rcl} \I_{\chi _{i}} \dl(a) &=& (\chi _{i} \tr a) - \dl(O_{i}{}^{j} \tr a) \;\I_{\chi _{j}}\\ &=&\I_{\chi _{i}}(\dl a) - \Li_{O_{i}{}^{j}}(\dl a) \;\I_{\chi _{j}}, \end{array}
\I_{\chi _{i}} \al = \I_{\chi _{i}}(\al) +  (-1)^{p} \Li_{O_{i}{}^{j}}(\al)\; \I_{\chi _{j}}.
\chi_i a = a_{(1)} \inprod{\chi_{i(1)}}{a_{(2)}} \chi_{i(2)}.

\dl(\om_{b})  = - \om_{b_{(1)}} \om_{b_{(2)}}.

\begin{array}{rcl} \I_{\chi _{i}} \om^{j} &=& \delta _{i}^{j} - \Li_{O_{i}{}^{k}}(\om^{j}) \I_{\chi _{k}}\\ &=& \delta _{i}^{j} - \om^{m} \inprod{O_{i}{}^{k}}{S^{-1}(T^{j}{}_{m})} \I_{\chi _{k}}, \end{array} \label{IOMI}
\om^{i} \wedge \om^{j} = \om^{i} \otimes \om^{j} - \hat{\sigma }^{ij}{}_{mn} \om^{m} \otimes \om^{n},
\I_{\chi _{i}}(\om^{j} \wedge \om^{k}) = \delta _{i}^{j} \om^{k} - \hat{\sigma }^{jk}{}_{mn} \delta _{i}^{m} \om^{n}.
\hat{\sigma }^{ij}{}_{mn} = \inprod{O_{m}{}^{j}}{S^{-1}(T^{i}{}_{n})},
\begin{array}{rcl} \om^{i} \wedge \om^{j} &=& (I-\hat{\sigma })^{ij}{}_{mn}\om^{m} \otimes \om^{n} \\ &=& \om^{i} \otimes \om^{j} - \om^{k} \otimes \Li_{O_{k}{}^{j}}(\om^{i}). \end{array}
\begin{array}{rcl} \dl \omega ^{j}  & = & \dl \omega _{b^{j}} = -\omega _{b^{j}_{(1)}} \wedge \omega _{b^{j}_{(2)}}\\ & = & -\omega _{S^{-1}(Sb^{j}_{(1)} b^{j}_{(3)})} \otimes \omega _{b^{j}_{(2)}}\\ & = & -\omega ^{k} \otimes \omega ^{l} \inprod{-S\chi_{k}}{S^{-1}(Sb^{j}_{(1)} b^{j}_{(3)})}\inprod{-S\chi _{l}}{b^{j}_{(2)}}\\ & = & -\omega ^{k} \otimes \omega ^{l} \inprod{\underbrace{(S^{-1}\chi _{k})_{(1)} \chi _{l} S(S^{-1}\chi _{k})_{(2)}}_{S^{-1}\chi _{k} \ad \chi _{l}}}{Sb^{j}} \\ & = & -f'_{k}{}^{j}{}_{l} \omega ^{k} \otimes \omega ^{l}. \end{array}

\Psi^{\prime}(t,\vec x\,) \,=\, \sum_{\sigma=0,\pm 1} \int {d^3p\over (2\pi)^{3} } {1\over 2\,\omega_{\vec p}} \Big[S(T)\, u^\ast_\sigma(\vec p\,)\, a^\dagger _\sigma(\vec p\, )\, e^{i p\cdot x'} + S(T)\,  v^\ast_ \sigma(\vec p\,) \,b_\sigma(\vec p\,) \,e^{-i p\cdot x'} \Bigr ] \quad,\label{t}
S(T)\,u_\sigma^\ast(\vec p\,)\,=\,u_{-\sigma}(-\vec p\,)\,,\quad S(T)\,v_\sigma^\ast(\vec p\,)\,=\,v_{-\sigma}(-\vec p\,)\,,
\sum_{\sigma=0,\pm 1} \bigg( u_\sigma(\vec p\,)\,{\overline u}_\sigma(\vec p\,) + v_\sigma(-\,\vec p\,)\,{\overline v}_\sigma(-\,\vec p\,) \bigg)\,=\, \left( \begin{array}{cc} {\cal M} & 0\\ 0 & -{\cal M} \end{array}\right) \quad,
{\cal M}\,=\, \left( \begin{array}{ccccc} E^2\,+\,p_z^2 &{\;\;}& \sqrt{2} \,p_-\, p_z&{\;\;} & p_-^2 \\ \sqrt{2}\, p_+\, p_z &{\;\;}& E^2\,+\,p_-\,p_+\, -\,p_z^2& {\;\;}& -\,\sqrt{2}\, p_-\, p_z \\ p_+^2 &{\;\;}& -\,\sqrt{2} \,p_+\, p_z&{\;\;} & E^2\,+\,p_z^2 \end{array} \right)\label{m}\quad.
\psi\{p^\mu\}\,=\,\left[ \begin{array}{c} \phi_R(p^\mu)\\ \phi_L(p^\mu) \end{array} \right]\quad .\label{spinor}
\phi_R(p^\mu)\,=\,\Lambda_R(p^\mu)\, \phi_R({\overcirc p}^\mu)\,=\, \exp\left( \protect\bbox{ \beta\cdot {\bf J}}\right)\phi_R({\overcirc p}^\mu)\, \quad, \label{r}
\phi_L(p^\mu)= \Lambda_L(p^\mu)\, \phi_L({\overcirc p}^\mu)=\exp\left(-\protect\bbox{\beta^\ast \cdot {\bf J}}\right)\, \phi_L({\overcirc p}^\mu) \quad. \label{l}
\protect\bbox{ \beta} \,=\, \eta\,\left(\alpha\,v^r\,,\,\,-i\,\alpha\,  v^r\,,\,\,1\right)\quad,
\cosh(\eta/2)=\Omega \left(p^+ + m\right)\,,\, \sinh(\eta/2)=\Omega \left(p^+ - m\right)\,,
\overline{\psi}\{p^\mu\}\,\equiv\,\psi^\dagger\{p^\mu\}\,\Gamma^0\, ,\quad\Gamma^0 \,\equiv\, \left[ \begin{array}{cc} 0&\openone\\ \openone&0 \end{array} \right]\quad,
\phi^R_{j}({\overcirc p}^\mu)\,=\,{m^j\over {\sqrt{2}}} \left[ \begin{array}{c} 1\\ 0\\ \vdots\\ 0 \end{array}\right] \,,\quad \phi^R_{j-1}({\overcirc p}^\mu)\,=\,{m^j\over {\sqrt{2}}} \left[ \begin{array}{c} 0\\ 1\\ \vdots\\ 0 \end{array}\right] \,,\cdots\,\quad \phi^R_{-j}({\overcirc p}^\mu)\,=\,{m^j\over {\sqrt{2}}} \left[ \begin{array}{c} 0\\ 0\\ \vdots\\ 1 \end{array}\right] \,\quad,\label{rests}
\psi^\theta\{p^\mu\}\equiv \left[ \begin{array}{c} \left(\xi\,\Theta_{[\,j]}\right)\,\phi^\ast_L(p^\mu) \\ \left(\xi\,\Theta_{[\,j]}\right)^\ast\,\phi^\ast_R(p^\mu) \end{array}\right]\quad,\label{c}
\Theta_{[\,j]} \,\,{{\bf J}}\,\,\Theta_{[\,j]}^{-1} \,=\,-\,\protect\bbox{ {\bf J}^{\,\ast}}\quad,
\left[\psi^\theta\{p^\mu\}\right]^\theta \,=\,\psi\{p^\mu\}\quad. \label{cc}
\Theta_{[1/2]}\,=\,\left[ \begin{array}{ccc} 0 & {}&-1 \\ 1 & {} &0 \end{array} \right] \,,\,\, \Theta_{[1]}\,=\,\left[ \begin{array}{ccccc} 0 &{}& 0 &{}& 1 \\ 0 &{}& -1 &{}& 0 \\ 1 &{}& 0 &{}& 0 \end{array} \right]\quad.
$\left[\Lambda_R(p^\mu) \right]^{-1}\,=\,\left[  \Lambda_L(p^\mu)\right]^\dagger\,,\quad \left[\Lambda_L(p^\mu)\right]^{-1}\,=\, \left[\Lambda_R(p^\mu)\right]^ \dagger \,; 
\psi_R\{p^\mu\}\,=\,\left[ \begin{array}{c} \phi_R(p^\mu)\\ 0 \end{array} \right] \,,\, \psi_L\{p^\mu\}\,=\, \left[ \begin{array}{c} 0\\ \phi_L(p^\mu) \end{array} \right] \quad,
\rho^\theta\{p^\mu\}\,=\,\pm\,\rho\{p^\mu\}\quad {\mbox {and}}\quad \lambda^\theta\{p^\mu\}\,=\,\pm\,\lambda\{p^\mu\}\quad,\label{sc}
\zeta_\rho\,=\,\pm\,\xi \quad {\mbox {and}}\quad \zeta_\lambda\,=\,\pm\,\xi\quad.\label{zeta}
\psi[\,p^\mu]\,=\, {1\over{\sqrt{2}}}\,\left[ \begin{array}{ccc} \openone &{\,\,\,}& \openone\\ \openone &{\,\,\,}& -\openone \end{array} \right]\, \psi\{p^\mu\}\quad.\label{s}

\left[ \begin{array}{ccc} -\zeta_\rho\,m^2\,\Theta_{[1]}&{\quad}&{\cal O}_1\\ {\cal O}_2& {\quad}&-\zeta_\rho\,m^2\,\Theta_{[1]} \end{array} \right] \rho\{p^\mu\}\,=\,0 \quad, \label{majeq}

\hat{G}_{FF}(p) = \frac{p^2}{p^2 + e^2\frac{N}{\pi}} = 1 - \frac{e^2\frac{N}{\pi}}{p^2 + e^2\frac{N}{\pi}} = 1 - \int_0^\infty \frac{d\rho(\mu^2)}{p^2 + \mu^2} \; .

a_0(x) = \lambda  + {1 \over \sqrt {L_1L_2}} \sum_{\vec p \ne 0} {1 \over \sqrt {2 p_0}} [ {p_0 \over \mu} g(\vec p) e^{-ip\cdot x} + c.c]_{p^0 = |\vec p|}\,. \label{a0box}
{\cal L}= {\mu \over 2} \epsilon^{\mu\nu\rho} a_\mu \partial_\nu a_\rho\ + \psi^+ i\hbar D_0 \psi - {\hbar^2 \over 2m} |\vec D \psi|^2\,,
{\cal H}= a_0 (\mu b + {e\over c}J_0) + {1\over 2m} |i\hbar D_i \psi|^2\,,
[a_1(x), a_2(y)] = i {\hbar \over \mu} \delta(\vec x - \vec y)\,. \label{commfield}
\Gamma = b + {e \over \mu c} J_0
{\cal H}(\psi(x), a_i(x), a_0(x)) = {\cal H}^{(N)}(\psi^{(N)}(x), a_0(x))\,.
[\psi^{(N)}(x), \Gamma(y)] =0\,, \label {comment}
V_1= \exp i \left[ Q \eta^{(1)} + {e\over \hbar c} \int\! \int d\vec x d \vec y J_0^{(1)}(\vec x,t) G_p (\vec x, \vec y) \partial_ka_k^{(1)}(\vec y, t) \right] \,. \label{V1}
\nabla^2 G_p (\vec x, \vec y) = \delta (\vec x, \vec y) - {1 \over L_1 L_2}\,; \quad G_p(\vec x, \vec y) = G_p (\vec y, \vec x)\,,
G_p(\vec  x, \vec y) = {1\over 4\pi} \ln \left| {\theta_1(z|\tau) \over \theta_1{'}(0|\tau)} \right|^2  - {({\rm Im } \, z)^2 \over 2 \, {\rm Im} \, \tau}\,,
\epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} G_p(\vec x, \vec y) \left.\right|_{\vec x = \vec y}  =0\,.
[\eta^{(1)}, \xi^{(1)}] = i\,.
{\cal H}^{(1)} = \mu a_0 b^{(1)} + {1 \over 2m}  \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} a_i^{({\rm eff})} ) \psi^{(1)} \right|^2\,. \label{hamil1}
a_i^{({\rm eff})}(x) = {\theta_i \over L_i} - (Q +1) \tilde x_i +\epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} \int \! d \vec y G(\vec x, \vec y) b^{(1)}(y) -{e \over \mu c} \epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} \int \! d \vec y G_p(\vec x, \vec y)J_0(y) \,. \label{aeff}
a_i^{(1)}(x) = {\theta_i \over L_i} +\epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} \int \! d \vec y G(\vec x, \vec y) b^{(1)}(x) + \partial_{x^i} \int \! d \vec y G_p(\vec x, \vec y) \partial_{y^j} a_j^{(1)} (y) \,, \label{a1i}
G_{np}(\vec x, \vec y) =  {({\rm Im }\, z)^2 \over 2 \, {\rm Im} \,\tau} = {(x_2 - y_2)^2 \over 2 L_1 L_2}\,, \label{Gnp}
G(\vec x, \vec y) = {1\over 4\pi} \ln \left| {\theta_1(z|\tau) \over \theta_1{'}(0|\tau)} \right|^2\,. \label{Green}
B \equiv i {\mu \over \hbar} \int \! d \vec x \, b^{(1)}(x) \Lambda(x)\,,
[B, \psi(x)] = {-ie\over \hbar c} \Lambda (x) \psi(x)
[B, \psi^{(1)}(x)] =0\,.
[a_1^{({\rm eff})}(x), a_2^{({\rm eff})}(y)] = i {\hbar \over \mu L_1L_2}\,,
{\cal H}^{(1)} (x) =  {1 \over 2m} \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} A_i^{[1]}(x) )\psi^{(1)}(x) \right|^2\,, \label{hamil11}
A_i^{[1]}(x)= {\theta_i \over L_i} -(Q + 1) \tilde x_i -{e \over \mu c} \epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} \int \! d \vec y G_p(\vec x, \vec y) J_0(y)\,. \label{A1i}
V_2(t) = \exp \left[ {ie \theta_2^{(2)} \over \hbar c} \int d \vec y J_0 ^{(2)}(y) {y^2 \over L_2} \right]\,, \label{V2}
{\cal H}^{(2)}(x) = {1 \over 2m} \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} A_i^{[2]}(x)) \psi^{(2)}(x) \right|^2\,, \label{hamil2}
V_3(t) = \exp \left[ {ie \theta_1^{(3)} \over \hbar c} \int d \vec y J_0 ^{(3)}(y) {y^1 \over L_1} \right]\,, \label{V3}
{\cal H}^{(3)} (x) = {1 \over 2m} \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} A_i^{[3]}(x)) \psi^{(3)}(x) \right|^2\,, \label{hamil3}
[\Pi_1^{[N]}(x), \Pi_2^{[N]}(x)] = -i\hbar {e\phi \over c}J_0(x) \,.
\Phi (1, \cdots, N) \equiv < 0|\psi^{(3)} (x^{(1)}) \cdots \psi^{(3)} (x^{(N)}) |N > \label{Nwave}
i\hbar {\partial\Phi \over \partial t} (1, \cdots, N) = \sum_{p=1}^N < 0 | \psi^{(3)} (x^{(1)}) \cdots i\hbar {\partial\psi^{(3)} (x^{(p)})  \over \partial t} \cdots \psi^{(3)} (x^{(N)}) |N > \,.
- ({e \over c}) \int d\vec y \psi^{(3)+} (y))K_i(y,x)  (i\hbar \vec \partial_{y^i} - ({e \over c}) A_i^{[3]}  (y)) \psi^{(3)} (y) \left. \right] \psi^{(3)} (x) \,, \label{NSch}
K_i(x,y) = - \phi \epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} G(\vec x, \vec y)\,.
i\hbar {\partial\Phi \over \partial t} (x) = < 0 | i\hbar {\partial\psi^{(3)} (x) \over \partial t} |1 > = - {\hbar^2  \over 2m} \nabla ^2 \, \Phi(x)\,.
{\cal A}_i (p,r) =  - \phi \epsilon_{ik} \partial_k^{(p)} G(p,r)\,.
i\hbar {\partial\Phi \over \partial t} (1, \cdots, N) = {1 \over 2m} \sum^N_{p=1} \{i\hbar \partial_i^{(p)} - {e  \over c} \sum^N_{r=1(\ne p)} {\cal A}_i (p,r) \}^2 \Phi(1, \cdots, N)\,. \label{NSchp}
{\cal H}^{(3)} (x{'}) = {1 \over 2m} \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} A_i^{[3]} (x{'})) \psi^{(3)} (x{'}) \right|^2\,, \label{hamil3prime}
A_i^{[3]} (x{'}) = - \phi \epsilon_{ij} \partial_{x^j} \int \! d \vec y G(\vec x, \vec y) J_0(y{'})\,. \label{field3defprime}
{\cal H}^{(3)} (x{'}) = T_{(m,n)} {\cal H}^{(3)} (x)  T^+_{(m,n)}\,,
T_{(m,n)} =  T_1^m T_2^n
a_i^{(3)}(x{'}) = T_{(m,n)} a_i^{(3)} (x) T^+_{(m,n)}\,.
T_1T_2  = T_2T_1\,, \label{Tcomm}
\psi^{(3)} (x{'}) = \psi^{(3)} (x) \,. \label{psiperiod}
J_0 (x{'}) = J_0 (x) ; \quad b^{(3)} (x{'}) = b^{(3)} (x)\,. \label{J0period}
A_i^{[3]} (x{'}) = A_i^{[3]} (x)\,, \label{Aperiod}
[T_i, {\cal H}(x)] = 0\,.  \label{THcomm}
[J_0(x), \psi^{(3)} (y') ] = [J_0(x), \psi^{(3)} (y) ] = \psi^{(3)} (y) \delta (\vec x - \vec y)\,.
a_i^{(3)} (x') = a_i^{(3)} (x) + \partial_i \Omega (x)\,,  \label {aiperiod}
{\cal H} (x{'}) = {1 \over 2m} \left| (i \hbar \partial_i - {e\over c} a_i (x{'})) \psi (x{'}) \right|^2\,, \label{hamilprime}
\Phi (\{1\}, \cdots, \{N\}) \equiv < 0|\psi^{(3)} (\{1\}) \cdots \psi^{(3)} (\{N\}) |N > \label{Nwave1}
i\hbar {\partial\Phi \over \partial t} (\{1\}, \cdots, \{N\}) = {1 \over 2m} \sum^N_{p=1} \{i\hbar \partial_i^{(p)} - {e  \over c} \sum^N_{r=1(\ne p)} {\cal A}_i (p,r)\}^2 \Phi(\{1\}, \cdots, \{N\}) \,. \label{NSchp1}
\Phi (\{1\}, \cdots, \{N\}) =  \Phi (1, \cdots, N)\,,
\Phi (\cdots, \{i\}, \cdots, \{j\}, \cdots) =  - \Phi (\cdots, \{j\}, \cdots, \{i\}, \cdots)\,,
\label{regelGr} {\cal G}^{(m,n)} = 1+(A_{1}\psi_{-m}^{\ast} + A_{2}\psi_{n}^{\ast})(B_{1}\psi_{-m} + B_{2}\psi_{n})
\label{regelGrvac} {\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle = (1+A_{2}B_{2} + A_{1}B_{2}\psi_{-m}^{\ast}\psi_{n})|0\rangle
\label{basvecreg} \phi_{i}^{(m,n)}=\left.\frac{1}{(i-1)!}\partial_{t}^{i-1} \frac{\langle0|\exp\left[\sum\frac{J_{n}}{n}(\mu^{-n}-t^{n}) \right]{\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle} {(1-\mu t)\langle0|{\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle}\right|_{\displaystyle{t=0}}.
\label{11} \frac{\langle0|\exp\left[\sum\frac{J_{n}}{n}(\mu^{-n}-t^{n})\right] {\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle} {\langle0|{\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle}= 1+\frac{1}{\epsilon}\mu^{-n-1}t^{m-1}(1-\mu t),
\label{12} \phi_{i}^{(m,n)} = \mu^{i-1}+ \frac{1}{\epsilon}\mu^{-n-1}\delta_{mi}.
\label{13} \langle0|\exp\left[\sum J_{n}T_{n}\right]{\cal G}^{(m,n)}|0\rangle= \epsilon \frac{\det[\psi^{(m,n)}_{i}(\mu_{j})]}{\Delta(\mu)}
\label{A1} \{\psi_{i},\psi^{\ast}_{j} \} = \delta_{ij} \;\;,\hspace{0.3in} \{\psi_{i}, \psi_{j} \} =\{\psi^{\ast}_{i},\psi^{\ast}_{j} \} = 0
\psi_{i}\;|+\infty \rangle = 0 \;\; , \;\; i \in Z \label{eq:a}
\label{A2} |n \rangle = \psi^{\ast}_{n} \psi^{\ast}_{n+1} \ldots |+\infty\rangle
\label{A3} \psi^{\ast}_{k}|n \rangle = 0 \;\; k\geq n \;\;\;, \;\;\; \psi_{k}|n \rangle = 0 \;\; k<n
\psi(z) \equiv \sum_{i \in Z} \psi_{i}z^{i}\;\;\;,\;\;\;\psi^{\ast}(z) \equiv \sum_{i \in Z} \psi^{\ast}_{i}z^{-i}
\label{A5} J_{-k} \equiv \bar J_{k} \;\;\;, \;\;\; k>0
\label{A6} :e^{{\displaystyle i \alpha \phi(z)}}::e^{{\displaystyle i \beta\phi(w)}}: = (z-w)^{\alpha \beta}:e^{{\displaystyle i \alpha \phi(z)+ i \beta \phi(w)}}:
\label{A7} \psi(z) \psi^{\ast}(w) = \frac{w}{z-w}:e^{{\displaystyle i \phi(z)-i \phi(w)}}:
\label{Ham1} H(T) \equiv \sum_{k=1}^{\infty} T_{k}J_{k}
\label{Ham2} \bar H(\bar T) \equiv \sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \bar T_{k}\bar J_{k}
\label{A8} \hat X(z,T) = e^{\xi(z,T)} \; e^{-\xi(z,\tilde \partial_{T})}
\label{A9} \hat X^{\ast}(z,T) = e^{-\xi(z,T)} \; e^{\xi(z,\tilde \partial_{T})}
\psi_{in} = {\textstyle \frac {1}{\sqrt{2}}}(|\uparrow _{A}\rangle |\downarrow _{B}\rangle - |\downarrow _{A}\rangle | \uparrow _{B} \rangle).
